'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑e mɛɛ 'ke mu ꞊kla mɛɛ ‑lɛdɔɔ' 'mu 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ wli ‑bhɛɛke' mu 'la waa 'mu daanlɛ ‑e 'mu 'pe 'seŋ ꞊naa ‑a 'ke mu ni.
Taa‑ ‑a pele ‑o dɔɔ mɔkpɛn' ‑o 'ke Zesu a 'winbɔwo mu 'le ɛɛ? Taa‑ mɔkpɛn' ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛla' janwo mu 'le ɛɛ? Taa‑ mɔkpɛn' ‑o 'ke 'sɔle‑ maza klɛ mu 'le ɛɛ?
'Bhɛɛ‑ taa‑ ‑a pele ‑o dɔɔ gadɛ mu ‑bhee 'seŋ ‑o mɔkpɛn' 'ni ɛɛ? Taa‑ wli ‑glɔɔn ‑bhɛɛke' 'pe 'seŋ ‑o mɔkpɛn' ni ɛɛ? Taa‑ 'bhɛ wli ‑bhɛɛke' mu 'ɛ 'yipe 'seŋ ‑o mɔkpɛn' ni ɛɛ?
'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi bhe, 'ka zrubhɔ 'seŋ ‑gbɛnɛ mu 'ɛ 'mu ‑la ‑srɔɔwole ma. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o pɛ 'kpɛn 'lɛɛ, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ zan 'bhɛ zrɔnlɛ 'ka ni 'saanibhe.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ali‑ 'ke 'ŋ sɔ 'drunyan ta wli mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'pele, 'ke 'ŋ sɔ ‑mlɛkɛ' mu a wli mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'pele, 'duŋ‑ 'ke 'sɔniya laa ‑o 'ŋ zru 'ɛ 'yi, 'ŋ 'wojan‑ mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'bhii‑ 'koobaa‑ 'weli‑ 'pegee ‑glee 'weli‑ gbɛɛn‑.

'Ali‑ 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwole 'seŋ ‑o 'ŋ ni, 'ke gaanyiza 'kpɛn ‑yipe' 'seŋ ‑o 'ŋ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑zayaangole 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'seŋ ‑o 'ŋ ni; 'ali‑ 'ke 'ŋ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'bhɛ a ‑gbɛnɛya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ke 'ŋ sɔ a pele‑ vlɛ gɔɔn mu ni dɔɔ 'mu 'yro 'mu gbaanyrɛ mu 'ɛ ꞊nɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ 'ke mu 'mu klɛ 'ŋ 'weli‑ ta; 'duŋ‑ 'ke 'sɔniya laa ‑o 'ŋ 'yi, 'naa ‑o 'ke pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'le.

'Ke 'mi 'ŋ 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yiciɛnna 'kɔɔfleŋzan mu ma ‑o ‑lɛbɔ' pɛ mu 'le, 'ali‑ 'ke 'mi 'ŋ 'gbu ꞊gwan 'bhii‑ lu do 'le, 'kooko‑ 'ŋ bhɔ 'woo‑ 'kɔɔfleŋzan mu 'ɛ ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'mi 'ŋ baa 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ 'yi, 'duŋ‑ 'ke 'sɔniya laa ‑o 'ŋ 'yi, 'bhɛ 'laa ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yanwo‑ 'ŋ ma.
'Ke 'sɔniya ‑o mɛɛ 'la zan ‑yi, 'bhɛ zan 'bhɛ zrubakpalaa ‑za zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ wlanya ‑o ‑a zru 'ɛ 'yi, ‑a ‑yrɛ 'laa bhɔ mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' 'kɔɔpɛ‑ zi, yaa 'gbu 'wasowo, 'bhɛɛ‑ yaa ‑a 'gbu magbaandɛ mɛɛ ma.
'Bhɛ zan laa ‑yraladɔ maza klɛ, yaa ‑a 'gbu do ‑kplɛn 'nrayiza klɛ, yaa ‑a yinmatɔnkpa blaale‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ yaa mɛɛ kuku kpa ‑a 'kpee.
'Bhɛ zan laa 'bhɛ zrukpalaa ‑lɛbiimaza zayi'; 'duŋ‑ ‑ya zrukpalaa wlan ‑la ‑zayi'.
'Ke 'sɔniya ‑o mɛɛ 'la zan 'yi, 'bhɛ zan ‑za 'kpɛn 'sroma‑ yan, ‑ya kpa ‑za 'kpɛn 'yi, ‑a ‑yri 'kpale‑ bo pɛ 'kpɛn ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑za 'kpɛn 'yikun‑.
'Sɔniya laa yan ‑titi. 'Duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwole mu nu yanlɛ. Wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'pele 'ɛ nu yanlɛ; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔa' ‑zayaangole 'ɛ nu yanlɛ.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑kɔɔa' ‑zayaangole 'ɛ 'lɛsɔle laa ‑o, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛla' jan mu 'la wo, 'mu 'lɛsɔle laa ‑o 'ezin‑.
'Duŋ‑, 'ke ‑za 'la 'bhɛ 'lɛsɔle ‑o, 'bhɛ ꞊nwa bhla 'la ba, 'kɛla 'bhɛ 'lɛsɔle laa ‑o, 'bhɛ nu yanlɛ.

'Ŋ 'yaa‑ 'waati 'la ba ‑nɛ 'fiɛntrɔnnɛ 'le, 'an ‑janwo' gbɛya oo, 'ŋ 'kpeelɛdan gbɛya 'pegee 'an ‑za 'kun gbɛya, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ 'mu 'kpɛn klɛ matruŋya ‑la ‑yi. 'Duŋ‑ 'ŋ gbaanladia, 'mi 'ploola‑ matruŋya pla za 'ɛ ma.

'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi, ‑zɔn ‑kɔɔ' sɔ ‑za sanɛ‑ drɔŋ 'la ‑yimale ‑Waanbhaa' ba zayi', 'bhɛ ‑o 'bhii‑ 'kee‑ pɛ do ‑glinna ‑dwaleŋ' 'la 'yrɛba‑ ‑o 'buŋbuŋ 'bhɛ 'yi, 'yaa‑ sɔ ‑a yrɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yele gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑. 'Duŋ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ yi 'ɛ ꞊bhwa, ‑kɔɔ' nu ‑Waanbhaa' yelɛ kpataakpa ‑kɔɔ' 'yrɛbhɛ‑ plɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le. ‑Zɔn ‑kɔɔa' ‑zayaangole 'ɛ 'lɛsɔle laa ‑o; 'duŋ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ 'waati 'ɛ ꞊bhwa, ‑kɔɔ' nu ‑za 'kpɛn dɔlɛ 'kee‑ tɛn ‑a ‑daŋ' ma, 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑kɔɔ' mu dɔ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

'Bhɛ 'yi bhe, pɛ yaga 'lɛɛ‑ 'mu ‑le nu bolɛ ‑a nɔɔ‑; 'bhɛɛ‑ waa yan ‑titi: 'kpaleya, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e 'yrikpale ‑za ta, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'sɔniya. 'Duŋ‑ 'kɛla 'bhɛ ‑za ‑o 'eglɔɔle ‑o 'kpɛn ba 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke 'sɔniya 'ɛ 'le.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑ka dɔ 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'ka 'sɔniya 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑la ziglin‑. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka *Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛ a 'seŋ mu 'ɛ 'mu ‑la ziglin‑ 'ezin‑; 'duŋ‑ ‑ka dɔ 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'ka ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwole 'seŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ziglin‑ 'elwale 'pe.

Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan ‑o wli ‑bhɛɛke' mu pe 'zi, 'bhɛ zan laa ‑o ‑janwo' zii' bhaaplɛŋ mu ni, 'duŋ‑ 'bhɛ zan ‑o ‑janwo' zii' ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ni. ‑Amasrɔyi mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ‑a pewli 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'yima‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'srɔyi, ‑e sɔ wlan mu 'la 'mu gaanle ‑o 'mu tapwɛle.
'Duŋ‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwo, 'bhɛ zan ‑janwo' bhaaplɛŋ mu ‑la ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e faŋgandɔ 'mu ta, ‑o 'kpaleya 'ɛ baan' kla ‑a ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑yoo lia.
'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan wli ‑bhɛɛke' pe, 'bhɛ zan faŋgandɔ 'bhɛ 'gbu ‑la ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwo, 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ faŋgandɔ Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑la ta.

'Mi ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ka 'kpɛn wli ‑bhɛɛke' mu ‑la pe; 'duŋ‑ 'kɛla 'bhɛ sɔ 'mi ni 'ezin‑ 'egbɛnɛle 'ke 'bhɛ kan 'kɛla bhe 'bhɛ ta, 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ 'ka 'kpɛn ‑Waanbhaa' 'lɛlajanwo. ‑Amasrɔyi mɛɛ 'la zan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwo, 'bhɛ mabhaabhɔ 'ke 'bhɛ kan mɛɛ 'la zan wli ‑bhɛɛke' mu pe 'bhɛ ta; 'fɔke 'bhɛ zan 'bhɛ 'pe wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'ɛ 'yipia꞊, 'kooko‑ faŋgan‑ dɔ Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'kpɛn ta ‑waa' 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'yi.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ŋ 'yoo ‑za do ‑la ‑yilrɔkpale 'ka ma dɔɔ: 'Ke 'mi ꞊nwa 'ka ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ŋ ꞊dwa wli ‑bhɛɛke' ‑la pele ma, 'bhɛ 'trɔn‑ nu klɛlɛ 'ka ma ‑mɛla ‑le ɛɛ? 'Bhɛ 'trɔn‑ 'laa nu klɛlɛ 'ka ma ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'le, 'fɔke ‑Waanbhaa' ‑za 'la 'bhɛ ‑zrɔnna 'ŋ ni 'ke 'ŋ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yipia꞊ 'ka ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ ‑jan 'la ꞊kpaa 'mi 'lii 'ke 'ŋ 'bhɛ 'yiklaa꞊ 'ka 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke 'ŋ ‑za 'yaangoleya ma ‑jan do ꞊woa 'ka ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ŋ 'ka ‑daanna ‑za do 'le. 'Ke yaa klɛlɛ 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑, 'ka nu ‑trɔn 'ɛ ‑dela ‑srɔɔwolɛ 'mi a pɛ wli ‑bhɛɛke' pele 'ɛ ma ɛɛ?

'Ali‑ nii‑ 'laa ‑o pɛ mu 'la 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ 'ke ‑o sɔ ‑wele', 'bhɛ pɛ mu 'ɛ 'ke mu ‑le 'ke ‑gofɛn' 'pegee ‑gitari gwe ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ 'le. 'Ke waa ‑o dɛ 'zi 'elrele, ‑woo 'sro 'la 'kpa zii' ‑o ‑yi, ‑o sɔ ‑o plɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn dɛwli 'ɛ bagole dɔle‑ ɛɛ?
'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi, ‑o gwledan mu 'ɛ sii ‑klɛloŋ' 'pɛnwli‑ 'la 'le, 'ke 'bhɛ 'pɛnwli‑ 'ɛ bakanle laa ‑o kplankplan, gwledan mu 'ɛ ‑de 'gbu ‑le nu 'bhɛ magaanlɛ gwledanle 'ɛ 'kaama‑ ɛɛ?

'Bhɛ ‑za 'yansi do 'kpɔ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'kaa‑ pɛ 'ɛ 'le. 'Ke 'ka ‑o ‑jan 'la 'wo zii' wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke waa 'bhɛ 'yima‑, ‑o nu 'ka 'wojan‑ 'ɛ 'yimalɛ 'nale‑ ‑a ma ɛɛ? ‑Yoo 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑o ‑janwo' zii' ‑ploo ‑la zi bhaama.
Wli 'srɛ ‑glɔɔn mu 'la ‑woo 'drunyan 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi, ‑o 'kpɛn ‑o 'ke ‑yima' pɛ 'le.
'Duŋ‑ 'ke mɛɛ do ‑o ‑janwo' zii' 'mi ni wli 'la 'ke 'naa 'bhɛ dɔ 'bhɛ 'yi, 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ klɛ 'mi 'yrɛ 'yi 'bhii‑ 'cie do; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi klɛ 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ 'yrɛ 'yi 'bhii‑ 'cie 'ezin‑.
'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'seŋ mu 'la na mɛɛ ni, 'mu ‑la ‑srɔɔwo' ‑lrɔ klɛ 'ka ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kɛla 'bhɛ sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ‑waa' 'kpaleya 'ɛ baan' 'klale ‑a ba, ‑ka 'bhɛɛ‑ ziglin‑ 'eglɔɔle.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan ‑o wli ‑bhɛɛke' pe zii', 'bhɛ zan 'a 'yrɛwo ‑Waanbhaa' ma dɔɔ 'bhɛ 'seŋ 'na ‑a ni 'kee‑ sɔ ‑a 'gbu 'pe wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'ɛ 'yipele.
‑Amasrɔyi 'ke 'ŋ 'yoo‑ 'ŋ 'seriwo zii' wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'yi, 'ŋ nii‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le klɛ 'seri 'yi, 'duŋ‑ 'naa ‑o ‑a klɛ 'zi 'ŋ yikan' 'ɛ 'le.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'mi sɔ ‑mɛla klɛle‑ 'tɛ ɛɛ? 'Mi sɔ 'ŋ 'seriwole ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'ŋ 'nii‑ 'ɛ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'ŋ nu 'seriwolɛ ‑a ni 'ezin‑ 'ŋ yikan 'ɛ 'le. 'Ŋ nu 'srokpalɛ 'ŋ 'nii‑ 'ɛ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'ŋ nu 'srokpalɛ 'ŋ yikan' 'ɛ 'le 'ezin‑.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'yoo‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'zi 'e 'nii‑ 'ɛ 'yi, mɛɛ bhaamale 'la 'yaale‑ ‑o ‑zamaa' 'ɛ 'pleŋ‑, 'bhɛ nu 'sɔlɛ‑ ‑a pele‑ 'nale‑ ‑a ma «Amiina» 'yaa‑ 'seri 'ɛ ma, 'ke yaa 'yaa‑ 'seri 'ɛ 'yimalɛ ɛɛ?
'Ali‑ 'ke 'yaa‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'seri 'ɛ ꞊kla 'elrele gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma, 'bhɛ mɛɛ do 'ɛ, 'yaa faŋgandɔlɛ 'bhɛ a 'kpaleya 'ɛ ta; ‑amasrɔyi yaa 'yaa‑ 'seri 'ɛ 'yimalɛ.
'Mi 'duŋ‑, ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ ‑amasrɔyi, 'ŋ sɔ wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'pele 'kee‑ kan 'ka 'kpɛn ta.

'Duŋ‑ 'ke Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ‑woo ‑waa' 'klaŋkeba ꞊nɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑o 'pleŋ‑, ‑jangɔ' 'soo 'la 'ke mɛɛ mu sɔ 'mu ‑yimale, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kooko‑ ‑o ‑za daan 'mu ma, 'bhɛ mu ‑la wole sɔ 'mi ni 'ke 'bhɛ kan ‑jangɔ' 'waa vu wole ta 'ŋ 'kɔɔ wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'yi.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑ka 'ploo‑ 'kaa‑ matruŋya 'kpeelɛdan gbɛya 'ɛ ma, ‑ka 'ka 'kpeelɛdan 'bhii‑ mɛɛ ‑yrɛbakanle mu gbɛɛn‑. ‑Za 'yɔɔ‑ a pɛ zi 'ɛ ta, ‑ka 'ka 'gbu klɛ 'bhii‑ matruŋnɛ mu gbɛɛn‑, ‑amasrɔyi waa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ dɔ. 'Duŋ‑ 'ka 'kpeelɛdan gbɛya 'ɛ ma, ‑ka klɛ mɛɛ ‑yrɛbakanle mu 'le.
'Toŋ 'sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi, ‑a yɔɔndɛle ‑o dɔɔ Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' pe dɔɔ:
«'Mi nu 'si 'bhɛɛke mu a wli ‑la 'silɛ‑,
'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ nu ‑jan 'kpalɛ‑ 'cie mu ‑la ‑lii, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o nu ‑janwolɛ 'an pɛ mɛɛ mu 'lɛɛ‑ ni,
'ali‑ 'ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla oo, waa nu ‑o 'trɔnkpalɛ 'mi 'weli‑ 'ɛ ꞊la.»

'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, wli ‑bhɛɛke' pele 'ɛ, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ ‑tɔɔmasie 'le mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa ‑o kpa ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi 'mu yrɛ 'yi; 'duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwole 'ɛ, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ ‑tɔɔmasie 'le mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi 'mu 'yrɛ 'yi.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ‑waa' 'klaŋkeba do ‑yi, ‑o 'kpɛn wli ‑bhɛɛke' mu 'pele‑ ‑saan; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'waati do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ba, 'kee‑ ꞊kla mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu 'le oo, 'kee‑ ꞊kla mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa ‑o kpa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yi 'bhɛ 'ke mu 'le oo, 'ke 'mu ꞊nwa wlalɛ 'ka ta 'ke 'ka 'kpɛn ‑o wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'pe zii' 'waati 'la ba; waa nu ‑a pelɛ dɔɔ 'ka 'kpɛn ŋgblo ‑wlɛnle' ‑o ɛɛ?

'Duŋ‑ 'ke ‑yoo bi 'bhii‑ ‑o 'kpɛn ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwo 'zi 'waati 'la ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan laa 'e 'kpa ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi, 'ke 'bhɛ ꞊nwa wlalɛ 'ka ta 'bhɛ 'waati do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ba; 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan laa 'kaa‑ ‑za klɛgbɛya 'ɛ dɔ, 'ke 'bhɛ ꞊nwa wlalɛ 'ka ta 'ezin‑ 'yee‑ 'waati do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ba, 'bhɛ 'gbu nu ‑a 'yaangolɛ 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ mi do 'le 'bhɛ wlan ma ‑jan mu 'la 'ma zii' ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'lii 'bhɛ ma.

'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'la ‑woo ‑a 'kpee, 'mu 'kpɛn ta nu 'pwɛlɛ‑ kpataakpa. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, ‑zadɔwɛɛ 'ɛ 'kɔɔ, ‑e nu ‑a ŋgblo kulalɛ 'trɛ ma; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e nu ‑Waanbhaa' gbalɛ 'ke ‑ya pe ‑a 'gbu 'lii kpataakpa dɔɔ: «Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑o 'ka 'pleŋ‑!»

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ke 'ka ꞊klaa 'eke‑ ba 'waati 'la ba, ‑ka ‑za mu 'lɛɛ‑ 'mu ‑la klɛ: 'Ke ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔbhɔ ma 'sro ‑o 'ka do 'kpee, ‑ka 'bhɛ 'kpa; 'ke mɛɛ daan ma ‑jan do ‑o 'ka 'ke 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛ zan 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ 'wo; 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' ‑za do ‑zrɔnna 'ka 'kɛla ni, 'bhɛ zan 'bhɛ 'pe; 'ke 'ka 'kɛla sɔ wli ‑bhɛɛke' pele‑, 'bhɛ 'bhɛ 'pe; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ka 'kɛla sɔ 'bhɛ wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'ɛ 'yipele, 'bhɛ 'bhɛ 'yipe. 'Ke ‑za 'oo ‑za 'la 'bhɛ sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpaleya 'ɛ baan' 'klale ‑a ba, ‑ka 'bhɛɛ‑ klɛ.
'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o wli 'pele, waa 'kanlɛ‑ mɛɛ plɛ, mɛɛ yaga ta; 'duŋ‑ ‑wa klɛ do do 'eke‑ blaan, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'ɛ 'yipe mi 'ɛ ‑srɔɔwo' 'ka 'pleŋ‑.

'Ke 'bhɛ wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'ɛ 'yipe mi laa ‑srɔɔwolɛ 'ka 'pleŋ‑, 'bhɛ 'waati 'ɛ ba, mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa wli ‑bhɛɛke' pelɛ 'ka 'pleŋ‑. 'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ wli ‑bhɛɛke' pe, 'bhɛ 'bhɛ 'wo 'bhɛ 'gbu 'kpee ‑Waanbhaa' ni.
‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛla' janwo mu 'ɛ, 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' ‑jan ‑kpaa 'mu 'lii, waa 'kanlɛ‑ mɛɛ plɛ, mɛɛ yaga ta 'ke ‑o ‑janwo'; mɛɛ ‑vin mu 'ɛ 'mu 'mu 'trɔnkpa ‑o wojan mu 'ɛ ꞊la, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu ‑o wlan yrɛ glin.

'Ke ‑Waanbhaa' ‑za ‑zrɔnna mɛɛ 'ke ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' do ‑o ‑janwo' zii' 'bhɛ 'waati 'ɛ ba, mɛɛ 'la zan ‑yaa ‑janwo' zii' 'elwale, 'bhɛ 'laa 'mɔlɛ‑ ‑janwole 'ɛ zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya 'to 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' ‑za ‑zrɔnna 'kɛla 'bhɛ ni 'bhɛ ‑janwo'.
Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, 'ka 'kpɛn sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwole 'eke‑ blaan do do; 'kooko‑ 'ka sɔ 'eke‑ daanle‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka faŋgandɔ 'eke‑ ta 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'yi.
‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ ‑lɛlajanwole 'seŋ 'naa‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ni, 'mu dɔ klɛn 'ke 'bhɛ ‑lɛlajanwole 'seŋ Lii 'ɛ 'kpaale‑ bo ‑o ‑la.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' laa ‑kɔɔ' 'siilɛ‑ 'ke ‑kɔɔ' bo ‑za klɛyrɛ nɔɔ‑ 'kɔɔ‑ 'gbu 'win ta, 'duŋ‑ ‑e 'kɔɔ‑ 'siila‑, 'kooko‑ 'kɔɔ‑ bo yilabla 'yi.
'Bhii‑ ‑wa klɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ mu 'pleŋ‑ yrɛkpɛn‑ ꞊nɔɔ bhe.
'Ke 'ka ꞊klaa 'eke‑ ba, 'ka 'laa ‑jan 'nalɛ‑ le mu ni 'ka 'pleŋ‑, ‑o tagale bo. ‑Woo 'gbu mazina 'bhii‑ ‑a pele ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Toŋ 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

'Ke ‑o 'ke mu ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ ‑o ‑za 'ke 'yima, ‑o 'bhɛ 'yilrɔkpa ‑o ‑nɔɔ mu 'ɛ ma ‑o ba ‑lɛ ma. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑jan 'nale‑ le mu ni Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ 'pleŋ‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑janwo' ‑Waanbhaa' a 'fɛ 'ɛ ꞊la, ‑za 'lrele‑ laa 'bhɛ 'le.
‑Waanbhaa' a ‑jan 'ɛ kli 'ɛ ‑daa 'ka mu ‑la ba taa‑ ‑a wole 'ɛ ꞊tian 'ka mu do ‑kplɛn ‑la ma ɛɛ?

'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan 'kpee ma ‑yoo 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛla' janwo mi 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑a 'gbu 'kpee ‑ya 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'seŋ do ‑naa ‑a ni, 'bhɛ zan 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'mi ‑o ‑jan 'la yɔɔndɛ 'zi 'ka ni ‑gɛ, ‑Waanbhaa' wojan ‑le 'bhɛ 'le.
'Ke 'bhɛ zan laa dɔlɛ 'bhɛ ‑jan 'lɛɛ‑ ꞊la, ‑Waanbhaa' laa nu 'bhɛ zan dɔlɛ ‑titi.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑ka dɔ 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'ka pɛ 'la 'bhɛ ziglin‑ 'ka 'nii‑ 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le, 'bhɛ klɛ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛlajanwole 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le. 'Ke mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑o wli ‑bhɛɛke' 'pe zii', 'ka 'laa 'bhɛ 'saawolɛ 'bhɛ zan mu 'ɛ 'kɔɔ.
‑Ka 'ka 'pleŋza‑ 'kpɛn klɛ ‑lɛɛya' ma do do.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ŋ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'la ꞊woa 'ka ni 'ke 'ka ‑dwa ‑a ‑la, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka blɔɔle ‑o ‑a ma 'eglɔɔle, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ŋ 'bhɛ dɔ 'ka 'kpee 'ezin‑.
'Ke 'ka 'taawoa꞊ 'yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ ta 'elrele 'bhii‑ 'mi 'ka ‑daanna 'kɛle‑ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'ka sɔ gole‑ ‑za 'yi ‑a ma. 'Kebhlaale, 'ka 'ka 'kpalawoa Zesu 'yi, 'bhɛ ꞊kla bhaama za 'le.
‑O 'mi ‑daanna ‑za 'la 'le, 'mi 'ka mu ‑daanna 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le 'elwale, 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ: Krisi ‑gaa ‑kɔɔ' a ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ ma 'bhii‑ ‑a pele ‑yaa ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.
‑Wa gbaa 'ɛ ꞊bian, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑bwela gale ba ‑a gale blaan ‑yrekpaa' yaga mi 'ɛ ma, 'bhii‑ ‑a pele ‑yaa ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.
'Yee‑ Zesu bwele blaan gale ba, ‑e ‑pwɛla Kefasi ‑la ba 'pe, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ blaan, ‑e ‑pwɛla ‑yaa' ‑klaŋlanɛ ‑vin vu ta plɛ 'ɛ ba.
'Bhɛ gole ‑a ‑yi, 'ke ‑ya 'gbu zrɔnle‑ ‑a nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu ‑kɛmɛ 'soo 'ke ‑a tralapɛ 'ke mu ni 'eke‑ zi: ‑o 'ke mu ‑kla gban 'ke siɛle, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o 'ke mu ‑o ‑li 'mu ‑yrɛ ma ‑zɔn.
'Bhɛ blaan, ‑e ‑pwɛla Zaki ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ boolazi ‑e ‑pwɛla ‑yaa' winbɔwo mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba 'tɛ.
'Bhɛ 'kpɛn blaan, 'kee‑ 'pwɛle 'mi ba 'tɛ, 'mi 'la 'mi ‑o 'bhii‑ ‑nɛ 'la ‑wa ‑yaa ‑a ya bhla 'ɛ 'lɛɛ.
'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'mi ‑le ‑yaa' winbɔwo mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba mɛɛ 'fiɛntrɔnnɛ 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ waa ‑yaa sɔ 'mi 'kunle 'bhii‑ ‑yaa' winbɔwo mu 'ɛ do 'le; ‑amasrɔyi 'ŋ ‑yrɛnkpaa Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ta 'ebebele.

'Duŋ‑ 'mi ‑o 'kɛla 'le ‑zɔn 'bhɛ ‑daa ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑lileya 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ba. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑lilawoa 'mi ma 'bhɛ 'laa klɛlɛ bhaama za 'le ‑titi: 'bhɛɛ‑ drɔɔn' 'mi yewoa‑ 'ebebele 'kee‑ kan Krisi a winbɔwo mu ‑vin mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ta. 'Duŋ‑ 'naa 'bhɛ ye 'ɛ 'wolɛ‑ 'ŋ 'gbu a faŋgan‑ 'le, 'ŋ ꞊swa 'bhɛ 'wole ‑Waanbhaa' a pɛ ‑lileya 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'srɔyi.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayi', 'kee‑ ꞊kla 'mi 'le oo, 'kee‑ ꞊kla Krisi a 'winbɔwo mu ‑vin mu 'ɛ 'le oo, 'o 'kpɛn ‑o 'yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ do 'kpɔ 'ɛ 'yela‑ wo 'zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka mu 'gbu 'ka ꞊kpaa 'yela ‑yi.
'Wa 'pelawo zii' dɔɔ Krisi ‑bwela gale ba; ‑mɛla ma 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑o ‑a pe 'zi dɔɔ gbaa mu laa sɔ bwele‑ gale ba ɛɛ?
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke wlan ‑le 'bhɛ 'le dɔɔ gbaa mu laa sɔ bwele‑ gale ba, 'bhɛ bhla 'ɛ ba *Krisi 'laa bwelɛ gale ba.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke Krisi 'laa bwelɛ bi gale ba, 'bhɛ bhla 'ɛ ba 'woo‑ ‑jan 'la 'wo zii' 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke bhaama jan 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'woo 'kpa zii' bhaama za ‑la ‑yi.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'woo‑ Krisi bweza gale ba 'srɛya‑ 'la klɛ 'zi, ‑yoo 'bhii‑ 'woo‑ bhla ‑la 'kpa zii' ‑Waanbhaa' ma. ‑Amasrɔyi 'wa 'pe zii' dɔɔ ‑e Krisi ‑bwela gale ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ yaa 'bhɛ klɛlɛ.
'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ke gbaa mu laa bwelɛ gale ba, 'bhɛ bhla 'ɛ ba, Krisi 'laa bwelɛ gale ba ‑titi.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke Krisi 'laa bwelɛ gale ba; 'ka ‑o 'ka 'kpa zii' bhaama za ‑la ‑yi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'kwe 'ɛ ‑yoo ‑li 'ka 'wiiŋ‑.
'Bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ꞊kpaa Krisi 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑gaa, ‑e klɛ 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ zan mu ꞊nia ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ 'yi 'bhɛɛ‑ waa sɔ gole‑ ‑a ‑yi ‑li ‑titi.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'o 'yri 'kpale‑ 'la ‑yoo Krisi ta 'kee‑ 'kpa bi 'bhɛ ‑daŋ' ‑le 'drunyan 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ ta pɛ mu drɔŋ 'ɛ 'le, 'bhɛ bhla 'ɛ ba, ‑kɔɔ' mu ‑le ‑yrɛn ma mɛɛ mu 'le mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba.

Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, Krisi ‑bwela gale ba. Mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑gaa, ‑Waanbhaa' 'yela‑ ‑bwela gale ba 'elwale 'pe 'mu ba. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya ‑zrɔnna 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ ma, 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ gbaa mu 'ɛ nu bwelɛ gale ba 'ezin‑.
‑Amasrɔyi ga ‑wlaa 'drunyan 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi mɛɛ do ‑la klɛza ma; 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi, gbaa mu bwe gale ba mɛɛ do 'kpɔ ‑la klɛza ma 'ezin‑.

'Bhɛɛ‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn ga, ‑amasrɔyi ‑o 'kpɛn ‑o Adamu klu 'yi mu 'le, 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi, mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'kpale‑ ‑o Krisi 'yi, bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'la 'ke ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma, 'mu 'kpɛn nu 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwolɛ Krisi ‑la 'srɔyi.
'Duŋ‑ ‑o 'kpɛn 'pegee ‑waa pɛ 'waati ‑le: Krisi ‑le ꞊kla mɛɛ ꞊lwa mi 'ɛ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yee‑ blaan, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ꞊kla ‑yaa' pɛ mu 'le, 'kee‑ ꞊nwa 'waati 'la ba, 'bhɛ zan mu nu bwelɛ gale ba.

'Bhɛ gole ‑a ‑yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'drunyan 'yan yi 'ɛ nu bhɔlɛ 'tɛ. 'Bhɛ 'waati 'ɛ ba, Krisi nu ‑Setran' 'pegee 'zina mu 'ɛ ‑waa ‑kuŋliiya 'pegee ‑waa' 'seŋ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑waa' ‑glɔɔya' mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'siɛlɛ‑. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑e nu ‑bhleŋgbeya 'kpalɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan ‑o 'ke ‑Waanbhaa 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ 'le 'bhɛ 'kɔɔ.
‑Amasrɔyi Krisi nu yaalɛ ‑bhleŋgbe 'yaakpe‑ 'ɛ ta 'sani 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' 'seŋgo‑ ‑a ‑sɔɔnnii' mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le.
‑E nu ‑a ‑daŋma' ‑sɔɔnnii 'la 'bhɛ a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'siɛlɛ‑, 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke ga 'le.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, ‑a yɔɔndɛle 'la ‑yoo ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi dɔɔ:
«‑Waanbhaa' pɛ 'kpɛn ŋgblo ‑kpalaa' Zesu gaan ‑la.»
'Ke ‑wa ꞊pia dɔɔ «pɛ 'kpɛn», ‑Waanbhaa' laa ‑o 'bhɛ pɛ 'kpɛn 'ɛ ba. ‑Amasrɔyi 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑le pɛ 'kpɛn ŋgblo ‑kpalaa' Zesu gaan ‑la.

'Kee‑ ‑yaan pɛ 'kpɛn ŋgblo 'kpaalele Zesu gaan ‑la 'waati 'la ba, 'yee‑ Zesu 'la ‑yoo 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' Gbe 'ɛ 'le, ‑e nu ‑a 'gbu ŋgblo 'kpaalɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, ‑Waanbhaa' gbɛblɔɔle nu klɛlɛ pɛ 'kpɛn ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a 'kpaale‑ nu klɛlɛ bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn 'wiiŋ‑ 'tɛ.

'Ke gbaa mu laa bwe bi gale ba, mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'mu wiiŋfɛ' ‑yi ba gbaa mu ni, 'bhɛ zan mu ‑yaa nu ‑mɛ ‑la klɛlɛ ɛɛ? 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke gbaa mu 'laa bwe gale ba, ‑mɛla ma 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ mu 'mu 'gbu 'wiiŋfɛ‑ 'mu ni ɛɛ?
'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' mu 'gbu 'lɛɛ‑ ɛɛ? 'Ke gbaa mu laa bwe gale ba bi, ‑mɛla ma 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' ‑o ‑kɔɔ' 'gbu bɔ 'zi ‑yrɛn 'yi 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba ɛɛ?
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, yi 'oo yi, 'ŋ ‑si 'ɛ 'kpaakpale ‑o ga ni, wlan ‑le 'bhɛ 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka mu 'gbu ‑le 'ŋ 'wasowo pɛ 'le ‑kɔɔ' mu 'pegee ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi.

Efɛzi ‑wa 'ɛ ta mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'eyɔɔle 'bhii‑ srɔpɛ mu 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑. 'Ŋ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ ta gwledaan‑ 'woo‑ Efɛzi mu 'ɛ ba, 'kee‑ 'kpa bi 'ŋ 'bhɛ gwle 'ɛ ꞊daan bhaaplɛŋ a pɛ zi 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ zi, 'bhɛ 'trɔn 'yaa‑ nu klɛlɛ 'ke ‑mɛla ‑le ɛɛ? 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke gbaa mu laa bwe bi gale ba, 'bhɛ 'yaa‑ nu klɛlɛ 'ke bhaama za 'le. ‑E ‑yaa nu klɛlɛ 'bhii‑ ‑wa pe ‑gɔɔn 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ dɔɔ: «‑Kɔɔ' pɛbhle, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' ‑wɛɛn mi 'bhɛ ta; ‑amasrɔyi 'ke ‑kɔɔ' ‑gaa too 'ke ‑za 'kpɛn ꞊yaan.»
'Ka 'laa 'ka 'gbu 'yinilɛ ‑titi! ‑Amasrɔyi 'mi pe dɔɔ: «'Ke 'ka 'pegee mɛɛ ‑yɔɔ' mu 'taawo‑ 'eke‑ zi, ‑o zi ‑yɔɔ' bɔ 'ka gaan ‑la.»
‑Ka 'ka yakla‑ dula‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'ploo‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛle ma, ‑amasrɔyi 'ka 'pleŋ‑ mu 'ɛ 'ke mu laa ‑Waanbhaa' dɔ ‑titi‑. 'Ŋ 'bhɛ 'pe zii' 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑yraladɔ maza 'le 'ka mu 'gbu ma.
'Mi 'gbu 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ mɛɛ 'ke nu 'mi 'lrɔkpalɛ dɔɔ: «Gbaa mu bwe gale ba 'nale‑ ‑a ma ɛɛ? 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'flɛ ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ ‑dele nu klɛlɛ ‑o ma ɛɛ?»
‑Za 'yaango‑ kle! 'Kee pɛbhɛ do ꞊bwa 'trɛ 'yi, 'ke yaa galɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e bɔn 'elwale 'pe, ‑e sɔ bhɔle‑ ɛɛ?
'E pɛbhɛ 'la bɔ 'trɛ 'yi, 'kee‑ ꞊kla *ble bhɛ 'le oo, 'kee‑ ꞊kla pɛ 'tɔle‑ pɛbhɛ 'bhɛ 'le, 'yaa klɛ 'bhii‑ 'ya ‑a diiŋ 'ɛ si 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e 'bhɛ sɔ 'trɛ 'yi.
'E pɛbhɛ 'la bɔ 'trɛ 'yi, 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a zi 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ 'a klɛ ‑yri diiŋ ‑glɔɔn 'la 'le 'bhɛ 'a klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le. ‑E pɛbhɛ 'kpɛn do do wlata ‑yri diiŋ ‑la klɛ.

Nii‑ ‑o 'trɛ ta pɛ mu 'la 'yi 'mu 'flɛ mu 'ɛ gole 'eke‑ ma: bhaaplɛŋ mu 'flɛ ‑o 'eta‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'trɛ ma wi mu a pɛ 'flɛ ‑o 'eta‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ maannɛ‑ mu a pɛ 'flɛ ‑o 'eta‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ kaa mu a pɛ 'flɛ ‑o 'eta‑ 'ezin‑.
Laflɛ' 'yi pɛ mu 'flɛ ‑o 'eta‑; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'trɛ ta pɛ mu 'flɛ ‑o 'eta‑. Laflɛ' 'yi pɛ mu ‑lregbɛya 'ɛ 'bhɛ gole ‑o 'trɛ ta pɛ mu ‑lregbɛya 'ɛ ma.
‑Yretɛbhɛ a pɛ ‑lregbɛya ‑o 'eta‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ laanima mlɛ a pɛ ‑lregbɛya ‑o 'eta‑; 'bhɛɛ‑ mlɛklɛnnɛ mu a pɛ ‑lregbɛya ‑o 'eta‑; 'ali‑ mlɛklɛnnɛ mu ‑lregbɛya 'ɛ gole ‑o 'eke‑ ma.
Gbaa mu bweza 'ɛ gale ba 'ɛ nu klɛlɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑ 'ezin‑. 'Ke ‑o gbaa 'ɛ ꞊bian, ‑yoo 'bhii‑ pɛbhɛ 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑, ‑e bɔn. 'Duŋ‑ 'kee‑ ‑bwela gale ba, yaa nu galɛ ‑li ‑titi.
Gbaa 'ɛ ‑a bin bhla zi ‑yoo 'eyɔɔle, 'bhɛɛ‑ faŋgan‑ 'laa ‑o ‑a ta. 'Duŋ‑ 'kee‑ ‑bwela gale ba, ‑e klɛ 'elrele, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e klɛ 'eglɔɔle 'ezin‑.

Gbaa 'ɛ ‑a bin bhla zi, ‑yoo 'ke 'flɛ 'pegee so bhaama ‑la ‑le. 'Duŋ‑ 'kee‑ ‑bwela gale ba, ‑e nu klɛlɛ 'flɛ 'la 'ke Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ gbɛblɔɔle ‑o 'bhɛ ta 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le. 'Ke bhaaplɛŋ zru maza gbɛblɔɔle ‑o ‑kɔɔa' 'trɛ ta 'flɛ 'ɛ ta, Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ gbɛblɔɔle nu klɛlɛ ‑kɔɔa' laflɛ' 'yi 'flɛ 'ɛ ta 'ezin‑.
Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, ‑a pele ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi dɔɔ:
«‑Waanbhaa' bhaaplɛŋ ‑lwa 'la ꞊kla 'ke ‑o 'bhɛ sii
Adamu,
‑ya nii‑ ‑wlaa 'bhɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑kla 'ke bhaaplɛŋ do 'le.»
'Duŋ‑ Adamu boolazi mi 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke Krisi 'le bhe, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke Lii 'la bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'ɛ na mɛɛ ni 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le.
Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ‑e 'flɛ drɛɛ 'la klɛ, yaa 'bhɛ klɛlɛ 'elwale 'pe, 'duŋ‑ ‑o bhaaplɛŋ 'flɛ bhaamale 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ꞊kla 'elwale 'pe. 'Bhɛɛ‑ Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ‑e 'flɛ drɛɛ 'la klɛ 'bhɛ nu 'bhɛ blaan 'tɛ.
Adamu 'la ꞊kla 'ke bhaaplɛŋ ‑lwa 'ɛ 'le, ‑o 'bhɛ ꞊kla 'ke 'trɛ bwe ‑la ‑le; 'duŋ‑ Adamu plɛ mi 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑daa laflɛ' ma.

'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'ke 'trɛ pɛ 'le, 'mu 'pwɛle‑ ‑o 'ke Adamu 'la ‑o 'bhɛ ꞊kla 'ke 'trɛ bwe 'le 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan ‑daa laflɛ' ma, ‑yoo gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'ke ‑yaa' pɛ 'le 'mu nu klɛlɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑.
'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi, ‑o mɛɛ 'la zan ꞊kla 'ke 'trɛ bwe 'le 'bhɛ ‑le Adamu 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' ‑o 'bhɛ bhɔɔma 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ boolazi Zesu 'la ‑daa laflɛ' 'yi, 'kɔɔ‑ nu klɛlɛ 'bhɛ bhɔɔma 'le 'ezin‑.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑jan 'la 'wo zii' 'bhɛ 'yi ‑le ‑gɛ: ‑kɔɔ' 'laa sɔ gele‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑bhleŋgbeya ‑wa 'ɛ ta ‑kɔɔa' 'trɛ ta 'flɛ 'ɛ 'le ‑kɔɔ' ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' yiɛn 'le ‑kɔɔ' 'yi. ‑Kɔɔ' 'flɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke bɔn pɛ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'laa sɔ bole‑ ‑kɔɔ' bogbɛya 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'la ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma, 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwo‑.
'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑za tagaanle do ‑la ‑yipele 'ka ni dɔɔ: ‑Kɔɔ' 'kpɛn 'laa nu galɛ, 'duŋ‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'kpɛnsee ma nu bɔɔlɛ,

‑lɛyan' do 'kpɔ 'bhii‑ ‑yrɛkwlan do bɔle gbɛɛn‑, 'ke ‑o ‑klɛloŋ' boolazi mi 'ɛ ꞊pian 'waati 'la ba. 'Ke ‑wa ꞊pian 'waati 'la ba, gbaa mu nu bwelɛ gale ba 'flɛ drɛɛ 'le 'mu ma, 'bhɛ 'flɛ drɛɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'laa sɔ bɔnle‑ ‑titi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' mu mɛɛ ‑yrɛ male mu 'ɛ, ‑kɔɔ' mu ma nu bɔɔlɛ 'flɛ drɛɛ 'le ‑kɔɔ' ma.

‑Amasrɔyi 'flɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑o ‑kɔɔ' ma, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke bɔnpɛ 'le. ‑Yoo 'ke ‑za 'le 'ke 'bhɛ ‑le mabɔɔ 'pe, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ klɛ 'flɛ drɛɛ 'la 'ke 'bhɛ 'laa sɔ bɔnle‑ ‑li ‑titi 'bhɛ 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'yee‑ 'flɛ 'la ‑yoo 'ke gapɛ 'le, 'yele‑ mabɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ yaa klɛ gapɛ 'le ‑li 'sekeseke.

'Yee‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'flɛ 'la ‑yoo 'ke bɔnpɛ 'le, 'ke ‑a mabɔɔla 'waati 'la ba 'kɛla 'bhɛ 'laa bɔn ‑titi 'bhɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'yee‑ 'la ‑yoo 'ke gapɛ 'le, ‑e mabɔɔla 'kɛla 'bhɛ 'laa ga ‑titi 'bhɛ 'le, 'ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla 'tɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑jan 'la yɔɔndɛle ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi 'bhɛ 'lɛ nu 'sɔlɛ‑, 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ:
«‑O 'seŋgwa‑ 'ke ga 'le 'egbɛnɛle, 'bhɛɛ‑ ga 'truŋwoa꞊ 'feŋfeŋ!»
«'Ee ga! 'Yaa‑ mɛɛ ‑baliwo 'seŋ 'ɛ ‑yoo 'naa‑ ‑a ma ɛɛ?
'Yaa‑ mɛɛ dɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ ‑yoo 'naa‑ ɛɛ?»
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑ka 'bhɛ ‑glin doo! Mɛɛ dɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'la ‑yoo ga 'yi 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'ɛ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ a pɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'bhɛ da 'toŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yi.
'Duŋ‑ ‑kɔɔ' ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔbhɔ! ‑Amasrɔyi 'yele‑ gwle ŋgblo ꞊naa ‑kɔɔ' ni ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ ta Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'ɛ 'srɔyi!

‑E klɛlawoa 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu 'la ‑za sɔ 'ŋ ni 'egbɛnɛle, ‑ka dɔ 'eglɔɔle, 'ka 'laa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi 'bhɛ go ‑titi. 'Ka ‑o Mɛɛzan a ye 'la 'wo zii' bhe, ‑ka ge 'bhɛ 'wole‑ 'ɛ zi 'taŋii, 'ke 'kaa kpa 'ka ŋgblo ‑yi 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑o ye 'la 'wo zii' 'yee‑ Mɛɛzan ni, 'bhɛ 'laa nu bolɛ bhaama.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ka nu ‑gɔli' 'la 'kpalɛ‑ 'eke‑ ta ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'la ‑woo Zeruzalɛmu ‑wa 'ɛ ta 'mu ni, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑a zi' 'bhii‑ 'ka dɔ klɛn 'ke 'ka 'a klɛ 'bhii‑ 'an ꞊pia Galasi 'klɛɛn 'yi Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ni dɔɔ ‑wa klɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ bhe.

‑Gbɛɛyi' 'tɔle‑ ‑gbɛɛyi' 'bhɛ 'yrekpaa‑ ‑lwa mi 'ɛ ma, 'ka 'kpɛn do do gbɛ sɔ ‑gɔli' yɛkɛ‑ 'la 'srɔɔwole ta, ‑ka 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kpa 'eke‑ ta 'edaŋma; 'kooko‑ 'ka 'laa nu 'ŋ 'nule‑ 'ɛ magbɛnlɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑gɔli' 'kpale‑ san 'tɛ 'eke‑ ta 'mi 'yrɛ ma.
'Ke 'mi ꞊nwa 'ka ba 'waati 'la ba, 'ka mu 'gbu nu mɛɛ mu makunlɛ 'ka ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi nu 'lɛtrɛ 'kpalɛ‑ 'mu 'kɔɔ; 'kooko‑ 'mu ge 'ka ‑gɔli' 'la ꞊kpaa 'eke‑ ta 'bhɛ 'le Zeruzalɛmu Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ni.
'Ke waa sɔ gele‑ 'mi blaan, 'mi nu 'kpalɛ‑ ‑o ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o ge 'bhɛ 'taa 'ɛ ta 'eke‑ zi.
'Mi nu 'kanlɛ‑ Masedwani 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi 'pe, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ ge 'ka ba ye, ‑amasrɔyi 'ŋ nu 'kanlɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi.

‑Dɔke' 'ŋ nu bolɛ 'ka ba 'waati sa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ ‑swa 'ŋ ni, 'ŋ nu ‑niinii' 'kpa 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛlɛ 'ka ba ye. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ ge 'zi yrɛ 'la ꞊nɔɔ, 'ka nu bhɔlɛ 'ŋ ba gelele 'bhɛ ꞊nɔɔ boolazi.
‑Amasrɔyi 'naa‑ ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'mi 'ŋ 'yrɛ drɔŋ bɔ 'ka ta 'ŋ 'kan bhla zi. 'Ke ‑Waanbhaa' ‑dwa ‑a ‑la, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ŋ 'waati sa klɛ 'ka ba.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'ŋ nu bolɛ Efɛzi ‑wa 'ɛ ta ‑gɛ 'ke 'bhɛ ge 'tɛnlɛ‑ Pantekɔti 'fɛti 'waati 'ɛ ma.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, ‑Waanbhaa' a ye 'ɛ 'wo 'waati ‑gbɛnɛ 'ɛ ꞊bhwa ‑a ꞊nɔɔ; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'sɔɔnnii mu 'ɛ 'pale‑ ‑o ‑a nɔɔ‑ 'ebebele.
'Ke Timote ꞊nwa 'ka ba, ‑kaa 'cieya‑ klɛ 'elrele gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma, 'kooko‑ ‑gblaan 'laa klɛ ‑a ‑yi 'ka 'pleŋ‑; ‑amasrɔyi ‑yoo Mɛɛzan Krisi a ye do 'kpɔ 'ɛ 'yela‑ wo 'zi 'bhii‑ 'mi gbɛɛn‑.
Mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ‑a mavɛɛlɛ! ‑Ka bhɔ ‑a ba 'kee‑ ge ‑yaa' 'taa 'ɛ ta 'edɔɔle; 'kooko‑ ‑e nu 'tɛnlɛ‑ 'mi ma ‑gɛ, 'mi 'pegee 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ 'woo‑ ‑a magbɛn 'zi.

‑Kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Apolɔsi, 'mi 'bhɛ 'liala‑ gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma dɔɔ 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ 'ke mu ge 'pwɛ 'ka ta ye; 'duŋ‑ yaa dɔlɛ ‑a ‑la 'kee‑ ge 'saanibhe. 'Duŋ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ 'seŋ ꞊kla ‑a ni yi 'la 'le, ‑e nu gelɛ 'ka ba ye.
‑Ka 'ka 'yrɛkpa 'ka 'gbu ba 'elrele, ‑ka dɔ 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'ka 'kpale‑ bo ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka dɔ 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'ka faŋgandɔ 'ka 'gbu ta.
‑Ka ‑za 'tɔle‑ ‑za 'bhɛ klɛ 'ke 'sɔniya 'le 'ka 'yi.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ka Sitefanasi 'pegee ‑yaa' 'fa ‑la mu 'ɛ dɔ: 'wole‑ ꞊kla Zesu 'yi mu ‑lwa mu 'le Akayi 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi. ‑O 'gbu yewoa‑ ‑o zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le 'ke ‑o bhɔ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'ɛ ba.
‑Ka 'ka ŋgblo 'kpala 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ ‑glɔɔn mu ‑lɛɛ ꞊la, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'ka ŋgblo 'kpala 'ezin‑ 'bhɛ 'yansi mɛɛ mu 'la 'mu ‑o yewo 'zi ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'bhii‑ 'woo‑ gbɛɛn‑ 'mu ꞊la.
Sitefanasi 'pegee Fɔɔtunatusi, 'bhɛɛ‑ Akayikusi 'nulawoa 'mi ‑din, 'bhɛ ꞊swa 'mi ni 'egbɛnɛle. ‑O ꞊kla 'ka blaantazɛn 'le 'ŋ ‑din ‑gɛ.
‑O 'mi zrukpalaa gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, ‑o 'ka mu zrukpalaa 'ezin‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑. ‑Ka 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ klɛza ‑lrele' mu 'ɛ dɔ.

Azi 'klɛɛn 'yi Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'ka 'pubwa‑. 'Bhɛɛ‑ Akilasi 'pegee Prisili, 'bhɛ 'pegee Zesu 'yi mu 'la kla 'eke‑ ba ‑waa' 'fɛ 'ɛ ꞊la, 'mu 'kpɛn 'ka 'pubwa‑ gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma Mɛɛzan Zesu 'tɔ 'yi.
'Ka nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'la 'kpɛn ‑o ‑gɛ, 'mu 'ka 'pubwa‑. ‑Ka 'eke‑ 'pubɔ‑ 'ke 'ka 'eke‑ ‑tuubɔ' 'bhii‑ nɛɛnɛ‑ ma do mu.
'Mi 'gbu Pɔlu ‑le 'sɛwɛbhɛ mu 'lɛɛ‑ yɔɔndia‑ 'ŋ 'gbu gbɛ ma: «'Mi Pɔlu 'ka 'pubwa‑.»
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ke Mɛɛzan Zesu ‑za 'laa sɔ mɛɛ 'la zan ni, 'daŋgan ‑o 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ ma! «
». 'Bhɛ 'yi ‑le dɔɔ: Mɛɛzan Krisi, nu!
Bhaa Mɛɛzan Zesu ‑li 'ka ma!
'Ka 'kpɛn ‑za sɔ 'mi ni ‑kɔɔ' 'pegee Zesu Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi.
II Corinthians: 'Mi Pɔlu 'la ‑e ꞊swa ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'ke ‑yoo 'ŋ makun, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑yoo 'ŋ klɛ Zesu Krisi a winbɔwo mi 'le; 'mi 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Timote ‑le 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpa zii' 'ka ni. Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'la ‑woo Korɛnti ‑wa 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑yaa' mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'la 'kpɛn ‑o Akayi 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi, 'woo‑ 'yee‑ 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpa zii' 'mu ‑la 'kpɛn ni.
Bhaa ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi ‑li 'ka ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o yilabla na 'ka ni.

‑Kɔɔ' ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔbhɔ, 'yele‑ ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi a ‑Waanbhaa' 'le 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑a Dɛ 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'yele‑ ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ 'la ‑kɔɔ' 'yrɛnkla‑ a ma 'bhɛ 'le, 'bhɛ 'pegee‑ Waanbhaa' 'la faŋgandɔ ‑kɔɔ ta 'yele‑ 'bhɛ 'le.
'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' zruwla ‑kɔɔ' 'kpee ‑kɔɔa' ‑yrɛn mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yi. ‑E 'bhɛ klɛ ‑kɔɔ' mu ni, 'kooko‑ ‑kɔɔ' mu sɔ zruwlale mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ‑yrɛn ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'bhle zii' 'mu 'kpee 'ezin‑.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, Krisi ‑yrɛn mu꞊bhla ‑kɔɔ' mu ni 'ebebele gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, ‑Waanbhaa' 'duŋ‑ nu zruwlalɛ ‑kɔɔ' mu 'kpee 'egbɛnɛle 'bhɛɛ‑ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi Krisi 'srɔyi.

'Ke 'woo‑ ‑yrɛn mu bhle 'zi, 'bhɛ ‑yrɛn mu 'ɛ 'mu ‑o 'ke zruwlapɛ 'le 'ka mu 'kpee, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka mu go pɛ 'le ‑za 'yi. 'Ke ‑Waanbhaa' zruwlaa‑ 'o mɔɔ 'kpee, ‑e 'bhɛ klɛ 'zi, 'kooko‑ 'o mɔɔ sɔ zruwlale 'ka mu 'kpee, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka mu sɔ 'o ta ‑yrɛn mu 'ɛ yɛkɛ‑ 'yikunle 'ka zrubakpaale 'le.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'o 'kpale‑ 'la ‑yoo 'ka 'yi, 'bhɛ ‑o 'eglɔɔle. ‑Amasrɔyi 'wa 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'ke 'ka 'waa‑ ‑yrɛn mu 'ɛ 'ke ꞊bhla, ‑Waanbhaa' nu 'bhɛ yɛkɛ‑ zruwlalɛ 'ka 'kpee 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi 'ezin‑.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑o ‑yrɛn ‑glɔɔn mu 'la ꞊bhla *Azi 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi, 'woo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ka 'mu dɔ: ‑o ‑yrɛn ‑kpaa 'o ta 'eyɔɔle 'kee‑ kan ‑a ‑daŋ' ta, 'fɔ 'o 'yri 'laa ‑yaa ‑li ‑a ta 'bhii‑ 'o nu bolɛ 'o 'yrɛ ma.

'O mɔɔ 'gbu 'kpee ma 'o ga bhla 'ɛ ꞊bhwa. 'Bhɛ 'kla‑ 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'kooko‑ 'waa 'o kpa 'ezin‑ ‑li 'o 'gbu 'yi, 'duŋ‑ 'kooko‑ 'woo 'kpa ‑Waanbhaa' 'la 'bhɛ gbaa mu bwe gale ba 'bhɛ do ‑kplɛn ‑la ‑yi.

'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑le 'o ‑gwa 'bhɛ ga ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'yi; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yele‑ nu 'o golɛ 'ezin‑ 'bhɛ 'yansi ‑za ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ 'yi. Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, 'o 'yri ‑o ‑a ta 'bhii‑ ‑e nu 'o golɛ 'ezin‑ 'bhɛ 'yansi ‑za ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ 'yi.

'Ka mu 'gbu ‑o 'ka 'seriwo zii' 'ezin‑ 'waa‑ ‑za ma. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, mɛɛ ‑bebe ‑o 'seri mu 'la klɛ 'zi 'o ba zayi', ‑Waanbhaa' nu 'mu 'lɛkunlɛ, 'kooko‑ 'kee‑ ‑yaa' ‑lileya 'ɛ ‑zrɔnna 'o ni, mɛɛ ‑bebe mu nu a 'pubɔlɛ 'bhɛ ‑zayi' 'waa‑ ‑za ma.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'woo baa ‑za 'la 'yi 'bhɛ ‑le ‑gɛ: 'o 'gbu zru 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o ‑a pe 'zi 'o ni dɔɔ 'o 'taawoa꞊ 'drunyan 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'o 'taawoa꞊ 'ka mu 'gbu ba ‑yrɛ ta, 'o 'kpee 'fleele‑ 'pegee 'o zru do 'le; 'bhɛ 'kpee 'fleeleya 'ɛ 'pegee 'o zru klɛle do 'ɛ 'mu 'yaa‑ da 'zi ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ba. 'Duŋ‑ 'o 'bhɛ ꞊kla ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lilawoa 'o ma 'bhɛɛ‑ 'srɔyi, 'bhɛ 'laa dalɛ bhaaplɛŋ a pɛ ‑zadɔleya ba.

Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, 'waa‑ 'lɛtrɛ mu 'ɛ 'yi, 'waa ‑o ‑za 'bhɛɛke do 'kpɔ yɔɔndɛ 'zi 'ka ni, 'ke yaa 'e go 'ka ‑o 'kɛla tape 'zi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka 'kɛla 'yima zii' 'mu ‑la ba. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'mi 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ 'ka nu ‑a ‑yimalɛ kplankplan 'ke ‑a ‑lɛyan' ‑a ma.
'Bhii‑ 'kaa 'ke 'yimaa‑ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ dɔɔ: Mɛɛzan Zesu 'nu yi 'ɛ 'le, 'o nu 'o ‑baalɛ' 'ka mu 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka mu nu 'ka ‑baalɛ' 'o mɔɔ 'yi 'ezin‑.

'Ŋ 'kpale 'la 'yaa‑ ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ 'ka 'kpeejan‑ ‑yaa 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'ŋ ge ‑trɛɛ 'ka ba ye 'elwale 'pe, 'sani‑ 'ŋ ge Masedwani, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'niina‑ bhla 'ɛ zi Masedwani, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ nu 'kanlɛ‑ 'ezin‑ 'ka ba ye, 'kooko‑ 'ka bhɔ 'ŋ ba 'ke 'ŋ sɔ gele‑ 'tɛnlɛ‑ Zude 'klɛɛn 'ɛ ma. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ nu ‑Waanbhaa' a 'duma 'ɛ 'nalɛ‑ 'ka ni ganyan‑ plɛ.

'Ŋ 'kpale 'la 'yaa‑ ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ 'ka 'kpeejan‑ ‑yaa 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'ŋ ge ‑trɛɛ 'ka ba ye 'elwale 'pe, 'sani‑ 'ŋ ge Masedwani, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'niina‑ bhla 'ɛ zi Masedwani, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ nu 'kanlɛ‑ 'ezin‑ 'ka ba ye, 'kooko‑ 'ka bhɔ 'ŋ ba 'ke 'ŋ sɔ gele‑ 'tɛnlɛ‑ Zude 'klɛɛn 'ɛ ma. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ nu ‑Waanbhaa' a 'duma 'ɛ 'nalɛ‑ 'ka ni ganyan‑ plɛ.

'Naa 'sɔlɛ‑ gelawole 'ka ba ye, ‑o sɔ ‑a pele‑ 'bhɛ ma dɔɔ 'naa 'ka ba geza 'ɛ 'kunlɛ‑ 'eglɔɔle ɛɛ? Taa‑ 'ŋ ‑za 'la 'lɛdulaa, 'ŋ 'bhɛ klɛ 'bhii‑ 'drunyan 'yi bhaaplɛŋ gbɛɛn‑ 'ke 'ŋ klɛ ‑liijan' plɛ wo mi 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'an pe dɔɔ: «‑Aani'», 'bhɛɛ‑ 'an pe 'ezin‑ «'Ɔn ɔn ɛɛ?»
‑Waanbhaa' ‑o 'ke 'ŋ 'srɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'naa ‑o 'ke ‑liijan' plɛ mi wo mi 'le 'ke 'an pe dɔɔ: «‑Aani'». 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'an pe 'ezin‑ «'Ɔn ɔn».

‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' Gbe Zesu Krisi 'la 'mi 'pegee Silivɛn 'bhɛɛ‑ Timote, 'o mɔɔ 'bhɛ 'la 'bhɛ a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ ꞊woa 'ka ba ye, 'bhɛ 'laa klɛlɛ 'ke ‑liijan' plɛ mi wo mi 'le 'ke ‑ya pe «‑Aani'» ‑jan do ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya pe «'Ɔn ɔn» 'yee‑ ‑jan do 'ɛ ma. Drɔɔn' 'ke ‑ya ꞊pia 'kɛla ma «‑Aani'», ‑e bo 'bhɛɛ‑ ta.

‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ 'liiwli‑ ‑naa bhaaplɛŋ mu ni ‑za mu 'la klɛza ta, 'yee‑ Zesu Krisi ‑le 'mu 'kpɛn 'lɛswa꞊. 'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'yela‑ 'tɔ 'ɛ 'srɔyi 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o sɔ ‑a pele‑ «Amiina». 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'o sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔbhɔle.
'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑le 'o mɔɔ 'pegee 'ka mu dɔ 'eglɔɔle. 'Yela‑ 'gbu ‑le ‑kɔɔ' mu ‑kpaa 'edaŋma ‑yaa' pɛ mu 'le.

'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑le ‑a gbɛ blaan ‑kpalaa' ‑kɔɔ' ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑le ‑kɔɔ' mu klɛ ‑yaa' pɛ mu 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ꞊wlaa ‑kɔɔ' zru mu 'ɛ 'yi. ‑E ‑kɔɔ' 'lɛtwa꞊ pɛ ‑lrele' mu 'la ba, ‑e Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ꞊kla 'mu 'yrɛ 'lɛɛ pɛ 'le.
‑Waanbhaa' ‑o 'ŋ 'srɛ 'le, 'naa dɔlɛ ‑a ‑la 'ke 'ŋ ge 'ezin‑ Korɛnti ‑wa 'ɛ ta, ‑amasrɔyi 'naa ‑yaa zi 'bhii‑ 'ŋ 'ka ta ‑yrɛn 'ɛ baankpa' 'ezin‑.

'Waa ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'o klɛ 'ka ta ‑kuŋlii mu 'le 'kpaleya a pɛ zi 'ɛ ta. ‑Amasrɔyi 'ka kli gbaanle ‑o 'eglɔɔle 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'yi. 'Duŋ‑ 'woo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'o 'pegee 'ka mu yewo 'eke‑ zi, 'kooko‑ 'ka zrukpalaa.
'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, 'mi 'gbu 'a ꞊kpaa 'ŋ 'kpee dɔɔ 'naa ‑o niinale 'ka ba ye, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'ka wlɛyisriwoza klɛ 'ezin‑.
‑Amasrɔyi 'ke 'mi 'ka wlɛyisriwoa, ‑dele nu klɛlɛ 'mi zrukpaa mi 'le ɛɛ? 'Ka mu 'la 'ka ‑o 'mi zrukpaa' pɛ 'le, 'ke 'mi 'ka mu wlɛyisriwoa, 'ka mu nu 'sɔlɛ‑ 'mi zrukpaale 'nale‑ ‑a ma ɛɛ?

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'mi 'lɛtrɛ ꞊kpaa 'ka ni 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, 'kooko‑ 'ke 'ŋ ꞊bhwa 'ka ba ye, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'ke 'mi zrukpaa pɛ le, 'mu 'laa 'mi wlɛyisriwo. 'Mi 'gbu 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ 'mi a pɛ zrukpaa' 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ezin‑ 'ka mu 'kpɛn a pɛ zrukpaa' ‑la ‑le.

Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, 'ŋ 'lɛtrɛ 'la ꞊kpaa 'ka ni, ‑a klɛ bhla 'ɛ zi, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ ‑yrɛn ‑gbɛnɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ blina‑ yiɛn ‑yaa, 'bhɛ 'pegee wisi' ‑gbɔɔ ‑gbɛnɛ ‑yaa 'ŋ 'yrɛ ta. 'Naa 'lɛtrɛ 'ɛ 'kpalɛ‑ 'ka ni 'ka wlɛyisriwo zayi', 'duŋ‑, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'kaa 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑za sɔ 'ŋ ni 'kee‑ kan ‑a ‑daŋ' ta.

'Ke mɛɛ do ꞊kla mɛɛ mu wlɛyisriwo pɛ 'le, 'bhɛ zan laa 'mi do ‑kplɛn wlɛyisriwolɛ, 'duŋ‑ 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ 'ka 'kpɛn ‑la wlɛyisriwoa bhe. 'Duŋ‑ 'ke 'naa 'kanlɛ‑ ‑a ‑daŋ' ta, 'ŋ sɔ ‑a pele‑ dɔɔ ‑e 'ka 'lɛdo‑ 'ɛ ta wlɛyisriwoa.
'Ka ‑bebe 'a ꞊kpaa do ma dɔɔ 'ka nu 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ 'krowolɛ 'krowogbɛya 'la 'yi, 'bhɛ nu 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ 'yibhɔlɛ 'bhɛ 'le.
'Bhɛɛ‑ drɔɔn', ‑ka 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ mazato, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka faŋgandɔ ‑a ta; 'kooko‑ ‑a wlɛyisriwole 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'laa kan ‑a ‑daŋ' ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ge klɛlɛ ‑a faŋgan‑ 'kanpɛ‑ le.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'mi ‑o zruwla 'zi 'ka 'kpee dɔɔ ‑kaa zrɔn 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ ni 'bhii‑ ‑a ‑za sɔ 'ka ni.
‑Amasrɔyi 'mi 'lɛtrɛ ꞊kpaa 'ka ni win 'la ma, 'bhɛ ‑le ‑gɛ dɔɔ 'mi 'ka 'yidaan‑ 'ke 'ŋ sɔ ‑a 'yaangole wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ma 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑o 'ŋ 'wojan‑ mu 'ɛ 'klɔsikun zii' ‑za mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yi.
'Ke 'ka mɛɛ 'oo mɛɛ 'la zan mazatwa, 'mi nu 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ mazatolɛ 'ezin‑. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'mi mɛɛ do mazatwa ‑za do 'yi, 'mi 'bhɛ ꞊kla 'ka mu ‑la ‑zayi', 'bhɛɛ‑ Krisi ‑o ‑kɔɔ' 'srɛ 'le.
'Bhɛ 'kpɛn win le dɔɔ 'ke ‑Setran' 'laa ‑dawli' 'kpaayrɛ‑ ‑srɔɔwo' ‑kɔɔ' gbɛ ta. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑za mu 'la klɛ ‑lrɔ ‑o ‑a ma 'o 'mu 'gbu dɔ.
'Mi 'bhɔlawoa Troasi ‑wa 'ɛ ta Krisi a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wo zayi', 'an ꞊ya 'bhii‑ Mɛɛzan ‑za mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'lɛswa꞊ gban 'ŋ 'lɛɛ 'ke 'ŋ sɔ yewole ‑a ni 'bhɛ ꞊nɔɔ.
'Duŋ‑ 'ŋ blina‑ yiɛn ‑yaa 'egbɛnɛle, ‑amasrɔyi 'ŋ 'yrɛ 'laa ‑yaa 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ Titi ma. 'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'ŋ zi ‑yrɛwole Troasi ꞊nɔɔ mu 'ɛ ma, 'ke 'ŋ gele‑ Masedwani ‑wa 'ɛ ta.

‑Waanbhaa' 'ŋcie! ‑Kɔɔ' mu 'pegee Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi, gwle ŋgblo 'la bole ‑o ‑a ni, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ezin‑ ‑kɔɔ mu a pɛ 'le 'taŋii. ‑Yoo 'o winbɔ 'kaa 'o ge Krisi dɔza 'ɛ mɛɛ mu 'kɔɔ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wo yrɛkpɛn‑ ꞊nɔɔ, 'bhɛ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ zɛn 'bhii‑ ‑lasiklɔɔ ‑gblɛn 'nrale‑ 'ɛ zɛn yrɛkpɛn‑ ꞊nɔɔ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

‑Amasrɔyi 'o ꞊kla Krisi a pɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'woo‑ 'bhii‑ Krisi a ‑lasiklɔɔ ‑gblɛn 'nrale‑ do gbɛɛn‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ni. Mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ‑bhee zi 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ni zi 'ɛ ta, 'yee‑ ‑lasiklɔɔ ‑gblɛn 'ɛ tɛn 'mu 'kpɛn ma.

Mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ni zi 'ɛ ta, 'yee‑ ‑lasiklɔɔ ‑gblɛn 'ɛ ‑yoo 'eyɔɔle 'mu yin zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e sɔ ‑o dɛle‑. 'Duŋ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ‑bhee zi 'ɛ ta, ‑a ‑gblɛn 'ɛ nra 'mu yin zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e sɔ gele 'mu ‑le ‑si 'la 'ke ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma, 'bhɛ a zi 'ɛ ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ bhaaplɛŋ 'ɛ ‑de 'gbu ‑la faŋgan‑ sɔ 'bhɛ ye ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'wole‑ ta ɛɛ?

'Duŋ‑ 'o mɔɔ 'gbu ‑le sɔ 'bhɛ ye 'ɛ 'wole, ‑amasrɔyi 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑le 'o 'winbwa‑. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'waa ‑o yaa ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wo zii' ‑gɔli' ‑glin zayi', 'bhii‑ mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑o ‑a klɛ 'zi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑. Drɔɔn' 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa 'o mɔɔ winbwa‑ 'yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'woyrɛ‑ nɔɔ‑ *Krisi 'tɔ 'yi. 'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'woo‑ ‑a wo 'zi 'o 'pegee Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'o 'kpee 'fleele‑ 'le 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ ꞊la.

'Ŋ ‑janwoa 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'bhɛ 'yi ‑le dɔɔ 'o mɔɔ 'gbu maza ‑o 'ke 'o ge 'o 'gbu zrɔn 'lɛtrɛ 'le 'o 'kɔɔ 'ka ba ye 'ezin‑ ɛɛ? 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'o ge 'ka ba ye 'o 'gbu zrɔn 'lɛtrɛ 'le 'ka ni 'bhii‑ mɛɛ 'ke mu 'a ꞊kla gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ bhe ɛɛ, taa‑ 'kaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'woo 'gbu dɔ 'lɛtrɛ 'yrɛwo 'ka ma 'ke 'o 'bhɛ zrɔn mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu ni 'bhii‑ 'woo‑ 'ke Krisi a winbɔwo mu ‑zeze 'gbu 'le ɛɛ?
'Lɛtrɛ 'la 'bhɛ 'a zrɔn 'bhii‑ 'o mɔɔ ‑o Krisi a winbɔwo mu ‑zeze mu 'gbu 'le 'bhɛ ‑le 'ka mu 'gbu 'le. ‑A yɔɔndɛle ‑o 'o zru mu 'ɛ 'yi, mɔkpɛn' sɔ ‑a dɔle‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɔkpɛn' sɔ ‑a tapele.

Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, 'ka mu 'gbu ‑le kpataakpa 'o mɔɔ zrɔn 'lɛtrɛ 'la Krisi 'bhɛ yɔɔndia‑ 'bhɛ ‑le 'waa ye 'ɛ 'srɔyi. Waa yɔɔndɛlɛ 'ke 'sɛwɛ yɔɔndɛpɛ ‑yi 'le, 'duŋ‑ ‑wa yɔɔndia‑ 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑ya ‑yrɛ ma 'bhɛ Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le. Waa yɔɔndɛlɛ vlɛpee' mu ta, 'duŋ‑ ‑wa yɔɔndia‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu ‑la zru mu 'ɛ 'yi.
'O 'kpale‑ ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑jan 'ɛ 'yi Krisi 'srɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ ꞊la.
'Waa sɔ a pele‑ dɔɔ 'bhɛ 'seŋ ‑o 'o 'gbu ni 'ke 'o 'bhɛ ye 'lɛɛ‑ wo, 'duŋ‑ 'waa‑ pɛ 'seŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛ da ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ba.

'Yele‑ 'a ꞊kla 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o mɔɔ ‑swa klɛle‑ ‑yaa' yewonɛ mu 'le ‑bhoolaya drɛɛ 'ɛ ta. 'Bhɛ ‑bhoolaya drɛɛ 'ɛ kli gbaanle laa ‑o *'Toŋ 'la ‑o 'bhɛ yɔɔndia‑ 'bhɛ ta, 'duŋ‑ 'bhɛ kli 'ɛ gbaanle ‑o Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ta. 'Toŋ 'la ‑o 'bhɛ yɔɔndia‑ 'bhɛ ge mɛɛ 'le ga a pɛ zi 'ɛ ta, 'duŋ‑ Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑si 'la 'ke ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma 'bhɛɛ‑ na mɛɛ ni.

'Toŋ 'la 'bhɛ 'sɛwɛbhɛ mu 'ɛ 'yɔɔndɛle ‑yaa vlɛpee' mu ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ 'woye‑ ‑le ‑yaa 'ke mɛɛ gelele ga a pɛ zi 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛ 'na bhla 'ɛ zi ‑Waanbhaa' 'kɔɔ Moizi ni 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a 'tɔbhɔleya ‑bhile' ‑yrayra 'ɛ 'pwɛla‑ ‑a ‑yi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ Moizi wlɛyi' 'ɛ mabɔɔla ‑asiikɔɔ Izraɛli ‑nɛ mu 'ɛ waa ‑yaa 'sɔle ‑a wlɛyi' 'ɛ ‑glinle'. 'Duŋ‑ 'bhɛ 'tɔbhɔleya ‑bhile' ‑yrayra 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'laa ‑yaa 'ke ‑mɔpɛ' 'le.

'Ke 'Toŋ 'la 'bhɛ 'woye‑ ‑le ‑yaa 'ke mɛɛ gelele ga a pɛ zi 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛ 'tɔbhɔleya ‑bhile' ‑yrayra 'ɛ 'yaa‑ 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'bhɛ 'yi 'tɛ, Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'woye‑ 'ɛ 'tɔbhɔleya ‑bhile' ‑yrayra 'ɛ gblaan ‑yi 'laa nu yalɛ‑ ‑yaa' pɛ 'ɛ ni ɛɛ?

'Toŋ 'la 'bhɛ 'woye‑ ‑le 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑kpan baalele bhaaplɛŋ ta, 'ke 'bhɛ a 'tɔbhɔleya ‑bhile' ‑yrayra 'ɛ 'yaa‑ 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑, Lii 'Weŋ 'la 'bhɛ bhaaplɛŋ ‑lɛdɔɔ' ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ 'yi, 'bhɛ a pɛ 'woye‑ 'tɔbhɔleya ‑bhile' ‑yrayra 'ɛ gblaan ‑yi 'laa nu yalɛ‑ ‑yaa' pɛ 'ɛ ni ɛɛ?
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'tɔbhɔleya 'la ꞊bhia 'elwaleta ‑sɔ 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'bhɛ 'laa ‑o 'ke ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'le 'ke ‑wa ‑kpaa ‑zɔn 'tɔbhɔleya 'la ‑gbɛnɛ 'yiya‑ ‑a ni 'yi 'bhɛ ma.

‑Amasrɔyi, 'ke 'kɛla 'yaa‑ 'ke 'kanpɛ‑ 'le 'bhɛ 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ 'yaa‑ bhi, 'kɛla 'bhɛ 'laa ‑o 'ke 'kanpɛ‑ 'le 'sekeseke, 'bhɛ a pɛ 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ yaa nu 'kanlɛ‑ 'kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke 'kanpɛ‑ 'le 'bhɛ a pɛ 'ɛ ta ɛɛ?
'O 'yrikpale ‑o 'bhɛ ta 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'waa gblaan mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'lɛɛ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'woyrɛ‑ nɔɔ‑.

'O mɔɔ laa ‑a klɛ 'bhii‑ Moizi gbɛɛn‑. ‑E sɔ ꞊klaa ‑a wlɛyi', 'kooko‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a 'tɔbhɔleya 'la 'yaa‑ ‑bhi 'zi ‑a wlɛyi', Izraɛli mu 'ɛ waa 'bhɛ 'tɔbhɔleya 'la 'yaa‑ 'ke 'kanpɛ‑ 'le 'bhɛ 'liiyrɛ‑ 'ɛ ye.

'Duŋ‑ Izraɛli mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'trɔn 'yi ‑dwa 'eglɔɔle ‑Waanbhaa' ma. ‑Amasrɔyi 'ali‑ ‑zɔn ‑li, 'ke ‑woo ‑bhoolaya gwe 'ɛ ta 'sɛwɛ 'ɛ tape 'zi, ‑yoo 'bhii‑ sɔ do 'la 'klale‑ ‑yaa Moizi ŋgblo ma 'bhɛ 'yansi ‑glɔɔn ‑la 'kpale‑ ‑o yikan' 'ɛ 'yrɛ ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ waa 'yee‑ 'sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yima‑. 'Bhɛ sɔ 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'laa sɔ gole‑ 'fɔke mɛɛ ꞊wlaa Krisi 'pegee bhaaplɛŋ mu a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi; 'yee‑ Krisi do ‑kplɛn ‑le sɔ 'bhɛ sɔ 'ɛ gole‑ mɛɛ yikan' 'ɛ 'yrɛ ta.
'Ali‑ ‑zɔn ‑li, 'ke ‑woo Moizi 'sɛwɛ mu 'la ꞊dia 'mu tape 'zi, ‑yoo 'bhii‑ sɔ 'klale ‑o yikan' 'ɛ 'yrɛ ta; 'bhɛɛ waa sɔ ‑o ‑yimale.
'Duŋ‑ ‑a pele ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi dɔɔ:
«'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan 'bhɛ zru 'ɛ 'niinaa‑ Mɛɛzan ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑dwa ‑yaa' ‑jan 'ɛ ꞊la, ‑e 'yee‑ sɔ 'ɛ go 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ yikan' 'ɛ 'yrɛ ta.»
'Duŋ‑ 'woo‑ ‑we 'zi Mɛɛzan 'la le, 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke Mɛɛzan Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ‑yoo mɛɛ 'oo mɛɛ 'la zan zru 'yi, 'bhɛ zan bo 'bhɛ 'gbu ma.

‑Kɔɔ' mu 'la 'kpɛn wlɛyi' tapwɛle ‑o, 'kɔɔ‑ mu Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' a 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ zrɔn mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ni ‑kpɔsɔɔ 'bhii‑ ‑dwaleŋ' pɛ 'kpɛn tapwɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ gbaklata. 'Bhɛ 'yi Mɛɛzan Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ‑kɔɔ' zru mu 'ɛ mabɔɔ yi 'oo yi, 'kooko‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'pwɛle‑ klɛ 'yee‑ Mɛɛzan 'le. 'Bhɛ 'yi, ‑kɔɔ' go 'tɔbhɔleya do 'yi 'ezin‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' ge 'tɔbhɔleya ‑bhɛɛke' gblaan do 'yi. Mɛɛzan Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'woye‑ 'ɛ ‑yoo 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑ bhe.
'O 'yrɛnklalawoa ‑Waanbhaa' ma, ‑e ‑yaa' ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wole‑ 'ɛ gbɛkpaa‑ 'o 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'o ‑gblɔzi' laa ga 'o ma.

Bhaaplɛŋ mu ‑yraladɔ maza mu 'la 'kpɛn klɛ gaanyi', 'woo ‑baŋgwa 'mu 'kpɛn klɛle 'yi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'waa ‑dawli' maza mu klɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑Jan 'ɛ mabɔɔ. Drɔɔn' 'woo‑ wlan 'la 'pe zii' kpataakpa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ ꞊la, 'ke wlan ‑le 'kɛle‑ oo, 'ke bhla ‑le 'kɛle‑ oo, bhaaplɛŋ 'tɔle‑ bhaaplɛŋ 'bhɛ 'bhɛ ye.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'woo‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'la 'wo zii', 'ke 'bhɛ bakanle laa ‑o kplankplan mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑yrɛ 'yi; 'bhɛ bakanle laa ‑o mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'mu 'ni zi 'ɛ ta 'mu ‑la ‑yrɛ 'yi.

'Bhɛ zan mu 'ɛ waa ‑o kpa Zesu 'yi, ‑amasrɔyi *‑Setran' 'la gbɛblɔɔle ‑o 'drunyan 'lɛɛ‑ ta, 'bhɛ ‑gblo ꞊kpaa ‑o yikan' 'ɛ 'yrɛ ta; 'kooko‑ waa sɔ Krisi a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ a 'tɔbhɔleya ‑lrele' 'ɛ 'bhigbɛya 'ɛ 'yele. 'Yee‑ Krisi ‑le 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' bhɔɔma 'ɛ 'le.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'waa ‑o ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wole‑ 'ɛ klɛ 'zi 'o 'gbu ma janwolele. 'Duŋ‑ 'woo‑ Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi a ‑Jan 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'wo zii', 'ke 'wa pe 'o 'gbu ma dɔɔ 'woo‑ 'kaa‑ yewonɛ mu 'le Zesu ‑zayi'.

‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑ya ꞊pia dɔɔ: «'Tɛbhile klɛ ‑gblo 'ɛ 'yi!» 'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' do 'kpɔ 'ɛ 'yele‑ 'tɛbhile ꞊klaa ‑kɔɔ' zru 'ɛ 'yi, 'kooko‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a 'tɔbhɔleya 'la ‑yoo ‑bhi 'zi Krisi wlɛyi', 'o 'bhɛ dɔ 'o zru mu 'ɛ 'yi.

'Bhɛ 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ dɔle 'ɛ 'o 'kɔɔ 'bhɛ ‑o 'bhii‑ ‑naflo ‑gbɛnɛ do 'la 'kpale‑ ‑o 'trɛ gbɔ mu 'yi. 'O mɔɔ 'la 'woo‑ 'bhɛ ‑naflo 'kwe 'ɛ 'si zii', faŋgan‑ 'laa ‑o 'o 'gbu ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'woo‑ 'ke 'siɛpɛ‑ 'le 'bhii‑ 'trɛ gbɔ mu gbɛɛn‑; 'kooko‑ mɔkpɛn' 'a ye 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ ‑glɔɔya' ‑gbɛnɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ da ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'laa da 'o mɔɔ 'gbu ba.
Bhaaplɛŋ mu ‑o ‑yrɛn ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn kpa zii' 'o ta; 'duŋ‑ 'o faŋgan‑ 'ɛ yaa yan. 'O zru ba 'tɛ ‑o; 'duŋ‑ 'o 'yrikpale bo ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ta.
‑Woo' 'yrɛbatɛdɔ 'zi 'ke ‑o ‑yrɛnkpa' 'o ta; 'duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' laa 'a ‑baŋgo' 'o 'yi. ‑Woo' balaa' 'trɛ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo' tafɛ; 'duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa 'o 'lawlɛn‑.

'Waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba, 'ke 'o ‑ja yrɛ 'oo yrɛ 'la ꞊nɔɔ, ‑woo' dɛyrɛ ‑la ‑glin 'zi 'bhii‑ ‑o Zesu ꞊dia gɔnɛ 'la gbɛɛn‑. 'Duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' gbɛ ‑o ta, 'kooko‑ mɔkpɛn' 'a ye 'bhii‑ Zesu ‑o ‑a ‑yrɛ ma 'o 'flɛ mu 'ɛ 'yi.
'Ali‑ 'woo‑ 'yrɛ 'la ma bhe, ‑woo 'o dɛyrɛ ‑la ‑glin 'zi 'taŋii Zesu 'tɔ 'ɛ ‑zayi'; 'kooko‑ ‑wa ye 'bhii‑ 'yee‑ Zesu ‑o ‑a ‑yrɛ ma 'o 'flɛ mu 'la 'mu ‑o 'ke gapɛ 'le bhe 'mu 'yi.
‑Woo 'o mɔɔ dɛyrɛ 'la ‑glin 'zi bhe, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'bhɛ blaan klɛ 'ka mu a pɛ bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si drɛɛ 'ɛ 'srɔɔwolele.
'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛla' janwo mi 'ɛ do 'a pia ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi dɔɔ:
«'Mi 'ŋ 'kpalawoa ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi, 'bhɛla‑ ‑zayile 'mi ‑janwoa ‑a 'tɔ 'ɛ 'yi.»
'O mɔɔ 'o 'kpalawoa ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi 'ezin‑, 'bhɛla‑ ‑zayile 'woo‑ ‑yaa' ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wo zii'.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'o 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'la Mɛɛzan Zesu ‑bwela gale ba, 'bhɛ ‑le nu 'o mɔɔ 'pegee 'yee‑ Zesu bwelɛ gale ba 'eke‑ 'yi 'ezin‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑le nu 'o mɔɔ 'pegee 'ka mu 'pwɛlɛ‑ 'eke‑ zi Zesu 'lɛɛ.

'Woo‑ ‑za mu 'la 'kpɛn 'yikun zii', 'o 'mu klɛ 'zi 'ka mu ‑la ‑zayi', 'kooko‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yaa' ‑lileya 'ɛ zrɔn mɛɛ ‑bebe ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, mɛɛ ‑bebe nu 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔlɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a 'tɔ 'ɛ baan' nu bhɔlɛ.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'waa ‑o 'o 'gbu ‑gblɔzi' gale‑. 'Ali‑ 'ke 'o 'flɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑o 'siɛ zii', faŋgan‑ drɛɛ ‑le dɔ 'zi 'o 'nii‑ 'ɛ ta yi 'oo yi.

‑Amasrɔyi ‑yrɛn 'fiɛntrɔnnɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑o ‑kɔɔ' ta ‑zɔn, 'bhɛ nu 'kanlɛ‑. 'Bhɛ ‑yrɛn 'ɛ blaan' nu klɛlɛ 'ke 'tɔbhɔleya ‑gbɛnɛ do 'la 'ke ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma ‑titi 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le; 'bhɛ gblaan ‑yiya' 'yee‑ ‑kɔɔ' ta ‑yrɛn 'fiɛntrɔnnɛ 'lɛɛ‑ ni.

'Bhɛ 'yi bhe, mɛɛ pɛ mu 'la ye ‑a ‑yrɛ 'le, 'o mɔɔ laa ‑o 'mu ‑glin 'zi. 'Duŋ‑ mɛɛ laa pɛ mu 'la ye ‑a ‑yrɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'mu ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' ba, 'o mɔɔ ‑yrɛ ‑o 'mu ‑la ta. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑o pɛ mu 'la ye ‑o ‑yrɛ 'le, 'mu ‑o 'ke 'kanpɛ‑ 'le; 'duŋ‑ mɛɛ laa pɛ mu 'la ye ‑a ‑yrɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'mu ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' ba, 'mu 'laa kan ‑titi.

'Flɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'o ma 'trɛ ta ‑gɛ, 'bhɛ ‑o 'bhii‑ sɔ 'kpaa do gbɛɛn‑. 'Wa 'yaango‑ dɔɔ 'ke 'bhɛ 'siɛla‑ 'waati 'la ba, 'fɛ 'lrele‑ do dɔle ‑o 'o 'lɛɛ laflɛ' 'yi. Bhaaplɛŋ mu laa 'bhɛ 'fɛ 'ɛ dɔlɛ ‑o gbɛ 'le. 'Duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑le 'bhɛ ‑dwa. 'Bhɛ 'fɛ 'ɛ yaa sɔ 'siɛle ‑titi.
'Woo‑ 'saanigɛ 'drunyan 'la 'yi ‑gɛ bhe, 'woo wisi' zii', ‑amasrɔyi ‑a ‑lrɔ ‑gbɛnɛ 'gbu ‑o 'o ma 'ke 'o ge ‑Waanbhaa' ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'waa‑ 'flɛ drɛɛ 'ɛ kla 'o ta.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ke 'o 'bhɛ 'flɛ drɛɛ ꞊klaa 'o ta 'waati 'la ba, 'o tafleŋ‑ 'laa nu bolɛ.

'Ke 'woo 'waa‑ 'trɛ ta 'flɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi 'waati 'la ba, yi 'oo yi 'trɛbhɔ 'pegee wisile ‑le 'o ta 'ke 'kwe 'le. Yaa klɛlɛ 'bhii‑ 'flɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑le 'o ma 'trɛ 'lɛɛ‑ ta ‑gɛ, 'woo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'o 'bhɛ go 'o ma. 'Duŋ‑ 'woo ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'flɛ drɛɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑o laflɛ' 'yi, 'o 'bhɛɛ‑ kla 'o ta; 'kooko‑ 'waa‑ 'trɛ ta 'flɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke gapɛ 'le, ‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ tabɔɔ 'ke 'flɛ drɛɛ 'la 'ke ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ 'si 'ɛ ma ‑titi 'bhɛ 'le.
‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑le 'bhɛ 'flɛ drɛɛ 'ɛ ꞊kla 'o ni. ‑E Lii 'Weŋ 'la ꞊naa 'o ni, ‑e 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑dwa ‑za 'wlan mu 'la ‑e nu 'mu klɛlɛ 'o ni laflɛ' 'yi, 'mu 'yrɛ 'lɛɛ pɛ le.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, yi oo yi, 'woo zru dɔ 'eglɔɔle. 'Wa 'yaango‑ 'ke 'o ꞊bwa 'o 'flɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi 'trɛ 'lɛɛ‑ ta ‑gɛ, 'o 'pleŋgole ‑o Mɛɛzan ma 'egbɔɔnle.
'Woo‑ 'taawo zii' pɛ 'la 'o 'kpale‑ ‑o 'bhɛ 'yi 'bhɛɛ‑ zi, 'duŋ‑ 'waa‑ ‑o 'taawo zii' pɛ 'la 'o 'bhɛ ye 'o 'yrɛ 'le 'bhɛ zi.
Yi 'oo yi, 'woo‑ zru dɔ 'eglɔɔle. 'Woo ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'flɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'o ma 'trɛ 'lɛɛ‑ ta ‑gɛ, 'o go 'bhɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o ge bolɛ Mɛɛzan Krisi ‑din.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile', 'ke 'o ‑gaa oo, 'ke 'o ꞊bwa 'e 'yrɛ ma oo, 'woo‑ dɔ 'zi 'eglɔɔle, 'kooko‑ 'o ‑za sɔ 'yee‑ Mɛɛzan ni 'elwale 'pe.

‑Amasrɔyi ‑kɔɔ' 'kpɛn nu gelɛ dulalɛ Krisi a ‑klu 'ɛ 'lɛ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e nu ‑kɔɔ' 'kpɛn 'kitikanlɛ; 'kooko‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'kpɛn do do ‑za 'oo ‑za 'la ꞊kla 'drunyan ta ‑gɛ, 'kee‑ ‑kla ‑za 'wlan 'le oo, 'kee‑ ‑kla ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'le oo, ‑kɔɔ' 'bhɛ ma ‑sra 'srɔɔwo‑.

'Wa 'yaango 'bhii‑ ‑gblaanle' Mɛɛzan ‑lɛɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑za 'wlan 'le, 'bhɛla ‑zayile 'wa klɛ 'zi gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma 'ke ‑yaa' ‑jan 'ɛ dɔ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑wa ye 'ke wlan 'le. 'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'o mɔɔ 'gbu dɔ kpataakpa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ 'ka mu 'gbu 'o mɔɔ dɔ 'ezin‑ 'elrele 'ka 'gbu 'kpee.

'Waa ‑o 'bhɛ 'pe zi, 'kooko‑ 'woo 'gbu 'tɔbhɔ‑ 'ka 'yrɛ ta 'ezin‑, 'duŋ‑ 'woo‑ 'bhɛ 'pe zii' win 'la ma 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ 'ke 'ka sɔ 'ka 'wasowole 'o 'yi 'o 'woye‑ 'ɛ ‑zayi'. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'gbu 'wasowo zii' 'kɛla 'yi 'pɛɛlii‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'ke waa ‑o 'bhɛ 'le ‑o 'gbu 'kpee; 'ka sɔ ‑jan zikpale 'bhɛ zan mu 'ɛ ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ka 'bhɛ dɔ.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ke mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑o 'o 'ye zii' 'bhii‑ ‑kwanii' mu, 'duŋ‑ 'waa ‑o 'bhɛ 'le, ‑Waanbhaa' a ye 'ɛ ‑zayi'. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑woo' ꞊kwan mɛɛ kplankplan mu 'le, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ka mu 'gbu ‑la ma 'ke ‑trɔn 'le.

‑Amasrɔyi 'o ‑za ꞊swa Krisi ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'bhɛ 'a klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o ‑za 'kpɛn klɛ 'sɔniya 'le 'o 'yi. 'O mɔɔ 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ 'ke 'yee‑ do ‑kplɛn ‑gaa ‑kɔɔ' 'kpɛn ‑zayi', 'bhɛ bhla 'ɛ ba, ‑yoo 'bhii‑ ‑kɔɔ' mu 'kpɛn 'pegee 'yee‑ ‑gaa 'eke‑ 'yi.
‑E ‑gaa ‑kɔɔ' mu 'kpɛn ni, 'kooko‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'mu ‑yrɛ ma, 'bhɛ zan mu 'laa 'taawo 'mu 'gbu win ta 'ezin‑; 'duŋ‑ ‑o 'taawo Krisi 'la ‑gaa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ ‑bwela, 'bhɛ a pɛ zru maza 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ta.

'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi 'saanigɛ, 'waa mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ kun ‑li bhaaplɛŋ a pɛ 'kungbɛya drɔŋ 'ɛ 'yi. 'Ali‑ 'ke 'elwaleta ‑sɔ 'o Krisi ‑kwan bhaaplɛŋ a pɛ 'kungbɛya drɔŋ 'ɛ 'yi, 'duŋ‑ 'saanigɛ 'waa‑ kun ‑li 'bhɛ 'kungbɛya 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑.
‑Amasrɔyi 'ke mɛɛ do 'pegee Krisi 'kpale‑ ‑o do ma, 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ zru 'ɛ mabɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e klɛ mɛɛ drɛɛ 'le. ‑A klɛza gwe mu 'ɛ 'mu 'truŋwo‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a klɛza mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛ 'edrɛɛle 'tɛ.
'Bhɛ 'kpɛn da ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ba, 'yele‑ ‑kɔɔ' mu 'pegee 'yee‑ 'gbu ꞊kpaa do ma Krisi 'srɔyi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'yele‑ 'yee‑ 'pegee bhaaplɛŋ a 'kpaledomaya ye 'ɛ gbɛkpaa‑ 'o mɔɔ 'kɔɔ.

‑Amasrɔyi 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu 'yaa‑ Krisi 'yi bhe, ‑e ‑yaa 'yee‑ 'pegee bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn 'kpa zii' do ma. Yaa ‑yaa ‑o klɛza ‑yɔɔ' mu 'ɛ bɔ 'zi ‑klɔsi 'yi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya ‑pia 'o ni dɔɔ 'o 'yee‑ 'pegee bhaaplɛŋ a 'kpaledomaya ye 'ɛ 'wo.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'o mɔɔ ‑o ‑janwo' zii' Krisi 'tɔ 'ɛ 'yi. ‑Yoo 'bhii‑ 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑le zruwla 'zi mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpee 'o mɔɔ ‑liijan' mu 'ɛ 'le. 'O ‑sromabɔ 'zi 'ka ni 'yee‑ Krisi 'tɔ 'ɛ 'yi dɔɔ ‑kaa 'to 'ke 'ka 'pegee ‑Waanbhaa' kpa do ma.

Krisi 'laa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ do 'kpɔ klɛlɛ, 'duŋ‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ ‑kpan 'la 'yaa‑ nu baalɛ ‑kɔɔ' mu ta, ‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ balaa' 'a ta, 'kooko‑ ‑kɔɔ' mu 'pegee 'yee‑ Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑kɔɔ' klɛ mɛɛ ‑lɛdɔɔle mu 'le ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ 'yi.
'O klɛlawoa 'ke yewoyɔɔn mu 'le ‑Waanbhaa' ba, 'woo‑ ‑sromabɔ 'zi 'ka ni dɔɔ 'ka 'laa ‑yaa' ‑lileya 'ɛ 'srɔɔwoza 'ɛ klɛlɛ 'ke bhaama za 'le.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' 'a ꞊pia dɔɔ:
«'Mi 'a pɛ ‑lileya zrɔn 'waati 'ɛ 'bhɔle‑, 'mi 'ŋ 'trɔnkpaa‑ 'kaa‑ 'seri 'ɛ ꞊la, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'an 'lɛkun,
'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi 'ka ‑gwa ‑za 'yi 'bhɛ yi 'ɛ 'le.»
'Bhɛ 'yi bhe, ‑zɔn ‑le 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a pɛ ‑lileya zrɔn yi kplankplan 'gbu 'ɛ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑zɔn yi 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'ezin‑ 'ka go yi 'gbu 'ɛ 'le ‑za 'yi.
'Waa‑ ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'waa‑ ye 'ɛ 'tɔ 'yɔɔ‑ pe. 'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile 'waa‑ ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'o klɛ ‑Waanbhaa' a zi 'ɛ 'liitan pɛ 'le mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'lɛɛ.

'Bhɛɛ‑ drɔɔn', 'wa klɛ 'zi gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma, 'kooko‑ ‑woo' ye 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a yewonɛ kplankplan mu 'le. 'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'woo‑ ‑yrɛn 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑glɔɔn 'yikun zii' 'o zrubakpaa ‑gbɛnɛ 'le, 'kee‑ ꞊kla wisi' ‑gbɔɔ dɔza mu 'le oo, 'kee ꞊kla 'trɛbhɔza mu 'le 'oo, 'woo‑ 'mu 'kpɛn 'yikun zii'.
‑Woo' zita ꞊zwan, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑woo 'o ꞊bwa ‑kaso 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o mɛɛ mu ‑lawlɛnna 'o ma. 'O ye ‑glɔɔ ‑glɔɔn 'yɔɔ‑ 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yikwan꞊. Yidɛkleya 'pegee gbɔn yikunle, 'o 'mu 'kpɛn 'yikwan꞊.
'O 'taawogbɛya mu 'ɛ bakanle ‑o, 'o ‑Waanbhaa' dɔ, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'o zrubakpaale ‑o, 'o zru lele, Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ‑yoo 'o zru mu 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ mu ‑za sɔ 'o ni 'sɔniya ‑zeze 'gbu 'le.
'O ‑Jan 'nrale‑ 'ɛ wo wlan ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'le. 'O ‑lɛdɔɔleya ‑la klɛ 'waa‑ gwledanpɛ 'le 'o 'sɔɔnnii 'ɛ ba, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'o 'gbu ta gwledanpɛ 'le.

Mɛɛ 'ke mu 'o 'tɔbhɔ‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a 'ke mu 'o mavɛɛ 'ezin‑. ‑A 'ke mu 'o 'tɔ wlan pe, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a ‑bhɛɛke' mu ‑o 'o 'tɔ 'yɔɔ‑ pe 'ezin‑. ‑Woo' ye 'bhii‑ bhla pe mu, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ 'woo‑ 'ke wlan pe mu ‑la ‑le.
‑Woo' glin 'bhii‑ waa 'o dɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ mɔkpɛn' 'o dɔ. ‑Woo' ye 'bhii‑ ga mu, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'woo‑ 'o 'yrɛ ma ‑li kpataakpa. ‑O ‑yrɛnkpa' 'o ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ waa sɔ 'o dɛle‑.

‑O wlɛyisriwoza klɛ 'o ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ 'o zrukpaale ‑o 'egbɛnɛle 'taŋii. ‑Woo' ye 'bhii‑ 'kɔɔfleŋzan mu, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'woo‑ mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' ‑bebe mu klɛ 'zi pɛzan mu 'le. ‑Woo' ye 'bhii‑ pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ‑o 'o 'kɔɔ, 'duŋ‑ 'waa‑ pɛ ‑le 'ke pɛ 'kpɛn 'le.
'O 'yiɛnii Korɛnti mu, 'o ‑janwoa 'ka ni kpataakpa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ gaanlɛ 'ka ma ‑titi.
'Ka mu 'gbu ‑za sɔ 'o ni 'o zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ 'ka mu laa 'o mɔɔ ‑vavadɛ.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'mi ‑o ‑janwo' zii' 'ka ni 'bhii‑ ‑nɛ dɛ do ‑janwo' ‑a ‑nɛ mu ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑. 'Duŋ‑ 'ka mu 'ezin‑, 'o ‑za 'sɔ 'ka ni, ‑ka 'ka zru 'ɛ 'liiploo‑ 'o ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'laa 'ka 'kpee gaanlɛ 'o ma ‑titi.
Mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa ‑o kpa ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi, 'ka 'pegee 'mu laa wlalɛ ‑za do ma. Taa‑ ‑lɛdɔɔleya 'pegee ‑yɔɔya' ‑o do ɛɛ? Taa‑ 'tɛbhile 'pegee ‑gblo ‑o do ɛɛ?
Krisi 'pegee Beliali 'sɔ 'kpale do ma 'nale‑ ‑a ma ɛɛ? Taa‑ mɛɛ 'la zan 'e kpa ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ 'la zan laa 'e kpa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yi ‑waa' ‑za 'ɛ ‑dele 'eke‑ ta ɛɛ?

‑Waanbhaa' Gba 'Fɛ ‑Gbɛnɛ 'ɛ 'pegee yo mu ‑o do ɛɛ? ‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑ya ‑yrɛ ma 'o mɔɔ 'flɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke ‑a gba 'fɛ ‑zeze 'gbu 'ɛ 'le, 'bhii‑ 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu 'a ꞊pia gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ dɔɔ:
«'Mi nu yaalɛ ‑o pleŋ‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ nu klɛlɛ ‑o ba 'ke ‑o ‑ja yrɛ 'oo yrɛ 'la ꞊nɔɔ.
'Mi nu klɛlɛ waa ‑Waanbhaa' 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'woo‑ nu klɛlɛ 'mi a pɛ mɛɛ mu 'le.»
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' pe 'ezin‑ dɔɔ:
«‑Ka 'ka go ‑o pleŋ‑; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'ka 'pleŋgo‑ ‑o ma.
'Ka 'laa 'kunlɛ‑ pɛ 'la 'bhɛ 'laa ‑o 'weŋ 'bhɛ ma.
'Ke 'ka 'bhɛ ꞊kla, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi nu 'ŋ gbɛdɔlɛ 'ka ꞊la 'tɛ.
'Mi nu klɛlɛ 'ka Dɛ 'le,
'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka mu nu klɛlɛ 'mi gbe mu 'pegee 'mi 'lu mu 'le.
Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' 'Seŋkpɛnzan 'a ꞊pia 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑ bhe.»

'Ŋ 'yiɛnii mu, ‑Waanbhaa' 'a 'liiwli‑ nalawoa ‑za mu 'la ta ‑kɔɔ' ni 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, ‑kɔɔ' ‑kɔɔ' 'flɛ mu 'ɛ 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' zru mu 'ɛ klɛ 'weŋ 'ke ‑kɔɔ' go 'triŋdɔ‑ maza 'tɔle‑ 'triŋdɔ‑ maza 'bhɛ 'yi. ‑Kɔɔ' dɔ klɛn 'ke ‑kɔɔ' klɛle 'weŋ 'ɛ 'lɛpale klɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑kɔɔ' 'taawo‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑lɛɛgblaanya 'ɛ 'yi.
‑Ka 'ka zru mu 'ɛ 'liigo‑ 'o ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o ‑za 'sɔ 'ka ni 'ka 'kpee! 'Waa 'siɛlɛ‑ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ba, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'waa mɛɛ kedo‑ 'kpɔ ŋgblo 'siɛlɛ‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ tabhlelɛ.

'Naa ‑o 'bhɛ 'pe zii' 'ka 'tɔ 'yɔɔ‑ pe zayi' 'dɛ, 'duŋ‑ 'mi 'a ꞊pia 'ka ni 'elwale gban dɔɔ 'ka ‑za sɔ 'mi ni 'egbɛnɛle 'kee‑ kan ‑a ‑daŋ' ta. 'Ka 'sɔgbɛya ‑yɔɔ' 'ɛ 'kɔɔ 'o ni, ‑asiikɔɔ pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa sɔ ‑kɔɔ' 'pleŋgole 'eke‑ ma; 'ali‑ yaa dɔ ga 'kpee 'ke 'bhɛ 'bhɛ klɛ.
'Mi 'gbu 'kpale‑ ‑o 'ka 'yi 'egbɛnɛle, 'mi sɔ 'ŋ ‑baale' 'ka mu 'yi. 'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑yrɛn mu 'la 'kpɛn 'yi ‑gɛ bhe, 'duŋ‑ 'fuudɔle ‑o 'ŋ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ zrukpaale ‑o 'kee‑ kan ‑a ‑daŋ' ta.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, ‑a 'san 'ŋ nule 'ɛ ma Masedwani ‑wa 'ɛ ta ‑gɛ, 'waa 'o 'yitrɛ‑ yrɛ sanɛ‑ 'gbu 'srɔɔwolɛ ‑lido'. ‑Woo' 'yrɛbatɛdɔ 'zi gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma. Mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑o gwledan 'zi 'o ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑gblaan ‑o 'o zru 'yi.
'Duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'la 'fuudɔ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑gblɔzi' gale ‑o 'mu ta, Titi 'nulawoa, ‑e 'fuudwa‑ 'o ta.

Titi 'nule‑ do ‑kplɛn 'laa klɛlɛ 'fuudɔpɛ 'le 'o ta. 'Duŋ‑ ‑ya ꞊pia 'o ni dɔɔ 'kaa‑ ꞊kwan 'elrele gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'bhɛ 'fuudwa ‑a ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya ꞊pia 'o ni 'ezin‑ dɔɔ 'ŋ 'ye ‑lrɔ ‑o 'ka ma 'egbɛnɛle, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑za mu 'la ꞊tian 'ŋ ma, 'mu 'ka wlɛyisriwoa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'an ‑za ‑vavadɛ. 'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile 'mi a pɛ zrukpaa' 'bhɛ ‑o 'egbɛnɛle.
'Ali‑ 'mi 'lɛtrɛ 'la ꞊kpaa 'ka ni, 'ke 'bhɛ 'ka wlɛyisriwoa, 'bhɛ 'laa ‑zadɔwɛɛ dɔlɛ 'mi ma ‑titi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'an 'yelawoa 'bhii‑ ‑e 'ka wlɛyisriwoa 'waati sa, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑zadɔwɛɛ ‑dwa 'mi ma 'tɛ.

'Duŋ‑, 'mi zrukpaale ‑o ‑zɔn. 'Ka 'ka wlɛyisrilawoa 'bhɛ 'laa ‑o 'ke 'mi zrukpaaza 'le. 'Duŋ‑ 'kaa‑ wlɛyisriwoza 'ɛ 'bhɔlawoa 'ka ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'ploola‑ 'ka 'joo 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ ma, 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'mi zrukpaaza 'le ‑zɔn. 'Kaa‑ wlɛyisriwoza ‑bɛŋgwa 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' zru maza 'ɛ 'le; 'bhɛ ‑la ma ‑le 'o ‑za 'la ꞊kla 'ka ni, 'bhɛ 'laa klɛlɛ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'le.

Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, wlɛyisriwoza 'la da ‑Waanbhaa' ba, 'bhɛ ‑le 'a klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ bhaaplɛŋ ploo ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya 'joo 'ɛ mabɔɔ; 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi bhe, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e go ‑za 'yi. 'Bhɛ wlɛyisriwoza ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'laa ‑zadɔwɛɛ dɔ mɛɛ ma. 'Duŋ‑, 'drunyan 'yi wlɛyisriwoza 'ɛ, 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke mɛɛ nipɛ 'pegee mɛɛ dɛpɛ 'le ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ 'yi, ‑amasrɔyi bhaaplɛŋ laa ploo ‑yaa' ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'ɛ ma.

'Yee‑ wlɛyisriwoza 'la da ‑Waanbhaa' ba ‑e ‑za mu 'la ꞊kla 'ka zru mu 'ɛ 'yi ‑ka 'mu ‑glin doo! ‑E 'ka ꞊si 'ɛ mabɔɔla ‑zɔn, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑za 'ɛ 'kun zii' 'elrele; ‑e ‑zadɔwɛɛ ‑dwa 'ka ma. ‑Za la 'ka zru ma; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka gblaan ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛle ‑lɛɛ. 'Ŋ 'ye ‑lrɔ ‑o 'ka ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑o dɔ 'zi 'eglɔɔle ‑Waanbhaa' a zi 'ɛ ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka takanle ‑o ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'ɛ 'krowo zayi'. 'Kaa ‑zrɔnna zrɔngbɛya 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yi 'bhii‑ 'ka klɛza laa ‑yaa 'yee‑ ‑za 'ɛ 'le.

'Mi 'lɛtrɛ 'la ꞊kpaa 'ka ni, 'naa klɛlɛ mɛɛ 'la zan ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'ɛ ꞊kla, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'yee‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'ɛ ꞊tian mɛɛ 'la zan ma, 'mu do ‑kplɛn 'kaama‑. 'Duŋ‑, 'mi 'a ꞊kpaa 'ka ni, 'kooko‑ 'o ‑za ‑o 'ka 'kɔɔ 'egbɛnɛle gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ 'yi, 'ka 'kpɛn 'bhɛ dɔ.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'ka ‑za 'la ꞊kla 'bhɛ 'fuudwa‑ 'o ta. 'Ka 'fuu la 'bhɛ ‑dwa 'o ta, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka faŋgan‑ 'la ‑dwa Titi ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a zrukpaale 'la ‑daa 'ka ba ye, 'bhɛ 'o mɔɔ a pɛ zrukpaa' 'ɛ baan' ꞊klaa ‑a ba.

'Ke 'mi 'gbu 'ŋ 'wasowoa sa 'ka mu 'yi ‑a ‑yrɛ ma, 'ka 'laa ‑yraladɔlɛ 'ŋ ma. 'O ‑jan 'la wo 'ka ni 'taŋii wlan ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'woo 'waso sa 'la ꞊woa 'ka mu 'yi Titi 'yrɛ ma, 'bhɛ 'a ‑zrɔnna 'bhii‑ 'zoo 'yaa‑ 'o zi 'bhɛ klɛlele.

‑Ayile ‑zɔn, 'ka za 'sɔle‑ ‑o Titi ni 'egbɛnɛle; ‑amasrɔyi 'ke ‑ya 'kpeelɛdaan 'ka mi 'wojan‑ 'ɛ 'klɔsikwan gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'bhɛ ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'kaa 'cieya‑ ꞊kla 'ke 'ka ‑gasi ‑gbɛnɛ kpa a ‑lɛɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ka 'sɔniya 'ɛ baan' 'kla zii' ‑a ba ‑a 'kpee.
'Mi 'duŋ‑, 'ŋ zrukpaale ‑o 'ezin‑ 'egbɛnɛle, ‑amasrɔyi 'mi sɔ 'ŋ 'kpale‑ 'ka mu 'yi ‑za 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yi.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑Waanbhaa' ꞊lia Masedwani 'klɛɛn 'yi Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ma gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'woo‑ zan 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ 'wolɛ‑ 'ka ni.

'Trɛbhɔ ‑gbɛnɛ mu ‑yaa ‑o ta. 'Duŋ‑ zrukpaa' 'la 'yaa‑ ‑o ‑yi ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑yaa 'bhɛ ma. 'Ali‑ ‑waa' 'kɔɔfleŋya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑o ‑dwa ‑a ‑la 'ke ‑o ‑gɔli' ‑bebe kpa 'eke‑ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o bhɔ Zeruzalɛmu Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ba 'bhɛ 'le.

'Mi 'gbu ‑o 'bhɛ 'srɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ sɔ ‑a pele dɔɔ ‑o gbɛ ‑swa ‑gɔli' yɛkɛ‑ 'la 'srɔɔwole ta, ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ ꞊naa. 'Ali‑ 'o yri ‑yaa gɔli' yɛkɛ‑ 'la ta ‑o ‑pinaa' 'bhɛ ta. Yaa klɛlɛ 'bhii‑ mɛɛ ‑le 'bhɛ ꞊wlaa ‑o zi, 'duŋ‑ ‑o 'gbu ‑le 'bhɛ ꞊naa ‑o 'gbu zru ma.
‑Woo' matɛdwa ‑sromabɔlele 'o ni dɔɔ 'o ‑dwa ‑a ‑la 'ke ‑o sɔ bhɔle ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'la ‑woo Zeruzalɛmu 'mu ba.

‑O ‑za 'la 'bhɛ ꞊kla, 'bhɛ 'kaan‑ 'o mɔɔ ‑yri ‑yaa ‑za yɛkɛ‑ 'la klɛle ta ‑o 'kɔɔ 'bhɛ ta: ‑woo 'gbu ꞊naa 'elwale 'pe Mɛɛzan Zesu ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo 'gbu ꞊twa 'o mɔɔ 'kɔɔ 'ezin‑, 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑daa ‑Waanbhaa' zru maza 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ba.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'o ‑sromabwa Titi ni dɔɔ ‑e ge 'ka ba ye, 'kooko‑ ‑e ye ‑lrele' 'la zisaan‑ 'ke ‑ya pe 'ka ni 'ka ‑gɔli' 'kpa 'eke‑ ta, ‑e ge 'bhɛ ye 'ɛ zi 'kee‑ 'bhɛ 'lɛyan‑.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ka ‑o mɔkpɛn' 'lɛɛ ‑za 'kpɛn 'yi: 'e pe 'kpaleya 'yi oo, ‑janwo' gbɛya 'yi oo, ‑zadɔleya 'yi oo, ‑za 'kpɛn ‑vavadɛle 'yi oo; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o ‑za sɔ 'ka ni 'egbɛnɛle. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, ‑ka dɔ 'ezin‑ klɛn 'ke 'ka klɛ mɔkpɛn' 'lɛɛ ‑za 'brɛɛ ‑glɔɔn 'lɛɛ‑ klɛle 'yi.

'Naa ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'kaa klɛ kpaŋma. 'Duŋ‑ Zesu 'yi mu ‑vin mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu 'ɛ ꞊naa gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ blaale‑, 'mi ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑jan 'ɛ 'wo zii' 'ka ni drɔŋ. 'Ŋ 'bhɛ 'wo zii' win 'la ma, 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ 'ke 'ka mu sɔ a zrɔnle‑ 'ka klɛgbɛya 'ɛ ma 'bhii‑ 'kaa‑ pɛ 'sɔniya 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke wlan 'le.

‑Amasrɔyi ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'bhɛ a ‑lileya 'ɛ ‑zrɔnna ‑kɔɔ' ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ka 'gbu 'bhɛ dɔ. 'Tɔbhɔleya ‑yaa ‑a 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑e ‑yaa' pɛ 'kpɛn zan 'le laflɛ' 'yi, 'duŋ‑ 'ka mu ‑zayi' ‑e ‑nwa ‑a 'gbu klɛlɛ 'ke ‑yrɛn ma mɛɛ 'le 'trɛ ta ‑gɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑gaa, 'kooko‑ 'ka klɛ pɛzan 'le ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ 'yi.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi bhe, 'mi ‑o 'ŋ 'gbu 'kpeejan‑ ‑la wo zii' 'ka ni 'yee‑ ‑za 'ɛ ta; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi pe dɔɔ: 'Ka ‑za 'la klɛle zisaan‑ lɛɛlii 'ɛ 'le, ‑ka ge 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑glɔɔn klɛle 'ɛ zi. 'Ka mu, 'ka laa klɛlɛ ‑a ꞊lwa klɛ mu 'te 'le, 'duŋ‑ ‑a klɛ ‑lrɔ ‑dwa 'ka mu 'la ma 'elwale 'pe, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa ꞊kla.
'Ka 'yee‑ ‑za 'la zisaan‑ 'ka zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le, ‑ka dɔ klɛn 'ke 'kaa 'lɛyan‑ 'ka zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le 'ezin‑, 'ke 'bhɛ ‑bɛŋgole klɛ 'ka 'fuu sɔ ‑za yɛkɛ‑ 'la klɛle ta 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le.
‑Amasrɔyi, 'kee‑ pɛ na 'e zru ‑lrele' 'le, 'bhɛ ‑le sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ni. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'kee gbɛswa‑ pɛ 'la 'nale‑ ta, 'bhɛ ‑le sɔ ‑a ni 'ke 'bhɛ kan 'e gbɛ laa 'sɔlɛ‑ pɛ 'la 'nale‑ ta a ni 'bhɛ ta.
'Naa 'pelɛ‑ dɔɔ 'ka 'ka 'gbu klɛ 'kɔɔfleŋzan mu 'le 'ka 'bhɔ zayi' mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu ba. 'Mi ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'kaa klɛ, 'kooko‑ 'ka 'kpɛn 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu 'ɛ sɔ 'eke‑ ni.

‑Zɔn 'ka mu 'kɔɔ 'pale‑ ‑o, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'seŋ ‑o 'ka ni 'ke 'ka bhɔ 'kɔɔfleŋzan mu ba. 'Bhɛɛ‑ yi 'la ta, 'ke pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ‑o 'ka mu 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'woo‑ mu 'kɔɔ 'pale‑ ‑o, ‑o nu 'sɔlɛ‑ bhɔle‑ 'ka mu ba. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, 'ka 'kpɛn nu klɛlɛ do 'tɛ.
'Bhɛ klɛ 'bhii‑ ‑a yɔɔndɛle ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ dɔɔ:
«Mɛɛ 'la zan 'bhɛ pɛ 'srɛ 'wloola‑, 'bhɛ a pɛ 'ɛ ‑vin 'laa bolɛ;
'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan 'bhɛ pɛ sa ‑wloola, 'bhɛ 'kɔɔpɛ‑ 'ɛ yaa 'kaanlɛ‑.»
'Mi ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑, ‑amasrɔyi ‑e 'ka mu ‑vavadɛ zruwlaa‑ Titi 'kpee 'bhii‑ 'mi 'ka mu ‑vavadɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ bhe.
'O ‑jan 'la ꞊woa ‑a ni, ‑e ‑dwa 'bhɛ ꞊la. 'Bhɛɛ‑ drɔɔn', 'ka ‑za 'la ‑ya 'kɔɔ 'eglɔɔle bhe, ‑ya ‑dwa ‑a 'gbu 'kpee 'kaa ‑e gele‑ 'ka ba ye.
'Woo‑ 'yee‑ Titi 'pegee 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ 'bhɛɛke do winbɔ 'zi 'ka ba ye. 'Bhɛ ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o Krisi a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wo zii' gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑o ‑a 'tɔ wlan 'pe 'zi 'bhɛ ma.

'Bhɛ trala 'ezin‑, Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yee‑ 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ 'ɛ makwan‑ 'kaa ‑e ge 'o zi 'bhɛ ye ‑lrele' 'ɛ wo 'taa 'ɛ ta. ‑E nu bhɔlɛ 'o ba 'o ‑gɔli' yɛkɛ‑ 'la 'srɔɔwoa‑ 'bhɛ 'yiciɛnlele. 'Woo‑ 'bhɛ ye 'lɛɛ‑ 'wo zii' 'yee‑ Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔ 'bhɔ zayi'; 'bhɛ 'pegee 'wa zrɔn 'zi 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ ma 'bhii‑ 'woo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'o 'bhɔ 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ mu 'ɛ ba.
'Woo‑ 'bhɛ 'kpɛn klɛ 'zi 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, ‑amasrɔyi 'waa ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ ‑o ‑layrɛ' ‑srɔɔwo' 'o ta ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yi 'yee‑ ‑gɔli' 'lɛɛ 'kungbɛya 'ɛ ma, ‑amasrɔyi ‑gɔli' sa laa 'kɛle‑.
‑Amasrɔyi 'woo‑ ‑za 'brɛɛ ‑la klɛyrɛ ‑glin 'zi, 'waa ‑o 'bhɛ ‑glin 'zi Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' do ‑kplɛn 'yrɛ 'yi, 'duŋ‑ 'woo‑ 'bhɛ klɛyrɛ ‑glin 'zi 'ezin‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu ‑la ‑yrɛ 'yi.

'Woo‑ 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ yaga mi 'la 'kpa zii' ‑o ba; 'o 'bhɛ 'yrɛglinna 'ke 'o ye ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn kpa ‑a ta, 'duŋ‑ ‑ya 'kpɛn ꞊kla ‑a zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'saanigɛ 'ezin‑, ‑a zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'nale‑ ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a ye 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ni 'ke 'bhɛ kan 'elwale pɛ 'ɛ ta, ‑amasrɔyi ‑a 'kpale‑ ‑o 'egbɛnɛle 'ka mu 'yi.
'Kee‑ ꞊bwa Titi a pɛ 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ŋ 'madɔ‑ mi 'pegee 'ŋ yewoyɔɔn 'le 'ka mu ba. 'O nɛɛnɛ‑ ‑vin mu 'la 'mu ‑o ge 'zi 'a zi, Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑le 'mu 'winbwa‑.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, ‑kaa zrɔn ‑o ni 'bhii‑ ‑o ‑za sɔ 'ka ni 'egbɛnɛle, 'kooko‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'la 'mu ‑o winbwa‑, 'mu 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'zoo 'yaa‑ 'o zi 'ke 'woo baa 'ka 'yi.
'Ka nu ‑gɔli' 'la 'kpalɛ‑ 'eke‑ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka bhɔ Zeruzalɛmu Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ba 'bhɛ 'le, 'mi 'a ꞊ya 'bhii‑ win laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma 'ke 'ŋ 'sɛwɛdɛ 'ka ni 'bhɛ ba ‑zayi'.

‑Amasrɔyi 'ka 'yriwlale ‑o 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ klɛle ma gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ŋ 'bhɛ dɔ. 'Mi 'yaa‑ 'ŋ ‑baa 'zi 'ka mu 'yi 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑zayi' Masedwani mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'yrɛ ma 'ke 'an pe ‑o ni dɔɔ: «'Kee‑ san lɛɛlii, 'ka mu Akayi 'klɛɛn 'yi Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ, 'ka 'yriwlale ‑yaa 'ke 'ka bhɔ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'la ‑woo Zeruzalɛmu 'mu ba.» 'Ka 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ klɛle ‑vavadia gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'bhɛ zruwlaa‑ 'ezin‑ mɛɛ ‑bebe 'kpee.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ mu 'la 'winbɔ‑ 'zi 'ka ta ye, 'kooko‑ 'ŋ 'ka 'tɔlabhwa ‑o ‑yrɛ ma, 'bhɛ 'laa klɛ bhaama za 'le. 'Duŋ‑ ‑ka dɔ klɛn, 'kooko‑ 'ka 'yriwlale bo 'sani‑ ‑o nule pleŋ‑ 'bhii‑ 'an ꞊pia ‑o ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

'Ke 'bhɛ 'laa klɛlɛ, 'ke ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Masedwani Zesu 'yi mu 'la ꞊nwa 'ŋ zi 'ka ba ye, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke waa 'ka 'yriwlale yelɛ, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑gblaan 'zi ‑za do ‑la ‑lɛɛ dɔɔ 'o mɔɔ 'la 'kpale‑ ‑o 'ka 'yi, ‑yrala' nu dɔlɛ 'o ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e nu klɛlɛ 'ka mu 'gbu ma ‑yrala' 'le 'ezin‑.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'mi 'ŋ 'kpeelɛdaan, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'an ꞊ya zi 'le 'ke 'ŋ ‑sromabɔ 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu 'lɛɛ‑ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o kan ‑sɔ 'ŋ 'lɛɛ 'ke ‑o ge 'ka ba ye; 'kooko‑ 'ka ‑gɔli' 'la 'naza‑ ꞊pia, 'ka 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ 'yrɛbago 'sani‑ 'ŋ 'nule‑ pleŋ‑ 'ka ba ye. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, ‑e nu klɛlɛ 'bhii‑ 'kaa ꞊naa 'ka zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'laa 'nalɛ‑ 'klin 'yi.
'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka ‑za 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ dɔ 'ka 'kpee dɔɔ: 'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan gba sa ꞊kpaa, 'bhɛ zan nu pɛbhaa sa ‑la ‑srɔɔwolɛ. 'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan gba ‑gbɛnɛ ꞊kpaa, 'bhɛ zan nu pɛbhaa ‑bebe ‑la 'srɔɔwolɛ.

'Ka 'kpɛn do do ‑gɔli' yɛkɛ‑ 'la 'nale‑ ‑dwa 'ka 'kpɛn do do 'kpee, ‑ka 'bhɛɛ‑ 'na. 'Ka 'laa 'nalɛ klin 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee kpaŋma. ‑Amasrɔyi mɛɛ 'la zan pɛ na 'bhɛ zrukpaale 'le, 'bhɛ zan ‑la ‑za sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ni.

'Ke 'ka pɛ ‑naa 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'bhɛ 'seŋ ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'kee‑ ‑za 'wlan ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛ 'ka ni, 'kooko‑ 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba 'ka maza ‑o pɛ 'oo pɛ 'la ma 'ka 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwo‑, 'ke 'ka 'kɔɔ pa 'kɛle‑ 'ezin‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka sɔ ‑za 'wlan ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛle‑.
'Bhii‑ ‑a yɔɔndɛle ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ dɔɔ:
«Mɛɛ 'la zan gbɛ ta ‑o taataa 'bhɛ pɛ na 'kɔɔfleŋzan mu ‑la ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya pa ‑o ta.
'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑yaa' wlanya 'ɛ ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma ‑titi.»

‑Waanbhaa' 'la gba 'kpa pɛbhɛ mu na gba 'kpa mi 'ɛ ni, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke ‑ya ‑lɛbɔ' pɛbhle na ‑a ni, 'yee‑ do 'kpɔ 'ɛ nu 'ka maza ‑o pɛ 'oo pɛ 'la ma 'bhɛ 'nalɛ‑ 'ka ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'ka 'kɔɔ pa 'kɛle‑, 'kooko‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan mu mazadwa 'ka ma, 'mu sɔ pɛ ‑bebe 'srɔɔwole 'ka 'kɔɔ.

‑E nu ‑za 'wlan ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛlɛ 'ka ni, 'kooko‑ 'ka sɔ mɛɛ ‑vin mu 'ɛ gbale‑ pɛ ba 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba. 'Ke 'o ꞊nwa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑gɔli' 'la ꞊kpaa 'eke‑ ta, 'ke 'o 'bhɛ 'lɛnaa‑ 'waati 'la ba, mɛɛ ‑bebe nu ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔlɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑wa 'tɔbhɔ‑ 'kaa‑ 'bhɔŋbapɛ 'ɛ ‑zayi'.
‑Amasrɔyi 'ka nu ‑gɔli' 'la 'kpalɛ‑ 'eke‑ ta, 'bhɛ 'laa nu klɛlɛ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'ɛ maza ‑yanwopɛ drɔŋ 'le; 'duŋ‑ 'bhɛ nu ‑a klɛlɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ ‑bebe nu 'pubɔ‑ 'seri klɛlɛ ‑Waanbhaa' ni.

'Kaa‑ 'bhɔŋbapɛ 'la 'o nu 'bhɛ 'lɛnalɛ Zeruzalɛmu Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ni, 'bhɛ nu a zrɔnlɛ mɛɛ mu ni 'bhii‑ 'ka blɔɔle 'la ‑yoo ‑Waanbhaa' ma 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke wlan 'le. 'Bhɛ ꞊nɔɔ Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ nu ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔbhɔlɛ 'bhɛ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o nu a yelɛ 'bhɛ ma 'bhii‑ 'kaa‑ pelawo zii' dɔɔ 'ka 'kpale‑ ‑o Krisi a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'yi, 'ka ‑o 'taawo zii' 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ ta. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, ‑o nu ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔbhɔlɛ, 'ka ‑o 'ka 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu 'la 'yiciɛn‑ zii' 'ke 'ka bhɔ 'woo‑ mu 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ ‑vin mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba 'bhɛ ‑zayi'.
‑Waanbhaa' ‑lileya ‑gbɛnɛ 'la ‑zrɔnna 'ka ni, 'bhɛ ‑zayi', ‑o nu ‑o 'seriwolɛ ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'kaa‑ ‑za ma 'ke ‑wa zrɔn 'ka ni 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑za sɔ ‑o ni.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑kɔɔ' ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ ‑a Gbe 'ɛ 'nale‑ ma ‑kɔɔ' ni! ‑E 'kɔɔ‑ ‑gbaa ‑a Gbe 'la ba, waa sɔ 'bhɛ 'kpale pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ma.

'Mi Pɔlu 'gbu ‑le ‑za do ‑yrɛwo' zii' 'ka ma ‑gɛ, ‑yidɔɔya 'pegee wlanya 'la ‑woo Krisi 'yi 'mu ‑zayi'. ‑Wa pe 'ŋ ma dɔɔ 'ŋ 'yrɛ 'laa sɔ mɛɛ ‑yrɛ ba 'ke 'ŋ 'yoo‑ 'ka ‑din 'waati 'la ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑wa pe 'ŋ ma 'ezin‑ dɔɔ mɛɛ ‑yrɛ ma ‑glɔɔ, 'ke 'ŋ 'pleŋgole ‑o 'ka ma 'waati 'la ba.

'Mi ‑o ‑sromabɔ 'zi 'ka ni dɔɔ 'ke 'ŋ ‑ja 'ka ba 'waati 'la ba, 'ka 'laa 'wlalɛ‑ 'ŋ zi 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ ‑jan ‑glɔɔ wo 'ka ni. ‑Amasrɔyi mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ‑a pe 'zi dɔɔ 'o mɔɔ ‑o 'taawo zii' bhaaplɛŋ 'kpeelɛdan gbɛya zi, 'ŋ nu ‑jan ‑glɔɔ 'wolɛ‑ 'bhɛ zan mu 'ɛ ni.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'woo‑ 'ke bhaaplɛŋ mu 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'waa ‑o gwledan 'zi 'bhii‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu a pɛ gwledan gbɛya 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑.

‑Amasrɔyi 'o gwledan gwledanpɛ mu 'la 'le, 'bhɛ mu laa ‑o 'ke bhaaplɛŋ mu a pɛ 'le. 'Bhɛ gwledanpɛ mu 'ɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ da ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o sɔ ‑Setran' a faŋgan‑ 'ɛ 'pegee ‑yaa' ‑dawli' maza mu 'ɛ 'siɛle. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ezin‑ ‑o sɔ bhaaplɛŋ 'kpeelɛdangbɛya ‑yɔɔ' mu 'ɛ 'siɛle.

'Bhɛɛ‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu a magbaandɛle 'tɔle‑ magbaandɛle 'ke 'bhɛ a klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑vin mu laa ‑Waanbhaa' dɔ, 'o mɔɔ 'bhɛ 'kpɛn 'yisiɛ‑. 'Bhɛɛ‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpeejan‑ mu 'la ‑woo 'eyɔɔle ‑Waanbhaa' ma, 'o 'mu kun 'bhii‑ ‑kaso 'yi mu 'kungbɛya gbɛɛn‑; 'bhɛɛ 'o 'mu mabɔɔ, 'kooko‑ bhaaplɛŋ sɔ dɔle‑ Krisi a ‑jan 'ɛ ꞊la.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'wa ꞊ya 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑o 'taawo zii' 'o 'wojan‑ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ta 'elrele 'waati 'la ba, 'ke mɛɛ 'oo mɛɛ 'la zan 'o 'wojan‑ mu 'ɛ 'kafawoa; 'o nu 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ 'krowolɛ.

'Kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o wlan 'le ‑ka 'bhɛ ‑glin doo! 'Ke mɛɛ do 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ ‑yoo 'ke Krisi a pɛ 'le, 'bhɛ zan 'a 'yaango‑ ‑a 'gbu 'kpee dɔɔ ‑yoo Krisi a pɛ 'le gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'o mɔɔ 'gbu ‑o 'ezin‑ Krisi a pɛ 'le 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑.

‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' faŋgan‑ 'la ꞊naa 'o ni 'ka mu ta, yaa 'bhɛ 'nalɛ‑ 'o ni 'ka 'siɛ zayi', 'duŋ‑ ‑e 'bhɛ ꞊naa 'o ni 'kooko‑ 'o 'bhɔ 'ka ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ baan' ge 'klalele ‑a ba. ‑E 'bhɛ faŋgan‑ 'la ꞊naa 'o ni, 'ali‑ 'ke 'mi 'ŋ magbaandia sa 'bhɛ 'yi, 'bhɛ 'laa ‑yraladɔ 'ŋ ma.
Yaa klɛlɛ 'ka ni 'bhii‑ 'mi ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ŋ ‑gblaan 'kla 'ka 'yi 'ŋ 'lɛtrɛ mu 'la kpa 'ka ni 'mu 'le.

‑Amasrɔyi mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑o ‑a pe 'zi dɔɔ 'mi Pɔlu ‑jan mu 'la kpa 'an 'lɛtrɛ mu 'ɛ 'yi 'mu ‑o 'eglɔɔle, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu la mɛɛ ma; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ 'ke 'ŋ ‑yoo ‑o 'pleŋ‑ 'waati 'la ba, faŋgan‑ 'laa ‑o 'ŋ 'gbu ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'an ‑janwo' gbɛya 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'laa mɛɛ zru kun.

'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'bhɛ 'yansi jan mu 'ɛ wo zii' 'mi ma bhe, 'mu 'a 'yaango‑ dɔɔ 'o ‑janwo' gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'waa‑ 'lɛtrɛ mu 'ɛ 'yi, 'waa nu 'bhɛ ‑janwo' gbɛya 'ɛ mabɔɔlɛ 'ke 'o ‑ja 'waati 'la ba 'ka ba ye.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'gbu ye mɛɛ gblaan mu 'le, yaa sɔ dɔle‑ 'o mɔɔ 'kpee 'ke 'wa pe 'o 'pegee 'bhɛ zan mu ‑o do, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa sɔ 'o 'gbu danle‑ 'mu ma. Waa ‑o dan pɛ ‑bhɛɛke' ma, 'ke yaa 'e go ‑o 'gbu ba; 'bhɛ ‑za 'la bhe 'bhɛ 'laa ‑o 'ke ‑zadɔkleya 'le ɛɛ?

'Ke ‑yoo 'o mɔɔ a pɛ 'le, 'waa nu 'o 'gbu magbaandɛlɛ, 'ke 'bhɛ kan ‑a ‑daŋ' 'ɛ ta. ‑Waanbhaa' ye yɛkɛ‑ 'la gbɛkpaa‑ 'o 'kɔɔ 'ke 'o ‑ja 'bhɛ 'wole‑ 'ɛ 'le 'fɔ 'ka ba ye, 'bhɛ ‑daŋ' ‑o yrɛ 'la ꞊nɔɔ, 'waa‑ pɛ 'ɛ ‑daŋ' ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ ꞊nɔɔ.
'O gelawoa 'ka ba, 'waa 'kanlɛ‑ 'o ‑daŋ' 'ɛ ta; ‑amasrɔyi 'o mɔɔ 'gbu ‑le ‑ja 'ka ba ye Krisi a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'wole‑ 'ɛ 'le.

'Bhɛ 'yi bhe, 'waa 'kanlɛ‑ 'o ‑daŋ' 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa 'o 'gbu magbaandɛlɛ mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu ye 'la ꞊woa 'bhɛ 'yi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ drɔɔn' 'o 'yri ‑o ‑a ta 'bhii‑ 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ baan' nu 'klalɛ‑ ‑a ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, 'waa‑ ye 'ɛ baan' nu ‑yidɛlɛ, 'duŋ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ 'laa kan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑daŋ' 'la 'kpalaa 'a ma 'bhɛ ta.
'Bhɛ 'yi bhe 'tɛ, 'o nu gelɛ Krisi a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wolɛ‑ 'klɛɛn mu 'la ‑woo 'ka ‑zanta' 'mu 'yi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'waa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'woo 'gbu magbaandɛ mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu 'woye‑ 'ɛ 'yi.
'Bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ ma jan yɔɔndɛle ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' ‑a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi dɔɔ:
«'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan ‑o 'bhɛ 'gbu magbaandɛle, 'bhɛ zan 'bhɛ 'gbu magbaandɛ Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑za 'la ꞊kla 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yi.»
Wlan 'ɛ ni, mɛɛ 'la zan 'a pe ‑a 'gbu ma dɔɔ ‑yoo 'ke mɛɛ wlan 'le, Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' laa dɔ 'bhɛ zan a ‑za ꞊la; 'duŋ‑ 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' mɛɛ 'la zan 'tɔ wlan pe, ‑e dɔ 'bhɛɛ‑ zan a ‑za ꞊la.
'E! 'Ke 'ka 'yaa sɔ bi 'an ‑kwa 'ɛ sa 'yikunle! 'Duŋ‑, ‑kaa sa ‑yikun'!

'Ka ‑za 'sɔgbɛya ‑yɔɔ' 'ɛ 'kɔɔ 'ŋ ni, ‑asiikɔɔ 'ŋ 'yoo‑ zrwanwo 'zi 'ka ta, 'bhɛ zranwole 'ɛ da ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ba. 'Ka ‑o 'bhii‑ ‑gblanɛ 'la yaa 'gwlaanza‑ 'yaango‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'mi 'ŋ 'liiwli‑ ꞊naa ‑a 'fluwoza ta 'gwlaan‑ do 'kpɔ ‑la 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛ 'gwlaan‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke Krisi 'le. 'Mi ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ka klɛ 'weŋ.

'Duŋ‑ 'ka blɔɔle 'la ‑yoo Krisi ma gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'mi ‑o ‑gblaan 'zi dɔɔ 'ke 'ka 'ka 'kpeejan‑ mu 'ɛ mabɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka go 'yee‑ Krisi zi; 'bhii‑ ‑Setran' lii ꞊wlaa mlɛ 'ɛ 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e Ɛvu 'yinia꞊ ‑dawli' ma.

‑Amasrɔyi 'ke mɛɛ do ꞊nwa 'ka ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ Zesu 'bhɛɛke do ‑a ‑janwoa 'ka ni 'ke 'bhɛ gole ‑o 'o Zesu 'la 'bhɛ a ‑janwoa 'ka ni 'bhɛ ma, ‑ 'kee‑ lii 'bhɛɛke a ‑janwoa 'ka ni 'ke 'bhɛ gole ‑o Lii 'Weŋ 'la 'ka 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwoa꞊ 'ka zru 'ɛ 'yi 'bhɛ ma; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ ‑bhɛɛke' do ꞊woa 'ka ni 'ke 'bhɛ gole ‑o 'o 'kɛla 'bhɛ ꞊woa 'ka ni 'bhɛ ma. ‑Mɛla ma 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ yrɛ do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ꞊nɔɔ bhe 'ka dɔ blaale‑ 'mu ꞊la ɛɛ?
Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, 'ka 'bhɛ winbɔwo mu 'la kun 'bhii‑ 'winbɔwo mu 'tɔbhɔle, 'mi 'kpee ma waa kan 'mi ta ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yi.

'Ali‑ 'ke 'naa ‑o 'ke ‑janwo' mi ‑gbɛnɛ 'le mɛɛ mu ‑yrɛ ta; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ ‑zayaangoleya a pɛ zi 'ɛ ta, 'mi 'a 'ke dɔ 'bhɛ 'yi. 'O 'bhɛ ‑zrɔnna 'ka ni 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba, 'bhɛ 'pegee klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yi.
'Mi ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wolawoa 'ka ni 'ke 'naa pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ kun 'ka 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi 'ŋ 'gbu mazinalawoa, 'kooko‑ 'ŋ 'ka mu ‑lawlɛn', taa‑ 'mi ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ ‑la ꞊kla 'bhɛ 'le bhe ɛɛ?

'Ŋ 'yaa‑ yewo 'zi 'ka mu ni 'ka ba 'waati 'la ba, 'mi ‑dwa ‑a ‑la 'ke 'ŋ Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu kun, 'kooko‑ 'ŋ sɔ bhɔle‑ 'ka mu ba. 'Ŋ ‑gɔli' ꞊kwan ‑o 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ 'naa yewolɛ ‑o ni, 'fɔ 'ŋ yewoa‑ 'ka mu ‑la ni.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'yaa‑ 'ka ba 'waati 'la ba, 'naa 'ŋ 'gbu 'kwe 'kpalɛ‑ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'wiiŋ‑ 'ke 'ŋ maza ‑yaa dɔ ‑gɔli' ma. ‑Amasrɔyi, 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ mu 'la ‑daa Masedwani 'mu ‑le 'ŋ maza ‑yaa pɛ 'oo pɛ 'la ma 'mu ꞊naa 'ŋ ni. ‑Za 'kpɛn 'yi, 'naa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke 'ŋ klɛ 'ka ta 'kwe 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ nu 'bhɛɛ‑ klɛlɛ 'taŋii.
'Bhɛ ‑le 'mi ‑baapɛ' 'le. 'Duŋ‑ Krisi a pɛ wlan 'ɛ ma, mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa nu 'bhɛ ‑baaza' 'ɛ 'saawole 'ŋ 'kɔɔ Akayi 'klɛɛn 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpɛn 'yi ‑gɛ.
'Ŋ 'bhɛ pe zii' win 'ɛ ‑dela ma ɛɛ? 'Bhɛ win le dɔɔ 'ka ‑za 'laa sɔ 'mi ni ɛɛ? 'Duŋ‑ 'ka ‑za sɔ 'ŋ ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu 'bhɛ 'yaango‑.

'Ŋ 'yoo‑ yewo 'zi 'ka ba gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ŋ nu bolɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ yewogbɛya do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ta. 'Ke 'ŋ 'bhɛ ꞊kla, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'a 'pe zii' ‑o 'gbu ma 'kaa ‑woo 'ke Zesu a 'winbɔwo mu 'le, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke ‑wa pe 'zi 'ezin‑ dɔɔ 'waa‑ pɛ yewogbɛya 'ɛ 'pegee ‑waa' pɛ mu 'ɛ ‑woo do, 'bhɛ zan mu laa sɔ 'mu 'gbu magbaandɛle.
'Bhɛ mɛɛ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'ke bhla ma Zesu a 'winbɔwo mu ‑la ‑le, ‑o woye 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke mɛɛ ‑yini' pɛ 'le. ‑Woo 'gbu klɛ 'bhii‑ Krisi a winbɔwo mu.
'Bhɛ 'laa ‑o 'ke 'kpeelɛni maza 'le 'o 'yrɛ 'yi, ‑amasrɔyi ‑Setran' 'a 'gbu mabɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e klɛ 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑mlɛkɛ' do 'la bhi ‑yrayra 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑.

'Bhɛ 'laa ‑o 'ke 'kpeelɛni maza 'le 'ezin‑, 'ke ‑yaa' pɛ yewonɛ mu 'ɛ ‑woo mabɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo 'gbu klɛ ‑Waanbhaa' a yewonɛ 'lɛdɔɔle mu 'le. 'Duŋ‑ ‑o ‑lɛyanyrɛ nu klɛlɛ 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑kpan baalele ‑o ta ‑o klɛza ‑yɔɔ' mu 'ɛ ma.

'Mi ‑o bɔ 'zi 'ezin‑ 'bhɛ ‑jan do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ta 'ke 'an pe 'ka ni dɔɔ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa 'mi 'kunlɛ‑ 'bhii‑ ‑kwanii' do. 'Duŋ‑ 'ke 'ka 'mi ꞊kwan 'bhii‑ ‑kwanii' do, ‑ka dɔ ‑a ‑la 'ke 'ka 'ka 'trɔnkpa 'mi 'wojan‑ 'ɛ ꞊la, 'kooko‑ 'mi sɔ 'ŋ 'wasowole sa.
'Mi ‑o 'kɛla 'wo zii' 'ke 'mi 'ŋ 'wasowo 'bhɛ 'laa ‑o da 'zi Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ba; 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑janwo' zii' 'bhii‑ ‑kwa ‑o 'ŋ 'yi.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, mɛɛ ‑bebe mu ‑o 'wasowo zii' ‑waa' bhaaplɛŋya 'ɛ ma, 'mi sɔ 'ŋ 'gbu 'wasowole 'ezin‑.
'E! Ka mu 'la 'ka ‑o ‑zadɔ' mu 'le, 'ka dɔ ‑a ‑la 'ke 'ka ‑kwanii' mu klɛza mu ‑yikun' ɛɛ!

Mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'ka klɛ ‑waa' lu mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o 'ka tabhle; 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑o 'ka 'kɔɔfleŋ balaa' 'ka 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'silele; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑woo 'ka mavɛɛ; 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑o 'ka 'trɔn zɔn, 'ka 'bhɛ zan mu 'ɛ klɛza mu 'ɛ 'yikun‑.
‑Ɛɛ! 'Bhɛ klɛ 'waa‑ faŋgankleya ‑la ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa 'sɔlɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'yansi za mu 'ɛ klɛle‑ ɛɛ? 'Ŋ bhe 'bhɛ ‑yraladɔ 'mi ma 'dɛ.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'kee‑ sɔ dɔle‑ mɛɛ 'ke 'kpee 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya baa ‑za 'ke 'yi; 'mi 'ezin‑ 'mi 'gbu sɔ 'bhɛ klɛle‑; 'ali‑ 'ke 'ŋ ‑janwoa 'bhii‑ ‑kwanii' do gbɛɛn‑.

'Ke ‑wa ꞊pia dɔɔ ‑woo 'ke Ebre mu 'le, 'mi 'duŋ‑ 'mi 'gbu ‑o Ebre mi 'le 'ezin‑. 'Ke ‑wa ꞊pia dɔɔ ‑woo 'ke Izraɛli mu 'le, 'duŋ‑ 'mi 'gbu ‑o 'ezin‑ 'ke Izraɛli mi 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑wa ꞊pia dɔɔ ‑woo 'ke Abraamu 'nranɛ‑ mu 'le, 'mi ‑o 'ezin‑ ‑a ‑nranɛ ‑kpɔsɔɔ 'ɛ do 'le.

'Ke ‑wa ꞊pia dɔɔ ‑woo 'ke Krisi a yewonɛ mu 'le, 'mi ‑o 'ezin‑ ‑yaa' yewonɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi kan ‑o 'kpɛn ta 'egbɔɔn gbɔɔnle'. 'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑janwo' zii' 'bhii‑ mɛɛ 'la zan 'gbu ŋgblo laa ‑o 'bhɛ ta. 'Mi yewoa꞊ 'ke 'bhɛ kan ‑o 'kpɛn ta, ‑o 'mi ꞊bwa ‑kaso 'yi 'ebebele 'ke 'bhɛ kan ‑o ta; ‑o 'mi tafia꞊ 'ebebele 'ke 'bhɛ kan ‑o ta. ‑A ‑lɛbwa sa 'ke 'ŋ 'winbo‑ ‑a ‑yi 'waati 'ke ba.
Zuufu mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'ŋ ꞊zwan gaan 'soo. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'ŋ zɔn gbɛ do do 'ɛ 'yi, ‑woo 'ŋ tafia꞊ gbaŋbhlɛ yan mia do bhɛ vu ta 'srwayiziɛ.
Romɛ mu 'ɛ 'mu 'ŋ tafia꞊ ‑glɔɔn yaga, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ mu kpoti mu ꞊paa 'ŋ ma ‑glɔɔn do 'ŋ dɛ zayi'. ‑Yitakoŋ 'ɛ 'siɛla‑ 'ŋ 'le ‑glɔɔn yaga wɛyi‑ 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ ‑bi do 'pegee ‑yrekpaa' do ꞊kla ‑yi 'ɛ ta.

'Ŋ ‑ja 'taa ‑bebe ta 'ŋ gaan ma; 'duŋ‑ 'bhɛ ꞊kla 'ebebele 'ke 'ŋ 'winbo‑ ‑a ‑yi bi yue 'pale‑ mu 'ɛ ba, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ dɛ mu 'ɛ 'kɔɔ. 'Ali‑ ‑a ‑lɛbwa sa 'ke 'ŋ 'winbo‑ ‑a ‑yi 'ŋ 'gbu a 'klɛɛn 'yi Zuufu mu 'ɛ 'pegee Zuufu kle mu 'ɛ 'kɔɔ. 'Kee‑ kpa ‑wa mu ta oo, 'kee‑ kpa ‑bɔnyi' yrɛ mu nɔɔ‑ ta oo, 'kee‑ kpa wɛyi‑ ta oo, 'kee‑ kpa yrɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ta, ‑a ‑lɛbwa sa 'ke 'ŋ 'gbu winbo‑ ‑a ‑yi. 'Ali‑ 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ mu 'la ‑wa pe ‑o 'gbu ma dɔɔ ‑woo 'ke Zesu 'yi mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ 'ke waa ‑o 'bhɛ 'le wlan 'ɛ ma, ‑a ‑lɛbwa sa 'ke 'ŋ 'winbo‑ ‑a ‑yi 'mu 'kɔɔ.

'Mi ye ‑glɔɔ mu ꞊woa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'trɛbhwa꞊. 'Waati ‑bebe ba, yi laa 'sɔlɛ‑ 'kpale 'ŋ 'yrɛ ta. 'Mi gbɔn 'pegee ‑yi 'mi ‑lrɔ 'yikwan꞊. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'waati ‑bebe ba, 'mi 'suŋwlaa‑ kpaŋma. 'Mi ꞊bwa 'ebebele ‑niinii' 'yi 'ŋ tafleŋ‑ 'le.
'Naa sɔ ‑a 'kpɛn 'pele. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ kpa 'kɛla bhe 'bhɛ ta, yi 'oo yi, Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'klaŋkeba mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'ŋgami ‑o 'ŋ ma.
'Ke Zesu 'yi mi do 'kpaleya faŋgan‑ ‑gwa ‑a ta, 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ la 'mi ma 'bhii‑ 'mi 'gbu ‑le 'ke 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ 'le. 'Ke mɛɛ do ‑balaa' ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'yi, 'bhɛ 'la 'ŋ ma 'kee‑ kan a ‑daŋ' ta.
'Kee‑ 'kpa bi 'bhii‑ 'mi sɔ 'ŋ 'gbu magbaandɛle, 'mi 'yaa‑ nu 'ŋ magbaandɛlɛ 'mi 'gbu a faŋgankleya 'ɛ 'yi.
Mɛɛzan Zesu Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'naa bhla pe. Bhaa mɔkpɛn' 'a 'tɔbhɔ 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba!
‑Yrekpaa' do, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ 'waati 'la ba Damasi, 'bhɛ ꞊nɔɔ ‑bhleŋgbe Aretasi a ‑janmatii 'ɛ ‑ya ꞊pia mɛɛ 'ke mu ni dɔɔ 'mu 'e 'yrɛkpa zi mu 'la wla ‑wa 'ɛ 'kpee 'mu ba 'mi kun zayi'.

Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ 'mu 'mi ꞊bwa ciɛ do 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o bhlɛ ‑yrela bhɛ ma; 'ke ‑woo 'ŋ 'kanle 'fɛgwlɛ‑ 'ɛ trala, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo 'ŋ zinaa' ‑a zanta'. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ŋ ꞊swa ‑bhile' 'yee‑ ‑janmatii 'ɛ 'kɔɔ.
'Ŋ sɔ 'ŋ 'gbu magbaandɛle ɛɛ? 'Duŋ‑ 'bhɛ 'laa ‑za 'ke 'yanwo‑ mɛɛ ma. 'Ŋ 'yoo‑ zan Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑za mu 'la ‑zrɔnna 'ŋ ni ‑yrɛ zi yele 'yi 'mu ba janwolɛ.

'Mi Krisi 'yi mi do dɔ, ‑za do ꞊kla ‑a ni 'bhɛ lɛɛ vu ta yiziɛ ‑le ‑gɛ ‑zɔn. 'Bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ ‑Waanbhaa' 'a ꞊sia, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑ja 'kɛle‑ 'bhɛ 'yaayrɛ‑ 'ɛ ꞊nɔɔ laflɛ' ‑daŋ' ma. 'Ke ‑ya ꞊sia kpataakpa ‑a 'flɛ 'ɛ 'yi oo, 'ke ‑ya ꞊sia ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑yrɛ zi yele ‑la ‑yi oo, 'naa 'bhɛ dɔ. ‑Waanbhaa' do ‑kplɛn ‑le 'bhɛ dɔ.

'Mi 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑ja 'bhɛ 'gwlaan‑ 'ɛ 'le 'fɔpe laflɛ' ‑daŋ' ma. 'Duŋ‑ 'kee‑ ‑ja ‑a 'flɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yi oo, 'ke yaa gelɛ 'bhɛ 'yi oo, 'naa 'bhɛ dɔ 'ke yaa 'e go ‑Waanbhaa' do ‑kplɛn ba.

‑Waanbhaa' 'a 'silawoa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑ja 'kɛle‑ 'bhɛ ba, 'kee‑ ‑jan 'ke mu male‑ 'bhɛ ꞊nɔɔ: yaa dɔ bhaaplɛŋ 'kpee 'kee‑ 'bhɛ ‑jan mu 'ɛ wo bhaaplɛŋ wli 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'seŋ 'laa ‑o bhaaplɛŋ ni 'kee‑ 'bhɛ wo.
'Mi sɔ 'mi ‑baale' 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'yi; 'duŋ‑ 'mi 'naa sɔ 'ŋ ‑baale' 'ŋ 'gbu 'yi. 'Mi sɔ 'ŋ ‑baale' pɛ 'la 'yi 'bhɛ ‑le 'mi a pɛ faŋgankleya 'ɛ 'le.

'Ke 'mi 'yaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'mi 'ŋ 'gbu magbaandɛ, 'naa ‑yaa nu klɛlɛ ‑kwanii' 'le, 'ŋ 'yaa‑ nu wlan 'te ‑la pelɛ. 'Duŋ‑ 'naa ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'mi 'ŋ 'gbu magbaandɛ, 'kooko‑ 'mi ‑o ‑za ‑glɔɔn 'la klɛ 'zi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'mi ‑o ‑jan ‑glɔɔn 'la 'wo zii' mɛɛ mu ‑yrɛ ma, waa nu 'ŋ 'yelɛ‑ mɛɛ gblaan do 'le 'ke 'bhɛ kan 'mu ta.

'Bhɛ mɛɛ 'kpeelɛni maza ‑gbɛnɛ mu 'la ‑e 'mu ‑zrɔnna 'ŋ ni ‑yrɛ zi yele 'ɛ 'yi 'mu ‑zayi', 'bhɛ 'pegee, 'kooko‑ 'naa 'ŋ 'gbu magbaandɛ 'mu 'yi, 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛn 'yɔɔ‑ do ꞊kpaa 'ŋ 'flɛ 'ɛ ta; 'bhɛ ‑o 'bhii‑ ‑Setran' a winbɔwo mi do 'la 'woye‑ ‑le 'ke ‑yrɛnkpalele 'ŋ ta, 'kooko‑ 'naa sɔ 'ŋ 'gbu magbaandɛle.
'Mi ‑sromabwa Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ni ‑glɔɔn yaga dɔɔ ‑yoo 'ŋ go 'bhɛ ‑yrɛn 'ɛ 'yi; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑yaa dɔlɛ ‑a ꞊la.
Drɔɔn' ‑ya ꞊pia 'ŋ ni dɔɔ: «'Ŋ lilawo zii' 'e ma, 'bhɛ 'e 'yibhɔ‑, ‑amasrɔyi 'ke faŋgan‑ 'laa ‑o 'e ta 'waati 'la ba, 'mi a pɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ zrɔn bhla ‑le 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le.»
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, ‑e sɔ 'mi ni 'ke 'mi 'ŋ 'gbu baa 'ŋ 'gbu a faŋgankleya 'ɛ 'yi, 'kooko‑ Krisi a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'bhɛ bo 'ŋ ta.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'ŋ zrukpaale ‑o 'ke faŋgan‑ 'laa ‑o 'ŋ ta oo, 'ke ‑woo 'ŋ ‑zwanwoa oo, 'ke ‑za ‑glɔɔ ‑o 'ŋ ta oo, 'ke ‑o ‑yrɛnkpaa 'ŋ ta oo, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o 'trɛbhɔ ꞊kpaa 'ŋ ta oo, 'mi 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'ŋ 'mu 'kpɛn 'yikun zii' Krisi ‑la ‑zayi'. ‑Amasrɔyi 'ke faŋgan‑ 'laa ‑o 'ŋ ta 'waati 'la ba, Krisi 'bhɛ a pɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ wla 'ŋ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waati 'ɛ ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ dɔ 'eglɔɔle.

'Mi ‑o ‑janwo' zii' 'bhii‑ ‑kwanii' do gbɛɛn‑! 'Duŋ‑ 'bhɛ ‑daa 'ka mu 'gbu ‑la ba. 'Ka mu 'gbu ‑le ‑yaa sɔ 'mi 'tɔ wlan pele‑ mɛɛ mu ‑yrɛ ma. 'Ali‑ 'ke 'naa ‑o 'ke pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'le 'ka 'yrɛ 'yi, 'ka ‑o 'kaa‑ winbɔwo mu 'tɔbhɔle mu 'la ‑za 'kun zii' 'eglɔɔle, 'mu mabhaa laa bhɔ 'mi ta ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yi.

'Ŋ 'yaa‑ 'ka ba ye 'waati 'la ba, 'ka 'ŋ zrubakpaagbɛya ‑gbɛnɛ 'ɛ ꞊ya. 'Ka ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'tɔɔmasie mu 'ɛ ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn ꞊ya, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'kpeelɛni maza ‑gbɛnɛ mu 'pegee 'sɔle‑ maza mu. 'Bhɛ klɛza mu 'la bhe, 'mu ‑le 'a zrɔn 'bhii‑ 'mi ‑o 'ke Zesu a 'winbɔwo mi 'le.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'mi ‑mɛ pɛ ‑za 'wlan ‑la ꞊kla ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ ‑vin mu 'ɛ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'naa 'bhɛ 'yansi za klɛlɛ 'ka mu ni ɛɛ? 'Ke yaa 'e go 'naa klɛlawolɛ 'ka ta 'kwe 'le 'bhɛ ba. 'Ke ‑yoo 'bhɛ 'le, 'ka 'zoole‑, 'ŋ ŋgblo ‑o 'ka gaan ‑la 'bhɛ ma.

'Mi ‑o zan gelɛ 'an 'taa yaga mi 'la ta 'ka ba ye bhe, 'naa nu 'ŋ 'gbu 'lɛbɔ‑ 'kwe 'kpalɛ‑ 'ka 'wiiŋ‑. 'Naa ‑o 'ka 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu 'ɛ zi, 'duŋ‑ 'ka mu 'gbu ‑la ‑za ‑o 'ŋ ma.
