‑Amasrɔyi, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ zan ‑jan 'la 'wolɛ‑ 'ka ni ‑gɛ, 'ŋ 'bhɛ ꞊woa gban 'ka ni 'elwale, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'yoo‑ bɔ 'zi ‑a ta 'ezin‑ 'ke wisile 'le dɔɔ mɛɛ ‑bebe 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'bhii‑ Krisi ‑gaa ‑yrigbɛɛle 'ɛ ta win 'la ma waa 'bhɛ 'klɔsikun.

'Duŋ‑ 'bhɛ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'lɛyanyrɛ ‑le 'ke ‑jranama 'tɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑o yri bo ‑o bhle pɛle ta 'bhii‑ mɛɛ yri bo ‑Waanbhaa' ta gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑yraladɔ maza 'le, ‑woo baa 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yi. ‑O 'trɛ ta za mu 'te ‑la yiɛnkan.
'Duŋ‑ 'o mɔɔ a pɛ yaayrɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' ba laflɛ' 'yi. 'Woo‑ 'Bhee Mi Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi magbɛn 'zi, 'kee‑ da 'bhɛ ꞊nɔɔ ye, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e nu ‑gɛ.

'Bhɛ 'yi 'tɛ, ‑e nu ‑kɔɔa' ‑yrɛndɛ' ma 'flɛ mu 'ɛ mabɔɔlɛ, 'bhɛɛ ‑yoo klɛ 'flɛ drɛɛ mu 'le 'bhii‑ ‑yaa' pɛ 'flɛ 'tɔbhɔle 'la yaa ga ‑titi 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑, ‑yaa' ‑glɔɔya' 'la 'kee nu pɛ 'kpɛn ŋgblo 'kpaalɛ‑ ‑a 'gbu ꞊la 'bhɛ 'le 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi bhe, 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'yiɛnii mu, 'ka 'lrɔ ‑o 'ŋ ma 'egbɛnɛle. 'Ka mu ‑le 'mi a pɛ zrukpaa' win 'ɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mi 'ŋ baa 'ka mu ‑la ‑yi. ‑Ka dɔ klɛn, 'ŋ 'yiɛnii mu 'ke 'ka bo 'ka 'pegee Mɛɛzan a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi.
Evodi 'pegee Sɛntisi, 'mi ‑sromabɔ 'ka ni dɔɔ ‑ka 'kpa do ma, 'ka 'pegee Mɛɛzan a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ezin‑ 'bhi 'ŋ yewoyɔɔn 'la zru ‑o do 'mi ni, 'mi ‑sromabɔ 'bhi ni dɔɔ bhɔ 'woo‑ le plɛ 'la bhe ‑o ba. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑woo 'sɛnɛ 'gbu ‑gbaanna 'ŋ zi ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ zɛnlele, 'woo‑ mu 'pegee Klema, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'an yewo 'yɔɔn ‑vin mu 'ɛ. ‑O 'tɔ mu 'ɛ yɔɔndɛle ‑o bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'la ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma 'bhɛ 'sɛwɛ 'yi.
'Ka zrukpaale klɛ 'taŋii 'ka 'pegee Mɛɛzan a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi. 'Mi ‑o bɔ 'zi 'yee‑ ‑jan do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ta dɔɔ: 'Ka zrukpaale klɛ!
‑Kaa 'to 'ke mɔkpɛn' 'kaa‑ ‑yidɔɔya 'ɛ ye. Mɛɛzan nu bhla ‑o zan bhɔlɛ.
'Ka 'laa 'ka 'ŋgamiwolɛ ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yi. 'Duŋ‑ 'ke 'ka maza ‑o pɛ 'oo pɛ 'la ma, ‑ka 'bhɛ 'yrɛwo ‑Waanbhaa' ma 'seri 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa 'pubɔ‑ 'bhɛ ta 'ezin‑.
'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a yilabla 'la kan bhaaplɛŋ mu sɔ ‑za mu 'la yimale 'mu 'kpɛn ta, 'bhɛ nu 'ka zrubakpaalɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'ka 'nii‑ zɛn 'ka ta 'ka 'pegee Zesu Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ŋ zi jan 'la ꞊bwa 'bhɛ ‑le gɛ: Wlan maza oo, ‑gasikpale oo, ‑lɛdɔɔle oo, ‑za bakanle oo, ‑za 'la sɔ ‑Waanbhaa ni oo, ‑za 'lrele‑ oo, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ 'tɔbhɔ maza, 'ka 'yri bo 'bhɛ ‑za ‑glɔɔn mu 'lɛɛ‑ 'mu ‑la 'kpɛn ta.

'Ka ‑za 'la ‑daanna 'ŋ ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑za 'la 'srɔɔwoa‑ 'ŋ 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka ‑za 'la ꞊maa 'ŋ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑za 'la klɛle ‑ya 'ŋ 'kɔɔ, ‑ka 'bhɛ 'yi za mu klɛ. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'la yilabla na mɛɛ ni, 'bhɛ nu klɛlɛ 'ka ba.

'Ŋ zrukpaale ‑o 'egbɛnɛle 'mi 'pegee Mɛɛzan a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi; ‑amasrɔyi, 'kaa zrɔn gbɛ drɛɛwoa‑ 'bhii‑ 'ŋ ‑za ‑o 'ka 'kpee 'ezin‑. 'Ka 'kpeelɛdanle ‑yaa ‑a ta 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑za 'wlan klɛ 'ŋ ni. 'Duŋ‑ 'bhɛ 'seŋ ‑le 'laa ‑yaa 'ka ni.

Yaa klɛlɛ 'bhii‑ 'ŋ maza ‑o pɛ 'ke ma 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'yoo‑ 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ 'wo zii'. Drɔɔn', 'ke pɛ 'oo pɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'ŋ 'kɔɔ, 'kee‑ ꞊kla 'ebebele oo, 'kee‑ ꞊kla sanɛ‑ oo, 'mi daanle ‑o 'bhɛ 'le 'ke 'mi 'ŋ zrukpalaa pɛ yɛkɛ‑ 'la ‑yoo 'ŋ 'kɔɔ 'bhɛ ma.

'Ŋ sɔ bole‑ 'bhii‑ 'kɔɔfleŋzan, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ sɔ bole bhii' pɛzan 'ke pɛ ‑paa 'ŋ ta. 'Waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba, 'bhɛ 'pegee yrɛ 'kpɛn nɔɔ‑, 'ŋ daanle ‑o 'ke 'ŋ zrukpaale 'le ‑za ma: 'Ke 'ŋ kpɛ dɔle ‑kla oo, 'ke gbɔn ‑o 'ŋ dɛ 'zi oo, 'ke 'ŋ 'kɔɔ 'paa‑ oo, 'ke 'ŋ 'kɔɔfleŋ‑ ‑kla oo, 'ŋ daanle ‑o 'ŋ zrukpaalele ‑za 'kpɛn 'yi 'waati 'kpɛn ba.
'Ŋ sɔ ‑za 'kpɛn klɛle‑, Krisi 'la faŋgandɔ 'mi ta 'bhɛ 'srɔyi.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'ŋ 'yrɛbatɛ 'yaa‑ 'waati 'la ba, 'ka 'bhɔlawoa 'ŋ ba, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑za 'lrele‑ 'le.

'Ka mu Filipu mu, 'ka 'gbu 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ ‑a 'san 'ŋ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wole‑ zisaan, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ŋ go Masedwani ‑wa 'ɛ ta, Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛ 'bhɛɛke do 'kpɔ 'laa 'bhɔlɛ‑ 'ŋ ba ‑o 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu 'le, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke ‑o 'mi a ye 'ɛ ma ‑trɔn 'ɛ 'ke 'srɔɔwo‑, 'ke yaa 'e go 'ka mu a Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ do ‑kplɛn ba.
'Ka mu ‑le 'bhɛ ꞊kla. 'Ali‑ 'ŋ 'yaa‑ bhla 'la ba Tesaloniki 'ka 'ŋ glaan' ꞊kpaa 'ŋ maza ‑yaa pɛ mu 'la ba 'mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'bhɛ ꞊kla ‑glɔɔn plɛ.
Yaa klɛlɛ 'bhii‑ 'mi ‑o 'ka 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu ‑la ‑glin 'zi. 'Mi ‑o pɛ 'la 'bhɛ zi 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ 'ke 'ka 'ka klɛza ‑lrele' mu 'ɛ ma ‑trɔn 'srɔɔwo‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o pa 'ka ta.

'Ka 'ŋ glaan' 'kpaa‑ pɛ mu 'la ba, 'ŋ 'mu 'kpɛn 'srɔɔwoa‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ drɔɔn', ‑o ‑paa 'ŋ ta. 'Kee‑ 'san Epafroditi ꞊nwa 'woo‑ pɛ mu 'ɛ 'le 'ŋ ni, 'ŋ 'kɔɔ 'pale‑ ‑o. ‑Woo 'bhii‑ 'sraka 'la ‑gblɛn nra 'bhii‑ ‑lasiklɔɔ gbɛɛn‑. 'Bhɛ 'sraka ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le sɔ ‑Waanbhaa ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya ‑lɛkun'.
'Mi 'kpale‑ ‑o 'mi a ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi, 'bhii ‑e nu 'ka maza ‑o pɛ 'oo pɛ 'la ma 'mu 'nalɛ‑ 'ka ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ e 'mu pa 'ka ta Zesu Krisi 'srɔyi, ‑yaa' 'tɔbhɔleya ‑gbɛnɛ 'ɛ ma.
‑Kɔɔ' ‑kɔɔ Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'ɛ 'tɔbhɔ yikpɛnsee ta! Amiina!
‑Ka ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'pubɔ‑ 'ŋ ni ‑kɔɔ' 'pegee Zesu Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ ma. ‑Kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'la ‑woo 'ŋ ‑din ‑gɛ 'mu 'ka 'pubwa‑ 'ezin‑.
‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'la 'kpɛn ‑o ‑gɛ, 'mu 'kpɛn 'ka 'pubwa‑; 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o yewo 'zi ‑Bhleŋgbe ‑gbɛnɛ Sezaa 'ɛ 'fɛ 'ɛ ꞊la, 'mu 'ka 'pubwa‑ 'egbɛnɛle 'ezin‑.
Bhaa Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi a ‑lileya 'ɛ bo 'ka ta.
Colossians: 'Mi Pɔlu 'la 'ŋ 'yoo‑ 'ke Zesu Krisi a winbɔwo mi 'le ‑Waanbhaa' zru maza ma, 'mi 'pegee 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mi Timote ‑le 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpa zii',

'ka mu 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ mu 'ɛ ni, 'ka mu 'la 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' 'ka ꞊kpaa 'edaŋma ‑yaa' mɛɛ mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ka blɔɔle‑ ‑o Krisi a ‑za 'ɛ ma Kolɔsi wa 'ɛ ta. Bhaa ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yaa' 'duma 'pegee ‑yaa' yilabla 'ɛ 'na 'ka ni.
Yi 'oo yi, 'ke 'woo‑ 'o 'seriwo zii' 'kaa‑ ‑za ma, 'o Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑.
‑Amasrɔyi 'wa ꞊maa dɔɔ 'ka 'kpale ‑o Zesu Krisi 'yi 'eglɔɔle, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑za sɔ 'ka ni.

'Kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'pegee 'kaa‑ 'sɔniya 'ɛ kli gbaanle ‑o 'ka 'yrikpale ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' pɛ mu 'la ꞊twa 'ka 'lɛɛ laflɛ' 'yi 'mu ‑la ta. ‑A 'san 'ka wlan ma ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ ꞊lwa ma, 'ka 'yrikpale bole ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ pɛ mu 'ɛ ta.

‑O 'yee ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ do 'kpɔ 'la 'wo zii' 'ka ba ye, 'bhɛ ‑la do ‑kplɛn 'wole‑ 'ɛ zɛn 'zi 'drunyan 'ɛ 'yi yrɛkpɛn‑ ꞊nɔɔ 'ezin‑. 'Bhɛla‑ 'a 'to zii' 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ mu ‑o ‑za 'lrele‑ mu klɛ 'zi, 'bhii‑ ‑ya ‑kla 'ka mu ba gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ ‑a 'san 'ke 'ka ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑lileya 'ɛ ꞊lwa 'ɛ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa ꞊ya 'bhii‑ ‑yoo 'ke wlan 'le bhe.
'Waa‑ yewoyɔɔn Epafrasi 'la ‑za sɔ 'o ni 'egbɛnɛle, 'bhɛ ‑le 'ka ‑daanna 'bhɛ ‑za mu 'ɛ 'le; 'bhɛ ‑la blɔɔle ‑o Krisi a ye 'ɛ ma 'ka ba ye.
Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ‑Waanbhaa' a 'sɔniya 'la ꞊kpaa 'ka 'kpee, 'yele‑ ꞊nwa 'bhɛ 'pelɛ‑ 'o ni.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, ‑a 'san 'o 'ka ta jan 'ɛ ma, 'kee‑ kpa ‑yrekpaa' ma oo, 'kee kpa ‑bi zi ma oo, 'waa ploo 'o 'seriwole ma 'kaa‑ ‑za ma 'ezin‑. 'Woo 'seriwo ‑Waanbhaa' ni, 'kooko‑ 'ka sɔ ‑a zru maza 'ɛ dɔle‑; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ sɔ ‑zadɔleya 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'pegee yikan' 'nale 'ka ni ‑a Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'le.

'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, 'ka 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ sɔ Mɛɛzan Zesu 'lɛdɔle ‑a ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka sɔ ‑a zru maza klɛle‑ yikpɛn‑ ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka nu 'sɔlɛ‑ ‑za 'wlan 'kpɛn ‑glɔɔn klɛle‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa‑ ‑Waanbhaa' dɔle 'ɛ baan' kla ‑a ba.
'Woo 'seriwo 'ezin‑ ‑a ni dɔɔ ‑e ‑yaa' 'tɔbhɔleya ma ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'bhɛ zɛn 'ka ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'fuudɔ‑ 'ka ta, 'kooko‑ 'ka sɔ ‑yrɛn 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑glɔɔn 'yikunle 'ka zrubakpaale 'le.
‑Ka ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'ka zrukpaale 'le, ‑amasrɔyi, ‑ya ꞊kla 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka dɔ ‑o ‑e 'ciɛn 'la ꞊twa ‑yaa' mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'la ‑woo 'taawo zii' ‑yaa' 'tɛbhile 'ɛ ba 'bhɛ ba.
Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑kɔɔ' ‑gwa ‑Setran' 'la ‑yoo ‑gblo ti ‑gbɛnɛ 'ɛ 'yi 'bhɛ ‑a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ ‑e ‑nwa ‑kɔɔ' 'le ‑a Gbe 'la ‑za sɔ ‑a ni 'egbɛnɛle 'bhɛ a ‑bhleŋgbeya ‑wa 'ɛ ta.
A Gbe Zesu gale 'ɛ 'bhɛla‑ 'srɔyi 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑kɔɔ' tagbawoa, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑e ‑kɔɔa' ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ ma ‑sroma ꞊yaan.
Zesu Krisi ‑le ‑Waanbhaa' 'la waa ye 'bhɛ bhɔɔma kpataakpa 'ɛ 'le. 'Yele‑ ‑yaa 'trɛ ta pɛ 'kpɛn klɛle ‑lɛɛ.

‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' pɛ 'kpɛn ꞊kla 'yela‑ gbɛ zi: laflɛ' 'yi pɛ mu oo, 'trɛ ta pɛ mu oo, ‑yrɛ pɛ mu 'la ye oo, 'bhɛɛ‑ waa sɔ pɛ mu 'la 'yele oo, ‑bhleŋgbe 'klɛɛn mu oo, ‑o ‑yi ‑bhleŋgbe mu oo, mɛɛ gblaan mu oo, ‑Waanbhaa' pɛ 'kpɛn ꞊kla Zesu Krisi ‑la gbɛ zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑yoo 'kpɛn ꞊kla 'yela‑ ni.
‑E ‑yaa ‑a ‑yrɛ ma 'drunyan ta pɛ 'kpɛn 'lɛɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a faŋgan‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'drunyan ta pɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn to ‑o dulayrɛ mu 'ɛ ꞊nɔɔ.

'Yee‑ Krisi ‑le ‑a 'gbu 'flɛ 'ɛ ŋgblo 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a 'flɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ‑waa' 'klaŋkeba 'ɛ 'le. 'Yele‑ ‑za 'kpɛn zisanyrɛ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yela‑ ꞊lwa ‑bwela gale ba, 'kooko‑ ‑a 'kpaale klɛ pɛ 'kpɛn 'wiiŋ‑.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑e ‑swa ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ni 'ke ‑wa dɔgbɛya 'ɛ 'kpɛn ye 'yee‑ Krisi ‑la ‑yi.

Zesu 'srɔyi, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑dwa ‑a ‑la 'kee‑ 'yee‑ 'pegee 'drunyan ta pɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn kpa do ma: 'e pe laanima pɛ mu oo, 'e pe 'trɛ ta pɛ mu oo, ‑o 'kpɛn. Zesu yiɛn 'la 'klalaa ‑yrigbɛɛle 'ɛ ta, bhɛ ‑la ‑zayi' 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' yilabla ꞊wlaa 'yee 'gbu 'pegee bhaaplɛŋ mu pleŋ‑.
'Ka mu, 'ka pleŋgole ‑yaa ‑Waanbhaa' ma 'elwale ‑sɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'yaa‑ ‑a ‑sɔɔnnii' mu 'le 'ka klɛza ‑yɔɔ' mu 'ɛ 'pegee 'ka 'kpeejan‑ ‑yɔɔ' mu 'ɛ ma.

'Duŋ‑ ‑zɔn, ‑Waanbhaa' 'ka mu 'pegee 'yee‑ 'gbu ꞊kpaa do ma Zesu gale ma 'bhɛ a bhaaplɛŋ 'flɛ 'ɛ 'yi. ‑E 'bhɛ ꞊kla, 'kooko‑ ‑e sɔ 'ka dulale' 'yee‑ 'gbu ‑Waanbhaa' 'yrɛ ꞊la 'ke 'ka klɛ 'weŋ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke waa ‑la yrɛ ye 'ka ta ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke waa ‑sɔŋ' bhɛ do ye 'ka ma.

'Duŋ‑ 'ka kli gbaanle bo 'eglɔɔle 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'yi; 'ka 'yrikpale ‑o pɛ 'la ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ka 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwoa‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'yi, 'ka 'laa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'a klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ploo 'bhɛ ‑yrikpagbɛya 'ɛ ma ‑titi. 'Ka 'yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'la ꞊maa, ‑o 'yela‑ wo 'zi 'drunyan 'ɛ 'yi yrɛkpɛn‑ ꞊nɔɔ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ni; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'mi Pɔlu ꞊kla ‑yaa' yewonɛ 'le 'yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'yela‑ wole 'kaama‑.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'mi ‑o ‑yrɛnlabhle zii' ‑zɔn 'ka mu ni, 'bhɛ 'mi zrukpalaa. ‑Amasrɔyi, 'ŋ ‑yrɛn mu 'la 'bhle zii' ‑gɛ 'ŋ 'flɛ 'yi, 'bhɛ mu ‑o Krisi ‑yrɛn mu 'la ꞊bhla 'mu ‑lɛpa' pɛ 'le. 'Mi ‑o 'bhɛ ‑yrɛn mu 'ɛ 'bhle zii' Zesu Krisi 'flɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ni; 'bhɛ 'flɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'le.
‑Waanbhaa' 'mi ꞊kla Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ ‑waa' yewonɛ 'le 'ka mu ni, 'ke 'ŋ 'yee‑ ‑jan 'ɛ wo 'ka ni 'ke 'an 'lɛyan a ma.
'Bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑la tagaanle ꞊bwa bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn 'lɛɛ, 'kee‑ 'san ‑Waanbhaa' 'drunyan klɛ. 'Duŋ‑ ‑zɔn, ‑e 'bhɛ ‑zrɔnna ‑yaa' pɛ mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'ɛ ni.

‑Trɔn ‑gbɛnɛ 'la ‑yoo 'bhɛ gaanyiza 'ɛ 'yi 'drunyan 'yi 'si mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ lele bhe, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yaa ‑a zi 'bhii‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ‑o 'bhɛ dɔ. 'Bhɛ gaanyiza 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le ‑gɛ: Krisi ‑o 'ka zru mu 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya klɛ 'ke 'ka 'yrikpale bo ‑a ta 'bhii‑ 'ka nu klɛlɛ ‑Waanbhaa' a 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ 'yi.

'Bhɛ 'yi bhe, 'o mɔɔ ‑janwo' zii' 'yee‑ Krisi ‑la ba zayi' mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ni, 'ke 'o zruwla mɛɛ 'tɔle‑ mɛɛ 'bhɛ 'kpee, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'woo‑ daan ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑zadɔleya 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le. 'Kooko‑ 'ke 'o mɛɛ 'tɔle‑ mɛɛ 'bhɛ zrɔn ‑Waanbhaa' ni ‑a ‑lɛpalele Krisi 'srɔyi.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayi', 'ŋ 'yoo‑ dɔ 'zi 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'ŋ yewo Krisi a faŋgan‑ ma ‑glɔɔya' 'la ‑yoo 'ŋ 'yi 'bhɛ 'le.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ dɔ 'zi 'eglɔɔle 'ka mu ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ka 'bhɛ dɔ. 'Ŋ 'yoo‑ dɔ 'zi 'eglɔɔle 'ka mu 'pegee Laodise mu 'ɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'kpɛn 'laa 'ŋ 'yelɛ‑ ‑lido' 'mu ‑laa' ‑za ma.

'Ŋ 'yoo‑ 'bhɛ klɛ 'zi, 'kooko‑ ‑woo zru dɔ 'eglɔɔle, 'ke ‑o 'kpale‑ klɛ do ma 'sɔniya 'ɛ 'yi; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o 'pale‑ klɛ 'ke 'yikanle 'le. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑o nu ‑Waanbhaa' a gaanyiza 'ɛ dɔlɛ, 'bhɛ gaanyiza 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke Krisi 'le.
‑Waanbhaa' a ‑zadɔleya 'ɛ 'yi pɛ ‑lrele' mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'pegee ‑yaa' ‑zayaangole 'ɛ 'yi pɛ ‑lrele' mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn magaanle ‑o 'yee‑ Krisi ‑la ‑yi.
'Ŋ 'yoo‑ 'bhɛ 'pe zii' 'ka ni bhe, 'kooko‑ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa 'ka 'yini‑ ‑a ‑lɛ ma ‑nra jan mu 'ɛ 'le.
‑Ali‑ 'ke 'ŋ 'pleŋgole ‑o 'ka ma 'ŋ 'flɛ 'ɛ 'yi, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ 'ka ‑din 'ŋ 'nii‑ 'ɛ 'yi. 'An 'malawoa dɔɔ 'ka ‑o 'taawo zii' 'elrele, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'kpale‑ ‑o Krisi 'yi 'eglɔɔle, 'bhɛ 'ŋ zrukpalaa.
'Bhɛ ‑ya 'ɛ 'yi bhe, 'ka Zesu Krisi ꞊sia 'kaa Mɛɛzan 'le gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, ‑ka 'taawo ‑a zi 'elrele.

'Ka kli gbaanle bo ‑a ta 'bhii‑ ‑yri 'sɛnɛ mu 'ɛ 'trɛ kun ‑a ‑la gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'ka 'si 'ɛ dɔ 'yela‑ ta. ‑Ka bo 'eglɔɔle 'taŋii 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhii‑ ‑o 'ka ‑daanna dɔɔ 'kaa klɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ bhe; 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑ka ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'ka nii‑ 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le ‑e ‑za mu 'la ꞊kla 'ka ni 'mu ma.

‑Ka 'ka 'yrɛkpa 'ka 'gbu ba 'elrele, 'kooko‑ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa 'ka 'yini bhaaplɛŋ mu a bhaama ‑zadɔle mu 'ɛ 'le; 'bhɛ bhaama ‑zadɔle mu 'ɛ kli gbaanle ‑o bhaaplɛŋ mu a 'si ta za mu ‑la ta, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑waa' 'kpeelɛdangbɛya mu 'ɛ 'drunyan 'yi ‑za mu ma. 'Duŋ‑ 'bhɛ 'kpeelɛdangbɛya mu 'ɛ gole ‑o Krisi a pɛ ‑zadɔleya 'ɛ ma.
‑Amasrɔyi, ‑Waanbhaa' dɔgbɛya 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑o Krisi a bhaaplɛŋ 'flɛ 'ɛ 'yi.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka pɛ 'kpɛn 'srɔɔwoa‑ 'ka mu 'pegee Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi. 'Yela‑ 'kpaale ‑o ‑kuŋlii mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'pegee 'seŋ 'tɔle‑ 'seŋ 'mu 'kpɛn 'wiiŋ‑.

'Ka mu 'pegee Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑o 'ka ꞊wlaa 'klɛɛn 'yi 'yee‑ Krisi 'yi. Yaa pɛ 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi wlale 'ɛ bhaaplɛŋ laa 'bhɛ klɛlɛ ‑a gbɛ ‑le. 'Duŋ‑ ‑yaa' pɛ 'klɛɛn 'yi 'wlale‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'ka ‑gwa 'ka 'joo gwe mu 'ɛ 'pegee 'kaa‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ 'yi.

‑O 'ka 'wiiŋfɛlawoa ‑yi ba, ‑e ꞊kla 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑gaa, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o 'ka 'pegee Krisi ꞊bian 'eke‑ 'yi; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'pegee 'yee‑ ‑bwela 'eke‑ 'yi gale ba. ‑Amasrɔyi 'ka 'ka ꞊kpaa ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑glɔɔya' 'la 'bhɛ Krisi ‑bwela ba 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yi.

'Elwaleta, 'ka 'yaa‑ 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑gaa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ 'yi 'kaa‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ ‑zayi', 'bhɛ 'pegee 'kaa‑ 'klɛɛn 'yi wlalekleya 'ɛ ‑zayi'. 'Duŋ‑ ‑zɔn, ‑Waanbhaa' bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'na gbɛ drɛɛwoa‑ 'ka ni 'ka 'pegee Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑kɔɔa' ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑sroma ‑yaan ‑kɔɔ' ni.

‑Kɔɔ' klɛza ‑yɔɔ' mu 'la 'kpɛn yɔɔndɛle ‑yaa, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'sɛwɛ 'kpaale ‑yaa ‑kɔɔ' 'kaama‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'toŋ mu 'la 'yisiɛla 'mu ‑zayi'; Krisi 'bhɛ 'sɛwɛ 'yɔɔ‑ 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'liila‑; ‑amasrɔyi ‑e ‑kɔɔ' ma 'kiti 'kwe ꞊sia a ga ‑yrigbɛɛle 'ɛ ta.

Krisi gaza 'ɛ ‑yrigbɛɛle 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛ 'srɔyi, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑glɔɔya' ‑gwa ‑Setran' a 'seŋzan‑ mu 'ɛ 'pegee ‑yaa' ‑kuŋlii mu 'ɛ 'kɔɔ. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, ‑ya ‑zrɔnna mɔkpɛn' ni kpataakpa 'bhii‑ Zesu Krisi 'seŋgwa꞊ 'bhɛ mu 'le.

'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi bhe, 'ka 'laa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ‑janwo' 'ka ma: 'ka 'le pɛle oo, 'ka mi pɛ oo, 'fɛti yi ‑klɔsikunza mu oo, 'bhɛ 'pegee mlɛ drɛɛ 'pwɛ yi 'fɛti 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'yitrɛ yi ‑za mu ‑zayi'.
'Bhɛ ‑za mu 'ɛ 'yaa‑ ‑za mu 'la 'yaa‑ zan nulɛ 'mu ‑la ‑tɔɔmasie 'le; 'duŋ‑ Krisi ‑le wlan kpataakpa 'gbu 'ɛ 'le.

'Ka 'laa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'a klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'ka go 'ka 'taawo zi ‑lrele' 'ɛ ta 'bhɛ ta, 'ke ‑ya klɛ 'bhii‑ ‑ya 'gbu mazina 'zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑mlɛkɛ' mu klɛ ‑yaa' ‑waanbhaa' 'le 'kee‑ 'mu gba. 'Bhɛ mɛɛ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ, ‑o waa ‑yrɛ zi yele mu ‑la ‑za kun 'eglɔɔle; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑waa' bhaaplɛŋya 'kpeelɛdangbɛya 'ɛ ma, ‑woo 'gbu magbaandɛ.

'Bhɛ mɛɛ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ ‑o blɔɔle laa bo Krisi 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ ŋgblo 'le 'bhɛ ma. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, ‑kɔɔ' mu ‑o 'bhii‑ ‑a 'flɛ dɔpɛ mu ‑la ‑le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' blɔɔle ‑o ‑a ma 'eglɔɔle 'bhii‑ ‑kɔɔ' ‑fasa mu 'ɛ blɔɔle ‑o bhɛlɛ' mu 'ɛ ma gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑. 'Bhɛɛ‑ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑a 'flɛ gbaandɛ 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑a zi 'bhii‑ ‑e gbaandɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

'Ka mu 'pegee Krisi ‑gaa 'eke‑ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'ka ‑gwa 'drunyan ta lii ‑yɔɔ' mu 'ɛ waa ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ ꞊la. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑mɛle ꞊kla 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑o 'taawo zii' 'bhii‑ 'drunyan 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi mɛɛ mu 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑ ɛɛ? ‑Mɛle ꞊kla 'kaa‑ 'to zii' 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o 'bhɛ 'toŋ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ dɔ 'ka 'wiiŋ‑ ɛɛ, 'ke ‑wa pe 'ka ni dɔɔ 'ka ‑o ‑klɔsikun kpaŋma?
‑O pe 'ka ni 'ka 'laa 'toŋ mu 'la 'yisiɛlɛ 'mu ‑le ‑gɛ: «'Ka 'laa pɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'silɛ‑. 'Ka 'laa pɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ danlɛ 'ka nrɛ ma». 'Bhɛɛ‑ «'ka 'laa 'kunlɛ‑ pɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ma.»
'Bhɛ pɛ mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'ke bhle pɛ mu ‑la ‑le bhaama. 'Ke ‑woo ꞊bhla, 'ke ‑o ‑yaan. Bhaaplɛŋ 'si ta 'toŋ mu 'pegee bhaaplɛŋ daangbɛya mu ‑le 'woo‑ 'toŋ mu 'ɛ ‑le.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ke 'o 'woo‑ ‑za mu 'ɛ ‑glinna, ‑o klɛ mɛɛ ‑yrɛ 'yi 'bhii ‑zadɔ' maza mu. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑woo 'gbu zru 'yi gba gbɛya ‑la klɛ, ‑o 'gbu mazinalele, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke ‑o ‑yrɛnkpa' ‑o 'gbu 'flɛ 'ɛ ta ‑za ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛlele. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'woo‑ 'toŋ mu 'ɛ waa sɔ ‑o ‑yikunle ‑o 'flɛ 'ɛ zru maza mu klɛle ma.

'Ka 'pegee Krisi ‑bwela gale ba 'eke‑ 'yi. 'Bhɛ 'yi 'tɛ, pɛ mu 'la ‑woo ‑Waanbhaa' ba laanima, ‑ka 'bhɛ mu ‑la ziglin‑; Krisi 'yaale‑ ‑o 'bhɛ yrɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ꞊nɔɔ, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑din 'tɔbhɔ ma yaayrɛ 'ɛ ꞊nɔɔ.
‑Waanbhaa' ‑si drɛɛ 'la ꞊twa 'ka ni laanima, 'ka 'yri bo 'bhɛ ‑la ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'laa bolɛ 'ka 'kpeelɛdanle ma 'trɛ ta pɛ mu ma.
‑Amasrɔyi, ‑ka 'ka 'gbu 'kun 'bhii‑ ka ‑gaa. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'si drɛɛ 'ɛ pegee Krisi magaanle ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' ba laanima.
'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'kaa‑ bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si ‑zeze 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le Krisi 'le; 'kee‑ ꞊nwa yi 'la 'le, 'ka mu 'pegee 'yee‑ nu 'pwɛlɛ‑ ‑yaa' 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ 'yi.

‑Ka 'ploo‑ 'kaa 'trɛ ta 'joo gwe mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma; 'bhɛ 'joo gwe mu 'ɛ 'ke mu ‑le ‑gɛ: ‑yanbhɔɔya oo, mɛɛ 'kpee 'triŋdɔ‑ maza oo, ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ ‑lrɔ oo, zru maza ‑yɔɔ' mu oo, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'drunyan ta pɛ mu 'flɛn, ‑amasrɔyi 'drunyan ta pɛ mu 'flɛn 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ezin‑ 'bhii‑ yogbale.
'Duŋ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa 'taawo ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑jan 'ɛ ta, 'ke ‑o 'bhɛ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ klɛ, ‑yaa' 'kiti 'ɛ nu 'tɛnlɛ‑ 'bhɛ zan mu ma.
'Elwale ‑sɔ, 'ka mu 'ezin‑, 'ka 'yaa‑ 'mu ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ 'mu ‑la klɛ.
'Duŋ‑ ‑zɔn, ‑ka 'ploo‑ 'bhɛ ‑za mu 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpɛn ma: yran oo, yin ma 'tɔnya‑ oo, 'kpee 'yɔɔya‑ oo, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'tɔsiɛ maza mu. 'Ka 'laa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke ‑zwanwo' 'pegee 'wloso ma jan 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ da 'ka 'lii.
'Ka 'laa bhla pelɛ 'eke‑ ni, ‑amasrɔyi 'ka 'ploola‑ 'ka 'joo 'yɔɔ‑ gwe mu 'ɛ 'pegee 'ka ‑yaa ‑za gwe mu 'la klɛ 'mu ma.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'joo drɛɛ ‑la ꞊sia. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'joo drɛɛ 'ɛ baan' kla ‑a ba yi 'oo yi, 'kooko‑ 'ka sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' dɔle‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka klɛza mu 'ɛ klɛ 'bhii‑ 'yee‑ 'gbu 'la 'ka ꞊kla ‑a klɛza mu 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'kee ꞊kla Zuufu kle 'le oo, 'kee ꞊kla Zuufu mi 'le oo, 'ke ‑woo 'e ꞊wlaa 'klɛɛn 'yi oo, 'ke waa 'e 'wlalɛ‑ 'klɛɛn 'yi oo, 'kee 'yoo‑ ‑zadɔkle 'le oo, 'kee 'yoo‑ ‑bɔn 'yi mi 'le oo, 'kee ꞊kla lu 'le oo, 'kee ꞊kla ꞊klɔ 'le, 'bhɛ 'laa ‑za 'ke klɛ ‑li. 'Duŋ‑ Krisi ‑la ‑za ‑o 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'bhɛ kan pɛ 'kpɛn ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'yele‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'kpɛn zru 'ɛ 'yi.

‑Waanbhaa' 'ka malakwan bhe, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'ka ꞊kla ‑yaa' pɛ mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'le 'edaŋma, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka ‑za ꞊swa ‑a ni, 'ka 'yrɛnkla 'eke‑ ma, 'ke 'ka klɛ 'ewlanle 'eke‑ ma, ‑ka 'ka mazina 'eke‑ ‑lɛɛ, 'ka 'yi klɛ 'edɔɔle 'eke‑ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'ka zrubakpala 'eke‑ zi.
‑Ka bhɔ 'eke‑ ba; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'eke‑ mazato. 'Ke 'ka do 'a ‑siɛla 'bhɛ ‑vindo' mi ba, ‑ka 'eke‑ mazato, 'bhii‑ Mɛɛzan Zesu 'ka mu mazatwa gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'kɛla kpa 'bhɛ ‑za mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'wiiŋ‑, 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ 'ka ‑za 'sɔ 'eke‑ ni, 'sɔniya 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le nu 'ka 'kpalɛ‑ do ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a 'lɛsɔ‑.
Bhaa Krisi a yilabla 'ɛ klɛ 'ka zru ba. ‑Waanbhaa' 'ka 'siila‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ yilabla 'ɛ 'kaama‑, 'kooko‑ 'ka kpa do ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka klɛ mɛɛ do. ‑Ka ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'taŋii 'bhɛ ma.

‑Kaa 'to 'ke Krisi a ‑jan 'ɛ bo 'ka zru 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'ka zru 'ɛ pa 'kee‑ kan ‑a ‑daŋ' ta. ‑Ka yakla‑ bɔ 'eke‑ gaan ‑la, 'ke 'ka 'eke‑ lia ‑zadɔlele. ‑Ka ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔbhɔ ma 'sro mu 'pegee ‑a 'pubɔ‑ 'sro mu 'kpa ‑a ni 'ka zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le.
'Ke 'ka ‑o ‑za 'oo ‑za 'la klɛle‑, 'kee‑ ꞊kla ‑janwole 'le oo, 'kee‑ ꞊kla 'ka klɛza 'le oo, ‑kaa 'kpɛn klɛ Mɛɛzan Zesu 'tɔ 'ɛ 'yi, 'ke 'ka ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑.
'Ka mu le mu, ‑ka 'ka ŋgblo 'kpala 'ka ꞊nɔɔ mu 'ɛ ꞊la. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ, 'bhɛ ‑le sɔ Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ni.
'Ka mu 'gwlaan‑ mu, 'ka 'na mu ‑za 'sɔ 'ka ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'laa 'ka yin ma 'tɔnkpalɛ ‑o ma.
'Ka mu ‑nɛ mu, ‑ka 'ka 'yapɛ‑ mu 'ɛ 'weli‑ ma ‑za mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yi. 'Bhɛ ‑le sɔ Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ni.
'Ka mu ‑nɛ dɛ mu, 'ka 'laa yran wlalɛ 'ka 'nɛ mu 'ɛ 'yi, 'kooko‑ ‑o ‑gblɔzi' laa nu galɛ ‑o ma.

'Ka mu lu mu, ‑ka 'kaa‑ 'trɛ ta ‑gɛ ‑kuŋlii mu 'ɛ 'weli‑ ma ‑za mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yi. 'Ka 'laa 'bhɛ klɛlɛ ‑o ‑yrɛ 'kɔɔ, 'ka 'laa ‑o zrubhɔ yrɛ ‑glinlɛ' 'ka ma 'kaa‑ ‑za klɛle mu 'ɛ 'yi. 'Duŋ‑ ‑kaa klɛ 'ka zru wlan 'le, 'ke 'ka gblaan Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛ.
'Ke 'ka ‑o ye 'oo ye 'la 'wo zii', ‑kaa wo 'ka zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le; 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑o ‑a klɛ 'zi Mɛɛzan Zesu ‑la ni; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'laa‑ klɛ 'zi bhaaplɛŋ mu do ‑kplɛn ni.
‑Amasrɔyi 'ka 'gbu 'a 'yaango dɔɔ Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' 'ka 'ciɛn 'la ꞊twa 'ka 'lɛɛ, 'ka nu 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwolɛ 'bhii‑ 'ka 'woye‑ 'ɛ ma ‑sra 'le. 'Ka ‑o yewo 'zi Mɛɛzan 'la ni 'bhɛ ‑le Krisi 'le.
'Duŋ‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'oo mɛɛ 'la zan 'taawoa꞊ 'eyɔɔle, 'bhɛ zan nu 'bhɛ ma ‑sra 'srɔɔwolɛ. ‑Waanbhaa' laa bhaaplɛŋ mu go 'eke‑ ma.
'Ka mu ‑kuŋlii mu, ‑ka 'kaa‑ yewonɛ mu 'ɛ 'kun 'elrele 'ke 'kaa klɛ ‑lɛdɔɔleya ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka 'laa ‑o bagolɛ. ‑Kaa 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'ka mu 'gbu ‑kuŋlii ‑gbɛnɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o laanima.
‑Ka bo 'ka 'seriwole ma 'taŋii, 'ka 'yri 'laa golɛ 'ka 'gbu ‑za 'le ‑a klɛle ma, 'ke 'ka ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'bhɛ ta.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ezin‑, ‑ka 'ka 'seriwo ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'waa‑ ‑za ma, 'kooko‑ ‑e 'bhɛ bhla ‑lrele' na 'o ni 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o sɔ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wole, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke 'o sɔ Krisi a gaanyiza 'ɛ 'pele mɛɛ mu ni. 'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑zɔn ‑kaso 'yi 'bhɛla‑ ma.
‑Ka 'ka 'seriwo 'mi a ‑za ma, 'kooko‑ 'ŋ sɔ 'yee‑ gaanyiza 'ɛ 'wole‑ mɔkpɛn' ni kpataakpa, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑wa ‑yima' 'elrele, 'bhii‑ ‑ya ꞊pia 'ŋ ni 'an klɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.
‑Ka klɛ ‑zadɔ' mu 'le 'kaa‑ 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ 'yi mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa ‑Waanbhaa' dɔ 'mu 'pleŋ‑. 'Ka sɔ ‑za yɛkɛ‑ 'la klɛle‑, 'waati 'tɔle‑ 'waati, ‑ka 'bhɛɛ‑ klɛ.
'Ke 'ka ‑o ‑jan 'oo ‑jan 'la 'wole mɛɛ mu ni, ‑kaa 'to ‑e klɛ ‑jan 'nrale‑ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e klɛ ‑o ‑lre jan 'le. 'Kooko‑ 'ke ‑o 'ka 'lrɔkpaa‑ ‑za 'oo ‑za ‑la ma, 'ka sɔ 'bhɛ zikpale ‑o 'kpɛn ni do do.
‑Kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Tisiki nu 'mi ta ‑jan mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'wolɛ 'ka ni; ‑a ‑za sɔ 'o ni 'egbɛnɛle, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a zru ‑o do Mɛɛzan Zesu ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o 'pegee 'yele‑ 'bhɛ a ye 'ɛ 'wo zii' 'eke‑ zi.
'Mi 'gbu 'a 'lawlɛnna ‑a ma 'ke 'an 'winbɔ‑ 'ka ta ye, 'o ta janwo zayi' 'ka ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kooko‑ 'ke 'kaa ꞊ya, faŋgan‑ baan' nu dɔ 'ka ta.

'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Onezimu 'kpa zii' 'yee‑ Tisiki ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ ‑wo winbɔ 'ka ba ye. Onezimu zru ‑o do 'o ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a ‑za sɔ 'o ni 'egbɛnɛle, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka 'gbu a mɛɛ ‑le 'kɛle‑. ‑Za 'oo ‑za 'la ꞊kla ‑gɛ, ‑o nu 'bhɛ 'kpɛn 'yipelɛ 'ka ni ye.

Arisitaki ꞊la 'o 'pegee 'bhɛ ‑o ‑kaso 'yi ‑gɛ, 'bhɛ 'ka 'pubwa‑; 'duŋ‑ Banabasi a yewoyɔɔn Maki 'ka 'pubwa‑ 'ezin‑. 'O 'ka 'kpeelɛkaan 'elwale gban ‑sɔ 'yee‑ Maki 'la ba zayi' dɔɔ 'kee‑ ‑nwa 'ka ba, ‑kaa 'cieya‑ klɛ 'elrele.

‑O ‑yaa mɛɛ 'la zan sii Zesu Zutusi, 'bhɛ 'ka 'pubwa‑ 'ezin‑. 'Woo‑ mɛɛ yaga 'la bhe, 'wola‑ 'pegee 'mi ‑o yewo 'eke‑ zi ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑bhleŋgbeya ‑jan 'ɛ 'wolele mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ni. 'Wole‑ 'ke Zuufu mu 'la ꞊wlaa Zesu 'yi ‑gɛ 'mu 'le. ‑O faŋgan‑ ‑dwa 'mi ta 'egbɛnɛle.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ezin‑, ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Epafrasi 'ka 'pubwa‑. 'Bhɛ ‑o 'ezin‑ 'ka 'gbu a mɛɛ mu 'ɛ do 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑yoo 'ke Zesu Krisi a yewonɛ 'lrele‑ do 'le. ‑A nii‑ 'wlale‑ ‑o ‑a 'seriwole 'yi 'kaa‑ ‑za ma 'taŋii, 'kooko‑ 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ baan' kla ‑a ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka dɔ 'eglɔɔle, 'ke 'ka 'yriwlale klɛ ‑Waanbhaa' zru maza 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛle ma.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ka mu Kolɔsi mu 'pegee Laodise Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ Yerapolisi Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn, 'ka ‑za ‑o Epafrasi 'kɔɔ 'eglɔɔle; 'mi 'gbu ‑o 'bhɛ 'srɛ 'le.
‑Kɔɔ' 'yiɛnii ‑drɔɔdrɔɔ' mi Luki 'pegee Demasi 'ka 'pubwa‑ 'ezin‑.
‑Kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'la ‑woo Laodise ‑wa 'ɛ ta, ‑ka 'mu 'pubɔ‑ 'o ni. 'Bhɛɛ‑ Nifa 'pegee Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'la kla 'eke‑ ba ‑yaa' 'fɛ 'ɛ ꞊la, ‑ka 'mu 'pubɔ‑ 'o ni 'ezin‑.

'Ke 'ka ꞊yaan 'yee‑ 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ tapelele 'waati 'la ba, ‑kaa na Laodise Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu 'a tape 'ezin‑. 'Duŋ‑ 'lɛtrɛ 'kɛla ꞊kaan Laodise, 'ke 'bhɛ ꞊wlaa 'ka ba ye, 'ka mu 'bhɛ tape 'ezin‑.
‑Kaa pe Arisipi ni dɔɔ Mɛɛzan Krisi 'a 'siila‑ ye 'la 'kaama‑, ‑e 'bhɛ ‑gblakun' 'kee‑ 'bhɛ wo 'elrele.
'Mi Pɔlu 'gbu ‑le 'sɛwɛyɔɔn 'lɛɛ‑ dɛ 'zi 'ŋ 'gbu 'kɔɔ dɔɔ: «'Mi Pɔlu 'ka 'pubwa‑.» 'Mi ‑o ‑kaso 'la 'yi ‑gɛ, 'mi ‑za 'laa golɛ 'ka 'kpee. Bhaa ‑Waanbhaa' 'ka ‑dɔɔbo'!
I Thessalonians: 'Mi Pɔlu 'pegee Silasi 'bhɛɛ‑ Timote, 'o mɔɔ 'gbu ‑le 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ ꞊dia 'ka mu Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'la 'ka ‑o Tesaloniki ‑wa 'ɛ ta 'ka mu ni. 'Ka ‑o ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi a pɛ 'le. Bhaa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑li 'ka ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑yaa' yilabla 'ɛ na 'ka ni.
'O ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'taŋii 'ka 'kpɛn ba zayi', 'bhɛɛ‑ 'woo‑ 'seriwo 'taŋii 'kaa‑ ‑za ma.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ka 'ka ꞊kpaa Krisi 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'bhɛ 'yizakla; 'ka yewoa‑ ‑a ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'sɔniya 'le 'ka 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka 'yrikpale 'la ‑yoo 'eglɔɔle Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi ta; 'bhɛ ‑za mu 'ɛ dɔ 'o 'kpee 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba 'ke 'woo‑ 'seriwo zii' ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' ni.
'O nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'wa 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'ka ‑za ꞊swa ‑Waanbhaa' ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'ka makwan‑ yaa pɛ 'le.

'O ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'la ꞊woa 'ka ni; 'waa 'bhɛ klɛlɛ 'o 'liijan‑ bhaama 'te 'wolele 'ka ni, 'duŋ‑ 'wa ꞊kla 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑glɔɔya' 'pegee *Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'mu ‑la ‑le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'o 'kpale‑ ‑yaa ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ wlan ‑le 'kɛle‑. 'O 'taawoa꞊ 'ka 'pleŋ‑ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'ka 'gbu 'bhɛ 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ 'yaa‑ 'ka 'gbu 'nrayiza 'le.

'Ka mu 'gbu 'taawoa꞊ 'bhii‑ 'o mɔɔ 'gbu 'pegee Mɛɛzan Krisi 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑. 'Ali‑ 'ka 'yaa‑ 'trɛbhɔ ‑bebe 'la 'yi, 'ka ‑dwa ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑jan 'ɛ ꞊la 'ka zrukpaale 'la da Lii 'Weŋ a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ ba 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le.
'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, Masedwani 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'pegee Akayi 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ, 'mu 'kpɛn nu 'taawolɛ 'kaa‑ pɛ 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ zi.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, Mɛɛzan a ‑Jan 'ɛ dalawoa 'ka mu ba, ‑e ꞊zian Masedwani 'pegee Akayi 'klɛɛn mu 'ɛ 'yi; 'duŋ‑ yaa bolɛ 'mu do ‑kplɛn ta; 'ka 'kpagbɛya 'ɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi, 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ ꞊zian yrɛkpɛn‑ ꞊nɔɔ 'ezin‑, ‑asiikɔɔ 'o maza laa ‑yaa ‑li 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ 'wole‑ ma mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ni, ‑amasrɔyi ‑wa ‑maa gban.

'Ka 'o 'cieya‑ ꞊kla 'elrele gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, mɔkpɛn' ‑o 'bhɛ 'pe zii'. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑wa pe zii' 'ezin‑ 'kaa 'ka 'ploola‑ 'kaa yo mu 'ɛ gbale ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑ya ‑yrɛ ma, 'ke ‑yee' 'ewlanle, 'ka 'ka zru ‑niinaa' 'bhɛ ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'bhɛ gba.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑o ‑a Gbe Zesu 'la ‑e 'bhɛ ‑bwela gale ba, 'bhɛ 'magbɛn‑ 'zi 'ke 'bhɛ da laanima. 'Bhɛ Zesu 'ɛ, 'bhɛ ‑le ‑kɔɔ' go ‑Waanbhaa' a 'kiti 'ɛ 'yi.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ka mu 'gbu 'a 'yaango‑ 'o gelawoa 'ka ba, yaa klɛlɛ 'ke bhaama za 'le.

'Kaa 'yaango‑ 'ezin‑ 'bhii‑ mɛɛ mu 'o ‑zwanwoa, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑yrɛnkpaa 'o ta 'elwale 'pe Filipu ‑wa 'ɛ ta. 'Duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' faŋgandwa 'o ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o ꞊nwa ‑yaa' ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wolɛ‑ 'ka mu ni Tesaloniki 'tɛ, 'ali‑ 'ke mɛɛ mu 'ɛ waa ‑yaa dɔle‑ ‑a ꞊la 'ke 'o 'bhɛ wo bhe.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'waa ‑o 'yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wo zii' bhla ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'o 'kpee 'yɔɔ‑ 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'waa ‑o mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yiniyrɛ ‑glin 'zi.

Drɔɔn' ‑Waanbhaa' ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'o ‑janwo' ‑janwo' gbɛya 'la 'yi, 'woo‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ klɛ 'zi. ‑Amasrɔyi, ‑a 'gbu 'a ꞊ya 'bhii‑ ‑a ‑gaale' 'o ba 'kee‑ ‑yaa' ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ gbɛkpa 'o mɔɔ 'kɔɔ. 'Waa ‑o ‑janwo' zii', 'kooko‑ 'o sɔ mɛɛ mu ni, 'duŋ‑ 'woo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'o sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' 'la mɛɛ zrubaglin 'bhɛɛ‑ ni.
'Ka 'gbu 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'waa 'ka 'yini ma ‑janwolɛ 'ka ni; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa 'yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ wolɛ 'ka ni 'waa ‑gɔli' 'flɛŋya‑ 'ɛ ma, ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑o 'o 'srɛ 'le.
'Waa 'o 'gbu 'tɔbhɔyrɛ ‑glinlɛ' ‑lido' mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'kɔɔ: 'kee‑ 'kpa 'ka mu ta oo, 'kee‑ kpa mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu ta oo, 'waa 'bhɛ klɛlɛ ‑lido'.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, 'woo‑ Krisi a winbɔwo mu 'la 'le bhe, 'o 'yaa‑ sɔ 'waa‑ mɛɛ gblaanya 'ɛ gbiŋkpale 'ka ta 'bhii‑ 'kwe. 'Duŋ‑ 'waa 'bhɛ klɛlɛ, drɔɔn' 'o 'yaa‑ 'ka ba 'waati 'la ba, 'o 'yaa‑ 'ka 'kun zii' 'o 'yidɔɔ‑ 'le 'bhii‑ 'ke ‑nɛ nɛɛ do ‑o ‑yɔn 'na zii' 'a 'nɛ 'ɛ ni ‑e 'bhɛ ‑gblakun' gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ka ‑za 'sɔ gbɛ ‑yɔɔ' 'ɛ 'kɔɔ 'o ni, 'waa ‑yaa zi 'bhii‑ 'o bo ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'te 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'wole‑ ma 'ka ni; 'duŋ‑ 'o 'yaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'woo 'gbu 'si 'ɛ 'na 'ka ni 'ka ‑za 'sɔ gbɛ ‑yɔɔ' 'ɛ 'kɔɔ 'o ni.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'o yewoa꞊ 'eglɔɔle gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'o 'trɛbhwa꞊ 'ebebele gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ka 'kpee: ‑bi zi oo, ‑yrekpaa' oo, 'o yewoa꞊ 'eglɔɔle 'o gbɛ ma, 'kooko‑ 'woo 'gbu maza gopɛ ‑srɔɔwo', 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa klɛ 'ka ta 'kwe 'le, 'o 'yaa‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wo zii' 'ka ni bhla 'la ba.

'Ka mu 'gbu ‑o 'o 'srɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑o 'o 'srɛ 'le 'ezin‑. 'Ka mu 'la 'ka 'ka ꞊kpaa Krisi 'yi bhe, 'o 'taawoa꞊ 'ka 'pleŋ‑ 'o 'kpee 'fleele‑ 'le, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'o 'lɛdɔɔle ‑yaa, 'bhɛɛ‑ waa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yelɛ‑ 'o zi.
'Kaa 'yaango‑ 'ezin‑ dɔɔ 'o 'ka 'kpɛn do do ‑gblakwan 'elrele 'bhii‑ ‑nɛ dɛ ‑a 'gbu 'nɛ mu ‑gblakun' 'elrele gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

'O zruwlaa꞊ 'ka 'kpee, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o ꞊bwa ‑a pele ma 'ka ni dɔɔ ‑ka 'taawo 'elrele 'ke 'bhɛ sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ni. 'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑le 'ka 'siila‑, 'kooko‑ 'ka dɔ klɛ ‑yaa' ‑bhleŋgbeya 'pegee ‑yaa' 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ 'mu ba.

'O ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'taŋii ‑za 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ ma 'ezin‑. 'O 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑jan 'la ꞊woa 'ka ni, 'ka ‑dwa ‑a ꞊la. 'Ka 'laa 'yelɛ‑ 'bhii bhaaplɛŋ mu wojan gbɛɛn‑; 'duŋ‑ 'kaa ꞊ya 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑jan 'le. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ ‑yoo 'ke 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le kpataakpa. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑yoo yewo 'zi 'ka mu 'la 'ka 'ka ꞊kpaa ‑a ‑yi 'ka zru mu 'ɛ 'yi.

Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ mu 'la ‑woo 'ke Zesu Krisi 'yi a pɛ 'le Zude 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi, 'ka mu 'mu a 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ꞊sia bhe; ‑amasrɔyi Zuufu 'ke mu ‑yrɛnkpaa 'mu ta gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ka mu a pɛ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'mu ‑o ‑yrɛnkpa' zii' 'ka ta 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑ 'ezin‑.

'Woo‑ Zuufu mu 'ɛ, ‑o 'ke mu ‑le ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑lɛla' janwo mu 'ɛ ꞊dia 'elwale ‑sɔ; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o 'ke mu ‑le 'a ꞊kla 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ mu Mɛɛzan Zesu ꞊dia; 'bhɛ 'laa ‑mɔlɛ' ‑li, 'wola‑ 'ke mu ‑yrɛnkpaa 'o mɔɔ ta 'ezin‑. Waa sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑sɔɔnnii' ‑o 'ke mɔkpɛn' 'le.

'Ke 'woo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'o ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'wo Zuufu kle mu 'ɛ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu go ‑za 'yi, ‑o 'bhɛ 'saawo‑ 'o 'kɔɔ. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑o waa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ baan' ‑la 'kla zii' 'a ba. 'Duŋ‑ 'bhɛ 'lɛyanyrɛ ‑le 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a 'kiti 'yɔɔ‑ 'ɛ baayrɛ 'le ‑o ta.
'O nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'o mɔɔ golawoa 'ka ‑din 'waati 'dama ta 'o 'flɛ 'ɛ 'yi, waa pelɛ 'o 'nii‑ 'ɛ 'yi, 'ka taglin‑ 'lrɔ ‑gbɛnɛ ‑dwa 'o ma 'eglɔɔle.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayi', 'o 'yaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'o ge gbɛ drɛɛwo 'ka ba ye 'ezin‑, 'ali‑ 'mi Pɔlu 'gbu 'bhɛ 'yidangbɛ 'damawoa; 'duŋ‑ ‑Setran' 'bhɛ 'saawoa‑ 'o 'kɔɔ.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑de mu ‑le ꞊kla 'o 'yrikpa pɛ 'le ɛɛ? ‑De mu ‑le 'o zrukpaa' pɛ 'le ɛɛ? 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑de mu ‑le 'o 'wasowo pɛ 'le ɛɛ? Mɛɛzan Zesu 'nu yi 'le, 'ka mu ‑le nu klɛlɛ 'o 'yrikpa pɛ 'le, 'bhɛ 'pegee, 'ka mu ‑le nu klɛlɛ 'waa‑ zrukpaa pɛ 'pegee 'o 'wasowo pɛ 'le Mɛɛzan Zesu 'lɛɛ.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ka mu ‑le 'o 'wasowo pɛ pegee 'o zrukpaa' pɛ 'le.
'Bhɛ ꞊nɔɔ 'mɔlawoa 'ke 'waa 'ka ye bhe, 'waa ‑yaa sɔ ‑li 'bhɛ 'yikunle; 'bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'ke 'wa 'kpale do dɔɔ 'mi 'pegee Silasi bo ‑sɔ Atɛni ‑wa 'ɛ ta.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'woo nɛɛnɛ‑ Timote winbɔle 'ka ta ye. 'Yee‑ 'pegee 'o mɔɔ ‑o yewo 'zi 'eke‑ zi ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'ke 'o Krisi a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ wo. 'Wa 'winbwa‑ 'ka ta ye, 'kooko‑ ‑e ge zruwla 'ka 'kpee, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e faŋgandɔ 'ka ta 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'yi.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'kooko‑, ‑o ‑yrɛn mu 'la kpa zii' ‑kɔɔ' ta 'saanigɛ, 'ka 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ploo 'bhɛ 'kpale‑ ma Zesu 'yi. 'Ka 'gbu 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ ‑yrɛn mu 'la 'mu ‑kɔɔ' ta, ‑Waanbhaa' 'kɔɔ ‑za ‑le 'mu ‑le.
‑Amasrɔyi 'o 'yaa‑ 'ka ba 'waati 'la ba, 'o 'ka 'kpeelɛkaan dɔɔ mɛɛ mu nu ‑yrɛnkpalɛ ‑kɔɔ' ta. ‑Kaa 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ 'o 'ka 'kpeelɛkaan ‑za 'la mu 'le, 'mu ‑le bhɔ 'zi bhe.

'Bhɛ ꞊nɔɔ 'mɔlawoa 'ke 'waa 'ka ye bhe, 'waa ‑yaa sɔ ‑li 'bhɛ 'yikunle, mi 'gbu Timote 'winbwa‑ 'ka ta ye, 'kooko‑ 'ka 'kpale‑ ‑o Krisi 'yi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ ‑e ge 'bhɛ 'ye. ‑Amasrɔyi yiɛn ‑yaa 'kan zii' 'ŋ 'kpee dɔɔ ‑Setran' 'laa nu 'ka 'lɛkanlɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'ka 'yini‑. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, 'o ye 'la ꞊woa 'ka ba ye, 'bhɛ nu klɛlɛ bhaama yewole 'le.

'Duŋ‑ Timote dalawoa 'ka taglin‑ yrɛ 'ɛ ꞊nɔɔ, ‑e 'ka ta jan 'nrale‑ ꞊woa 'o ni. ‑Ya ꞊pia 'o ni dɔɔ 'ka 'kpale‑ ‑o Krisi 'yi 'elrele, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a ‑za sɔ 'ka ni. ‑Ya ꞊pia 'o ni 'ezin‑ dɔɔ 'o ‑za ‑o 'ka 'kpee 'taŋii, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka mu ye ‑lrɔ 'o ma gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'o mɔɔ ye ‑lrɔ ‑o 'eglɔɔle 'ka mu ma 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑ 'ezin‑.
'O nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑o 'ka ta jan 'ɛ 'wolawoa 'o ni, 'ali‑ 'ke 'woo‑ 'trɛbhɔ 'pegee ‑yrɛn mu ‑la ‑yi, 'bhɛ faŋgandwa 'o ta, 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ ‑zayi'.
'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'ka dɔlela ‑yoo 'eglɔɔle 'ka 'pegee Mɛɛzan a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi, 'o sɔ 'o 'trɛle 'tɛ.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'o sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔle 'nale‑ ‑a ma 'ka ba zayi', 'ka zrukpaa' ‑gbɛnɛ 'la ‑zinaa' 'o ta 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ ꞊la 'bhɛ ‑zayi' ɛɛ?

‑Bi zi 'pegee ‑yrekpaa', 'o ‑sromabɔ 'eglɔɔle ‑Waanbhaa' ni dɔɔ ‑e zi na 'o ni 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o sɔ gele‑ 'ka taglinlɛ. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, 'waa 'sɔlɛ‑ 'ka daanle‑ 'kɛla 'le 'kpaleya a zi 'ɛ ta, ‑o nu 'ka daanlɛ 'bhɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya Zesu 'yi 'bhɛ 'lɛpa‑.
Bhaa ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu 'pegee Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi zi na 'o ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o sɔ gele‑ 'ka taglinlɛ.
Bhaa Mɛɛzan kaa 'sɔlekeniya 'ɛ baan' kla 'a ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn baan' sɔ 'ka ni, 'bhii‑ 'ka mu ‑za sɔ 'o mɔɔ ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

Bhaa ‑e faŋgandɔ 'kpaleya 'la ‑yoo 'ka 'yi bhe 'bhɛ ta; 'kooko‑ 'ka klɛ 'weŋ, 'bhɛɛ‑ waa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ye 'ka zi ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ ꞊la, Mɛɛzan Zesu 'pegee ‑Waanbhaa' mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'kpɛn 'siila‑ ‑yaa' pɛ 'le 'mu nu yi 'le.

'O nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o ‑jan 'lɛyanyrɛ 'le 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ 'ka sɔ 'taawole gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ni, 'ka 'bhɛ ‑daanna 'o mɔɔ ‑la 'kɔɔ. 'Duŋ‑ 'ka ‑o 'taawo zii' 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑. 'Kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'eglɔɔle, 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ 'o ‑sromabɔ 'ka ni Mɛɛzan Zesu 'tɔ 'yi dɔɔ ‑ka 'ka 'taawogbɛya ‑lrele' 'ɛ baan' 'kla a ba.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'o 'ka ‑daanna ‑za mu 'la 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'wa ꞊pia 'ka ni 'ka 'mu klɛ 'ka 'mu dɔ; 'bhɛ ‑za mu 'ɛ ‑daa Mɛɛzan Zesu ‑la ba.
‑Waanbhaa' ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ka bo 'edaŋma ‑yaa' pɛ mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'ka 'pleŋgo‑ ‑yanbhɔɔya ma.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ka 'kpɛn do do bo 'bhɛ 'na 'le 'weŋ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke bhaaplɛŋ mu 'ka ‑lɛdɔ' ‑a ma 'bhɛ ‑zayi'.
'Ka 'laa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke zru maza ‑yɔɔ' klɛ ‑lrɔ gbiŋkpa 'ka ta, 'ke 'ka bo ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛle ma 'bhii‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa ‑Waanbhaa' dɔ 'mu gbɛɛn‑.

'Kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o le 'pegee 'gwlaan‑ pleŋza 'ɛ 'le, 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ‑naanaa' maza klɛlɛ ‑a nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mi na 'ɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑glin 'lrɔ 'laa dɔlɛ ‑a ma. 'O 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ ꞊woa gban 'ka ni 'elwale, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o 'bhɛ 'kpankpanyaan 'ka ma dɔɔ 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan 'bhɛ ‑za ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ klɛ, Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' nu 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ 'krowolɛ.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' laa ‑kɔɔ' 'siilɛ‑ ‑yanbhɔɔya klɛle ma, 'duŋ‑ ‑e ‑kɔɔ' 'siila‑ 'ke ‑kɔɔ' bo 'edaŋma ‑yaa' pɛ mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'le.

'Bhɛ 'yi 'tɛ, 'ke mɛɛ 'oo mɛɛ 'la zan 'e ‑baŋgwa 'taawole ma 'ŋ ‑jan mu 'la 'woa‑ 'ka ni 'mu ta, 'bhɛ zan 'laa 'bhɛ ‑baŋgolɛ bhaaplɛŋ do ‑kplɛn 'liijan‑ 'yi; 'duŋ‑ ‑ya ‑baŋgwa ‑Waanbhaa' 'la 'bhɛ Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ꞊naa 'ka ni 'bhɛɛ‑ 'liijan‑ 'ɛ 'yi 'ezin‑.
'Kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o nɛɛnɛya 'yi 'sɔniya 'ɛ 'le, 'ka maza laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma 'ke ‑o 'bhɛ 'sɛwɛdɛ 'ka ni 'ezin‑; ‑amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu 'ka ‑daanna gban dɔɔ 'ka ‑za 'sɔ 'eke‑ ni.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ klɛ 'zi wlan 'ɛ ni 'ka nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ni Masedwani 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi. 'Duŋ‑ 'o mɔɔ ‑o zruwla 'zi 'ka 'kpee dɔɔ ‑ka 'bhɛɛ‑ baan' 'lrele‑ klɛ 'ezin‑.

Bole 'ke 'yi 'edɔɔle 'ɛ, 'bhɛ ‑le klɛ 'ka zru maza 'le. ‑Ka dɔ 'eglɔɔle 'ezin‑ 'ke 'ka 'kpɛn do do 'e 'yrɛkpa‑ 'bhɛ 'gbu a ‑za mu 'ɛ ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka yewo 'ka gbɛ ma 'ke 'ka sɔ 'ka 'gbu mazagole, 'bhii‑ 'wa ꞊pia 'elwale gban 'ka ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ bhe.
'Ke 'ka 'bhɛ ꞊kla, mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa 'o Zesu 'yi 'mu nu ‑gasikpalɛ 'ka 'lɛɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'laa nu klɛlɛ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ta 'kwe 'le.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑gaa gban, 'woo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ 'ka wlan dɔ 'mu ba ‑zayi', 'kooko‑ 'ka wlɛyisriwole laa bo 'bhii‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu yrikpale laa ‑o bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'ɛ ta ‑o gale blaan 'mu gbɛɛn‑.

‑Amasrɔyi, 'o 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ Zesu ‑gaa, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'a ‑bwela gale ba. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi, 'o 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'ezin‑ 'bhii‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'la ‑gaa, ‑Waanbhaa' nu 'mu bwelɛ gale ba Zesu 'srɔyi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o pegee Zesu nu klɛlɛ 'eke‑ zi.

Mɛɛzan ‑jan 'la ꞊woa 'o ni kpataakpa, 'o mɔɔ 'mu ‑la wo zii' 'ka ni ‑gɛ dɔɔ Zesu 'nu yi 'ɛ 'le, ‑kɔɔ' mu 'la nu klɛlɛ ‑kɔɔ' 'yrɛ ma ‑li 'bhɛ yi 'ɛ 'le, ‑kɔɔ mu laa nu 'kanlɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑gaa gban 'mu 'lɛɛ.

‑Amasrɔyi ‑a pele ‑o dɔɔ 'bhɛ yi 'ɛ 'le, Mɛɛzan 'gbu nu ‑janwolɛ 'eglɔɔle 'pe, 'bhɛ blaan, ‑kɔɔ' nu ‑mlɛkɛ' ‑kuŋlii do ‑gbekanwli 'ɛ 'malɛ‑. 'Ke 'bhɛ ‑gwa ‑a ‑yi, ‑o nu ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑klɛloŋ' 'ɛ 'pɛnlɛ‑. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, Mɛɛzan Zesu 'gbu nu zinalɛ 'tɛ, 'kee‑ da laflɛ' ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ bhla do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ba, Zesu 'yi mu 'la ‑gaa 'elwale gban ‑sɔ, 'mu nu bwelɛ gale ba.

'Bhɛ blaan, ‑kɔɔ' mu Zesu 'yi mu 'la nu klɛlɛ ‑li 'kɔɔ‑ 'yrɛ ma 'bhɛ yi 'ɛ 'le, ‑Waanbhaa' a faŋgan‑ 'ɛ nu ‑kɔɔ' mu 'pegee 'woo‑ mu 'kpɛn binalɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ge ‑kɔɔ' 'kpɛn 'le laanima Zesu 'lɛpayrɛ nɔɔ‑ laflɛ' ‑gblo 'ɛ 'yi. 'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑kɔɔ' nu bolɛ 'taŋii Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' 'le.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑ka 'fuudɔ‑ 'eke‑ ta 'bhɛ ‑jan mu 'lɛɛ‑ 'le.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ka maza laa ‑o 'ke 'o 'sɛwɛdɛ 'ka ni 'woo‑ ‑za mu 'ɛ klɛ yi 'ɛ 'pegee ‑o klɛ 'waati 'ɛ ta.
‑Amasrɔyi 'ka 'gbu 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ Mɛɛzan Zesu 'nule 'ɛ nu 'klalɛ‑ mɛɛ ba, 'bhii‑ ‑faannii' kla mɛɛ ba ‑bi zi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.

'Ke 'drunyan ta mɛɛ 'a ꞊pia bhla 'la ba dɔɔ: «‑Kɔɔ' ‑o yilabla 'yi ‑zɔn, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' ‑gwa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'kpɛn 'yi.» 'Bhɛ bhla do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ba 'tɛ, ‑yrɛn ‑gbɛnɛ do nu baalɛ ‑o ta, 'bhii‑ le kpɛle do ‑bla zɛnle 'ɛ kla ‑a ba gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑; 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa nu ‑bhilɛ' ‑a ‑yi 'bhɛ yi 'ɛ 'le.
'Duŋ‑, 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'bhɛ yi 'ɛ yaa nu 'klalɛ‑ 'ka mu ba 'bhii‑ ‑faannii' do balaa' mɛɛ ta gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ ‑a ‑yibɛɛnnazi. ‑Amasrɔyi 'ka mu 'laa ‑o 'ke ‑gblo 'yi mu 'le.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, 'ka 'kpɛn ‑o 'ke 'tɛbhile ba ‑nɛ mu ‑la ‑le, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka ‑o 'ke ‑yrekpaa' ‑nɛ mu ‑la ‑le. ‑Kɔɔ' ‑gwa ‑bi zi za mu 'pegee ‑gblo 'yi za mu 'ɛ zi.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, ‑kɔɔ' 'laa bolɛ yidɛle ma 'bhii mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa ‑Waanbhaa' dɔ 'mu gbɛɛn‑. 'Duŋ‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'yakla‑ dulale klɛ, ‑kɔɔ' 'laa ‑kɔɔ' 'taakpalɛ ‑za 'kpɛn zi.
‑Amasrɔyi, 'ka 'gbu 'a 'yaango‑ mɛɛ yidɛ ‑bi ‑la zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑wɛɛn dɛ mu 'ɛ ‑wɛɛn 'mu dɛ ‑bi ‑la zi 'ezin‑.

'Duŋ‑ ‑kɔɔ' mu 'la ‑kɔɔ' ‑o ‑yrekpaa' a pɛ 'le bhe, ‑kɔɔ' 'laa ‑kɔɔ' 'taakpalɛ ‑za zi. ‑Kɔɔ' ‑kɔɔa' 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'pegee ‑Waanbhaa' a 'sɔniya 'ɛ klɛ ‑kɔɔ' tagaan pɛ mu 'le 'bhii‑ 'elwaleta ‑srwase' mu 'ɛ 'yaa‑ ‑o ‑bɛɛ mu 'ɛ tagaan piibhɛ dunɛ‑ mu 'le gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ bhe. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'yri bo ‑Waanbhaa' ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ klɛ ‑kɔɔ' go pɛ 'le ‑za 'yi, 'bhii‑ ‑srwase' mu bhee ‑o ŋgblo ma piibhɛ 'faa mu 'ɛ ma gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ gwledan yrɛ nɔɔ‑.
‑Amasrɔyi, ‑Waanbhaa' laa ‑kɔɔ' 'kpalɛ‑ 'edaŋma ‑kɔɔ' 'krowo ‑zayi'. 'Duŋ‑ ‑e ‑kɔɔ' mu ꞊kpaa 'edaŋma, 'kooko‑ 'ke ‑kɔɔ go ‑za 'yi ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'srɔyi.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, Zesu Krisi ‑gaa ‑kɔɔa' ‑za ma, 'kooko‑ 'ke ‑kɔɔ' ‑o ‑kɔɔ' 'yrɛ ma oo, 'ke ‑kɔɔ' ‑gaa oo, ‑kɔɔ' 'pegee 'yee‑ bo ‑kɔɔ' 'yrɛ ma 'eke‑ 'yi ‑a nu yi 'ɛ 'le.
'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑ka zruwla 'eke‑ 'kpee 'ke 'ka faŋgandɔ 'eke‑ ta 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'yi 'bhii‑ 'kaa‑ klɛ zi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ bhe.

'Bhɛ trala 'ezin‑, 'ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'o mɔɔ ‑sromabɔ 'ka ni dɔɔ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'trɛbhɔ zii' 'ka daanle 'le 'kpaleya zi 'ɛ ta, 'ke ‑woo 'ka 'lɛɛ mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo 'ka 'lia zii' Mɛɛzan a zi 'ɛ ta bhe, ‑ka ‑gasikpa 'mu 'lɛɛ.
‑Ka ‑o 'kun 'elrele, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑za 'sɔ 'ka ni 'egbɛnɛle ‑waa' ye 'ɛ ‑zayi'. ‑Ka bo 'eke‑ 'yi 'edɔɔle.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'o mɔɔ ‑o ‑sromabɔ 'zi 'ka ni 'ezin‑ dɔɔ lrwanii‑ mu 'la bole ‑o 'kaanle‑ ma, ‑ka 'mu 'kpeelɛkan, 'kooko‑ ‑o yewo, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'fuudɔ‑ ‑gblaannii' mu 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛ 'pegee faŋgan‑ 'laa ‑o mɛɛ 'la zan mu ta ‑Waanbhaa' zi 'ɛ ta, ‑ka bhɔ 'mu ba. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'ka zrubakpala mɔkpɛn' zi.

‑Ka 'ka 'yrɛkpa 'ka 'gbu ba 'elrele, 'ke mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ ‑zigo' ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'le. 'Duŋ‑ 'taŋii, ‑ka ‑za 'wlan ‑la klɛyrɛ ‑glin 'eke‑ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ka 'bhɛ klɛ mɔkpɛn' ni 'ezin‑ 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba.
'Ka zrukpaale klɛ 'taŋii.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'laa 'ploolɛ‑ 'ka 'seriwole ma ‑Waanbhaa' ni.
‑Ka ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ ‑za mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'yi. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑za ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ zi 'ka 'kɔɔ, 'ka mu 'pegee Zesu Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi.
'Ka 'laa Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ‑dewolɛ 'ka zru 'ɛ 'yi.
‑Waanbhaa' ‑jan mu kpa mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑lii, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu 'a ‑lɛlajanwo mɛɛ mu ni, 'ka 'laa 'bhɛ ‑lɛlajanwole mu 'ɛ mavɛɛlɛ.
‑Ka ‑jan mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn baglin‑ kplankplan, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kɛla 'bhɛ ‑o wlan 'le ‑ka 'taawo 'bhɛɛ‑ ta.
‑Ka ‑ka 'ka 'gbu 'kun 'elrele ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'kpɛn ‑glɔɔn ma.

Bhaa ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑yoo yilabla zan 'le, 'bhɛ 'ka 'flɛ 'kpɛn klɛ 'weŋ. Bhaa 'ka 'si oo, 'ka 'nii‑ oo, 'ka 'gbu 'flɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn bo 'weŋ 'fɔke 'bhɛ ge 'tɛnlɛ‑ ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu nu yi 'ɛ ma, 'ke waa 'triŋ‑ do 'kpɔ ye 'ka ma.
Mɛɛ 'la zan 'ka 'gbu 'siila‑, 'bhɛ nu 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ klɛlɛ; ‑amasrɔyi ‑yoo 'ke zru do zan 'le.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ka mu 'ka 'seriwo 'ezin‑ 'waa‑ ‑za ma.
'Ka 'kpɛn 'eke‑ ‑tuubɔ' 'bhii‑ nɛɛnɛ‑ ma do mu.
'Ŋ ŋgblo ‑o 'ka gaan ꞊la Mɛɛzan 'tɔ 'yi 'ɛ dɔɔ: ‑Ka 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ tape ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ni.
Bhaa ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi ‑li 'ka 'kpɛn ma.
II Thessalonians: Mi Pɔlu 'pegee Silasi 'bhɛɛ‑ Timote, 'o mɔɔ ‑le 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ ꞊dia. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi a mɛɛ ‑lɛdo' 'la ‑woo Tesaloniki ‑wa 'ɛ ta, 'woo‑ 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpa zii' 'ka mu ‑la ni.
Bhaa ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi ‑li 'ka ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o waa yilabla 'ɛ 'na 'ka ni.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ke 'o ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'taŋii 'kaa‑ ‑za ma, 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑za 'lrele‑ 'le. ‑Amasrɔyi 'ka 'kpaleya 'ɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi 'bhɛ baan' ‑o 'kla zii' 'bhɛ ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa‑ 'sɔlekeniya 'ɛ 'bhɛ baan' ‑o 'kla zii' 'bhɛ ba 'ezin‑.

'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi, 'o mɔɔ 'o baa 'ka mu 'yi ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'pleŋ‑. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑o ‑yrɛn 'pegee 'trɛbhɔ mu 'la 'kpɛn 'kpa zii' 'ka ta, 'ka 'mu 'yikun zii' 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka 'kpale‑ bole ‑o Krisi 'yi.

'Ka ta ‑yrɛn mu 'ɛ 'mu ‑o ‑a zrɔn 'zi 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kitikanle 'ɛ 'lɛdɔɔle ‑o wlan 'ɛ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'a zrɔn 'bhii‑ 'kaa‑ pɛ ‑le ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑bhleŋgbeya 'ɛ 'le. ‑Amasrɔyi, 'ka ‑o ‑yrɛnbhle' zii' 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑bhleŋgbeya 'ɛ ma.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑lɛdɔɔleya 'ɛ ma, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ‑yrɛnkpa' zii' 'ka ta; ‑e nu 'bhɛ ‑yrɛn yɛkɛ‑ 'ɛ ‑zigolɛ 'bhɛ zan mu 'ɛ ma 'ezin‑.
‑O ‑yrɛnkpa' zii' 'ka mu 'la ta, ‑e nu ‑yitrɛ' nalɛ 'ka mu 'pegee 'o mɔɔ ni, 'ke Mɛɛzan Zesu 'pwɛla‑ ‑a ‑yi yi 'la 'le 'kee‑ da laflɛ' ma 'yee‑ 'pegee ‑yaa' ‑mlɛkɛ' ‑glɔɔ mu 'ɛ 'le.
‑E nu nulɛ 'tɛ nrɛ ‑gbɛnɛ do ‑la ‑yi. Mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa ‑Waanbhaa' dɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke waa 'taawo‑ ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi a ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ ta, ‑e nu 'mu 'krowolɛ.
'Bhɛ ‑yrɛn 'ɛ nu klɛlɛ ‑yrɛn ‑gbɛnɛ 'le. ‑O nu 'bhɛ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'pleŋgolɛ Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ma yikpɛnsee ta 'ke ‑daŋ' 'laa klɛ 'bhɛ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ waa nu 'sɔlɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a gblaanya 'ɛ 'yele ‑titi.

'Bhɛ yi 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le, Mɛɛzan Zesu nu nulɛ 'tɛ. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, ‑e ‑yaa' mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'la makwan‑ ‑yaa' pɛ 'le 'mu nu 'a 'tɔbhɔlɛ; 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'ɛ 'e 'kpaa‑ ‑a ‑yi, 'mu 'kpɛn nu 'a ‑glinlɛ', 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu 'yrɛbhɔ ‑a zi. 'Ka mu nu klɛlɛ 'bhɛ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ba, ‑amasrɔyi 'o ‑jan mu 'la ꞊woa 'ka ni, 'ka 'ka ꞊kpaa 'mu 'yi.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba, 'woo 'seriwo 'kaa‑ ‑za ma. 'Wa 'yrɛwo‑ ‑Waanbhaa' dɔɔ ‑e 'ka 'siila‑ 'taawogbɛya ‑glɔɔn 'la 'kaama‑, 'ka 'taawo‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'wa 'yrɛwo‑ ‑a ma 'ezin‑ dɔɔ yaa ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ ma, 'kaa‑ zi 'bhii‑ 'ka 'ka zru maza 'lrele‑ mu 'la klɛ ‑e bhɔ 'ka ba 'mu klɛlele; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa‑ 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'lɛsɔ‑.
'Bhɛ 'yi 'tɛ, mɔkpɛn' nu Mɛɛzan Zesu 'tɔbhɔlɛ 'ka klɛza mu 'ɛ ma; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka mu nu 'tɔbhɔleya ‑srɔɔwolɛ 'yee‑ 'kɔɔ 'ezin‑. 'Bhɛ ‑lileya 'ɛ da ‑kɔɔa' ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi ‑la ba.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi nu nulɛ. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' mu nu ‑kɔɔ' 'lɛkpalɛ 'eke‑ ta ‑a ‑din. 'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'woo‑ zan ‑za do ‑yrɛwolɛ 'ka ma dɔɔ:

'Ka 'laa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'ka zrubatɛdɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑gblaan kla 'ka 'yi, 'ke ‑ya pe 'ka ni dɔɔ Mɛɛzan nu yi 'ɛ ꞊bhwa. 'Ali‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'ke 'a ꞊pia 'ka ni 'kaa ‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ ꞊kpaa ‑a ‑lii oo, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke ‑ya ꞊pia dɔɔ 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ ‑daa 'o mɔɔ ‑la ba oo, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑ya ꞊pia dɔɔ 'o mɔɔ ‑le 'bhɛ 'lɛtrɛ 'ɛ ꞊kpaa ‑a 'kɔɔ oo, 'ka 'laa 'ka 'kpalɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'yi.

'Ka 'laa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke ‑o 'ka 'yini‑ gbɛ do 'kpɔ ma. ‑Amasrɔyi 'sani‑ Mɛɛzan nu yi 'ɛ 'bhɔle‑ 'pleŋ‑, mɛɛ ‑bebe nu ‑wlɛnlɛ' ‑Waanbhaa' ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo ‑baŋgo' ‑yaa' ‑jan 'ɛ 'klɔsikunle 'ɛ 'yi 'elwale 'pe. 'Bhɛ blaan, ‑o pɛ 'la sii ‹Mɛɛ ‑Yɔɔ'› 'bhɛ nu 'pwɛlɛ‑ ‑a ‑yi. ‑Yoo 'ke 'siɛ pɛ 'le ‑jranama 'tɛ 'yi ‑Waanbhaa' 'kɔɔ.

'Yee‑ Mɛɛ ‑yɔɔ 'ɛ nu ‑a ‑baŋgolɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑e nu ‑a ‑baŋgolɛ bhaaplɛŋ mu gba pɛ 'tɔle‑ gba pɛ 'bhɛ 'yi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑e nu gelɛ yaalɛ *‑Waanbhaa' Gba 'Fɛ ‑gbɛnɛ 'ɛ ꞊la, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya pe ‑a 'gbu ma 'kaa ‑yoo 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' 'le.
'Ŋ 'yaa‑ 'ka ba 'waati 'la ba, 'ŋ 'yee‑ ‑jan mu 'lɛɛ‑ ꞊woa 'ka ni, waa ‑o ‑li 'ka 'kpee ɛɛ?
'Duŋ‑ ‑zɔn pɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'yee‑ Mɛɛ ‑yɔɔ' 'ɛ 'yikun zii', 'kooko‑ ‑e nu ‑a nu 'yi 'ɛ dɔle ‑o 'waati 'la ba 'bhɛɛ‑ ba, 'ka 'gbu 'bhɛ dɔ.

'Yee‑ ‑glɔɔya' ‑yɔɔ' 'la ‑yoo mɛɛ mu klɛ 'zi ‑kala' mɛɛ mu 'le ‑Waanbhaa' ma, ‑e yewole ꞊saan gban gaanyi'. 'Duŋ‑ pɛ 'la 'bhɛ 'a 'yikwan꞊ 'kee‑ nu 'tɛnlɛ‑ ‑zɔn ma, 'ke 'bhɛ 'laa golɛ ‑a ‑lɛɛ, yaa sɔ 'pwɛle ‑a ‑yi.

'Ke 'bhɛ ‑gwa 'yee‑ Mɛɛ ‑Yɔɔ' 'ɛ ‑lɛɛ 'waati 'la ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'pwɛ a ‑yi 'tɛ. 'Bhɛɛ‑ Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi ‑lii ‑ploo 'ɛ nu 'yee‑ Mɛɛ ‑yɔɔ 'ɛ dɛlɛ. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑a nu bhla 'ɛ zi 'tɛbhile ‑yrayra 'ɛ nu 'yee‑ Mɛɛ ‑yɔɔ' 'ɛ 'kpaciɛlɛ 'feŋfeŋ.
'Yee‑ Mɛɛ ‑yɔɔ' 'ɛ nu 'pwɛlɛ‑ ‑a ‑yi 'ke ‑Setran' a ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'le ‑a ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑e nu 'sɔle‑ maza ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'pegee 'kpeelɛni maza ‑tɔɔmasie mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛlɛ, 'kooko‑ 'kee‑ sɔ mɛɛ mu ‑yinile.
‑E nu ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛlɛ, 'kooko‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ni 'zi 'ɛ ta, ‑e 'mu 'yini‑. ‑Woo 'ni 'zi 'ɛ ta, ‑amasrɔyi wlan 'la 'bhɛ 'yaa‑ sɔ ‑o gole‑ ‑za 'yi, 'bhɛ ‑za 'laa 'sɔlɛ‑ ‑o ni.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, ‑Waanbhaa' 'a ꞊twa 'ke ‑glɔɔya' ‑do ‑o ‑yini', 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo kpa bhla 'yi.
'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa 'mu 'kpalɛ‑ wlan 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛle ꞊swa 'mu ni, ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑kpan nu baalɛ 'mu ta.

'Ke ‑yoo 'o mɔɔ a pɛ 'le, 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'waa sɔ 'ploole ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔle 'kaa‑ ‑za ma, 'ka mu 'la 'ka ‑za sɔ Mɛɛzan ni 'egbɛnɛle bhe. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' 'ka mu ‑la makwan‑ 'elwale 'pe, 'kooko‑ 'ka sɔ gole‑ ‑za 'yi Lii 'Weŋ 'la ‑ya klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ klɛ 'weŋ 'bhɛ 'srɔyi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ka 'kpale 'la ‑yoo ‑Waanbhaa' a Wlan 'ɛ 'yi 'bhɛ 'srɔyi.
‑Waanbhaa' 'ka 'siila‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaama‑, ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'la 'o 'bhɛ ꞊woa 'ka ni 'bhɛ 'srɔyi. ‑E ‑yaa zi 'bhii‑ 'ka dɔ klɛ ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi a 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ ba.

'Bhɛ 'yi 'tɛ, 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, ‑ka bo 'eglɔɔle. 'O ‑jan 'oo ‑jan 'la ꞊woa 'ka ni, 'kee‑ ꞊kla 'o 'liijan‑ mu 'le oo, 'kee‑ ꞊kla 'o 'kɛ mu 'la yɔɔndia‑ 'lɛtrɛ 'yi 'mu 'le bhe oo, 'mu bo 'ka 'kpee 'eglɔɔle.

Bhaa ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑kɔɔ' ‑za ꞊swa 'bhɛ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ꞊lia ‑kɔɔ' ma 'bhɛ 'fuudɔ‑ ‑kɔɔ' ta, 'fuudɔle 'la ‑daŋ' 'laa 'bhɛ ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑e ‑yrikpaleya ‑lrele' 'la ꞊naa ‑kɔɔ' ni 'mu 'le.

Bhaa ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'ka zru 'ɛ pa 'fuudɔle 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ faŋgandɔ 'ka ta, 'kooko‑ 'ka sɔ klɛza ‑lrele' 'tɔle‑ klɛza 'lrele‑ 'bhɛ klɛle‑, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke 'ka sɔ ‑jan 'lrele‑ ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'wole.
'Waa ‑jan 'lɛyanyrɛ ‑le dɔɔ ‑ka 'ka 'seriwo 'waa‑ ‑za ma, 'kooko‑ Mɛɛzan ‑a ‑jan 'ɛ zɛn blaale‑ 'yrɛkpɛn‑ ꞊nɔɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɔkpɛn' 'a 'lɛdɔ‑ ‑a ma 'bhii‑ ‑wa ‑lɛdwa ‑a ma gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'ka ba ye.
‑Ka 'ka 'seriwo 'waa‑ ‑za ma 'ezin‑, 'kooko‑ ‑Waanbhaa' mɛɛ ‑yɔɔ' 'pegee mɛɛ yiɛnle mu kan 'o ma 'egbɔɔnle. ‑Amasrɔyi mɔkpɛn' 'laa 'e kpa ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi.
'Duŋ‑ Mɛɛzan zru ‑o do. ‑E nu faŋgandɔlɛ 'ka ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'ka tagbin‑ ‑Setran' 'lɛɛ.
'O 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'ka ba ‑zayi', dɔɔ 'o ‑za mu 'la ꞊pia 'ka ni, 'ka ‑o 'mu klɛ 'zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka nu bolɛ 'mu klɛlɛ ma yikpɛnsee.
Bhaa Mɛɛzan bhɔ 'ka ba, 'kooko‑ 'ka ‑za sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ni gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ka 'bhɛ dɔ, 'bhɛ 'pegee, 'kooko‑ 'ka 'ka zrubakpalaa 'bhii‑ Krisi 'bhɛ zrubakpalaa gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ ‑yrɛn 'yi.

'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'o ‑za 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'kpankpanyanle 'ka ma Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'tɔ 'yi dɔɔ ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ 'tɔle‑ ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ 'la lrwawo, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a bole ‑o 'kaanle‑ 'te ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke yaa 'taawo 'o 'ka ‑daanna ‑za mu 'la 'le 'mu zi, ‑ka 'ka 'pleŋgo‑ 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ ma.
'Kaa klɛ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'ka klɛza kpa 'waa pɛ klɛza 'ɛ ma, 'ka 'gbu 'bhɛ dɔ. ‑Amasrɔyi 'o 'yaa‑ bhla 'la ba 'ka ba ye, 'waa lrwawolɛ.
Waa mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ a pɛbhlelɛ bhaama. Drɔɔn' ‑bi zi oo, ‑yrekpaa' oo, 'o yewoa꞊ 'eglɔɔle, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'o 'trɛbhwa꞊; 'kooko‑ 'o sɔ 'o 'gbu mazagole, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'waa klɛ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ta 'kwe 'le.
'Wa klɛlawoa 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, yaa klɛlɛ 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ 'seŋ 'laa ‑yaa 'o ni 'ke 'o pɛbhle 'ka ba. 'Duŋ‑ 'o yewoa‑ 'ke 'woo 'gbu mazago, 'kooko‑ 'ka 'bhɛɛ‑ yɛkɛ‑ za klɛ.
'O 'yaa‑ 'ka ba ye 'waati 'la ba, 'o 'bhɛ 'toŋ 'ɛ ‑dwa 'ka ni dɔɔ «'Ke mɛɛ 'o mɛɛ 'la zan laa ‑a zi 'bhii‑ ‑e yewo 'bhɛ zan laa pɛlelɛ ‑titi.»
'Wa ꞊maa dɔɔ 'ka ba mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑o lrwawo 'zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o bole ‑o 'kaanle‑ ma, 'ke ‑woo gaan bɔ mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu a ‑za mu 'yi.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'wa 'pe zii' 'bhɛ zan mu ni, 'ke ‑o zruwla 'mu 'kpee Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'tɔ 'yi dɔɔ ‑o yewo 'taŋii, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo 'gbu mazago.
'Ka mu 'gbu 'o nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, 'ka mu gbɛ zi 'laa 'kanlɛ‑ ‑za 'wlan klɛle ma.

'O ‑jan mu 'la ꞊woa 'ka ni 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi, 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan 'e ‑baŋgwa 'mu ‑klɔsikunle ma, ‑ka 'bhɛ zan 'kpa 'ka 'yrɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kaa‑ ‑za 'ke 'laa klɛlɛ 'eke‑ ta 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ 'le, 'kooko‑ ‑yraladɔ ‑a ma.
'Duŋ‑, 'ka 'laa 'kunlɛ‑ 'bhii‑ 'ka 'sɔɔnnii, ‑kaa ‑lia 'bhii‑ 'ka nɛɛnɛ‑ do gbɛɛn‑.
'Ŋ nɛɛnɛ‑ mu, bhaa yilabla ‑o Mɛɛzan 'la 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛ 'gbu yilabla 'na 'ka ni 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba, 'bhɛ 'pegee yrɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ꞊nɔɔ! Bhaa Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' klɛ 'ka 'kpɛn ba!
'Mi 'gbu Pɔlu ‑le 'sɛwɛyɔɔn 'lɛɛ‑ dɛ 'zi ‑gɛ: «'Mi Pɔlu 'ka 'pubwa‑». 'Mi 'ŋ 'gbu gbɛblaan kpalaa' 'an 'lɛtrɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ꞊la 'bhɛɛ‑ gbɛɛn‑ ‑gee' bhe. 'Mi 'gbu gbɛblaan ‑le 'bhɛ 'le bhe.
Bhaa ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi ‑li 'ka 'kpɛn ma!
I Timothy: 'Mi Pɔlu ‑o 'ke Zesu Krisi a *winbɔwo mi 'le, ‑amasrɔyi ‑kɔɔ' 'Bhee Mi ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' 'yrikpale ‑o Zesu Krisi 'la ta, 'mu ‑le 'a ꞊pia 'ŋ ni dɔɔ 'ŋ klɛ 'kɛle‑.

'Mi ‑o 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpa zii' 'bhi Timote ‑la ni, 'bhi 'la 'bhi ‑o 'ke 'ŋ gbe ‑zeze 'gbu 'ɛ 'le 'kpaleya a pɛ zi 'ɛ ta bhe. Bhaa ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi ‑li 'e ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑o yilabla 'na 'e ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e 'yrɛnkla‑ ‑o ma.

'Ŋ ge bhla 'ɛ zi Masedwani 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi, 'ŋ zruwlaa‑ 'e 'kpee dɔɔ 'e bo Efɛzi ‑wa 'ɛ ta. ‑Amasrɔyi mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑o mɛɛ mu daan 'zi 'ke bhla ma daangbɛya 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'le. ‑A pe 'mu ni dɔɔ 'mu 'ploo‑ 'bhɛ bhla ma daangbɛya ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ ma.

‑A pe ‑o ni dɔɔ ‑o blɔɔle laa bolɛ 'elwaleta ‑za 'yifleŋ mu 'ɛ ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑o 'ploo‑ ‑zaabɔle ma ‑o ‑gbɔɔ 'saa mu 'ɛ 'tɔ mu 'ɛ ta. 'Bhɛ ‑za mu 'ɛ 'mu ‑o zaa ‑wlɛnpɛ' mu 'te ‑la ‑le 'ka 'pleŋ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑lɛbɛŋgole laa ‑o 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' zru maza ‑lɛdulale 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'le, 'bhɛ 'pegee waa 'ka 'kpaleya 'ɛ Krisi 'yi 'bhɛ baan' kla 'bhɛ ba.

'Ŋ 'bhɛ ‑jan 'lɛɛ‑ 'wo zii' 'e ni win 'la ma, 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ 'ke 'sɔniya klɛ bhaaplɛŋ mu 'ɛ pleŋ‑; 'sɔniya 'la 'bhɛ da zru 'weŋ do 'pegee 'kpee 'fleele‑ do 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'kpaleya 'la ‑yoo 'ke 'kpaleya ‑zeze 'gbu 'ɛ 'le 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yi.
Mɛɛ 'ke mu ‑gwa gban 'bhɛ wlan ma zi ‑lrele' 'ɛ ta. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑o bole ‑o zaabɔle 'gbansaan 'te ‑la ma 'ke ‑woo 'gbu 'yini‑ ‑sɔ.
‑Wa zi 'bhii‑ ‑o klɛ Moizi a 'toŋ mu 'ɛ daan mu 'le, 'duŋ‑ waa ‑o 'gbu 'wojan‑ mu 'ɛ 'yima‑; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo mɛɛ mu daan 'zi ‑za mu 'la 'le ‑o zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le, ‑o 'gbu 'laa 'mu 'yidɔ‑.
‑Kɔɔ' 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ *'Toŋ 'ɛ ‑yoo 'ke ‑za 'lrele' 'le 'ke mɛɛ 'a 'yi za ‑kla 'elrele.

'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'a 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ waa 'Toŋ 'ɛ klɛlɛ mɛɛ ‑lɛdɔɔle mu 'kaama‑. ‑Wa ꞊kla mɛɛ ‑yɔɔ' mu 'pegee ‑kala' mɛɛ mu, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'kpee 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'pegee ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ mu ‑la 'kaama‑. ‑Wa ‑kla mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa gblaan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛ, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑a 'tɔsiɛ mu, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'mu dɛ 'pegee 'mu nɛɛ dɛ, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ dɛ mu ‑la 'kaama‑.

'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑yanbhɔɔya dɛ mu oo, 'gwlaan‑ mu 'la yilaa' 'mu 'tanyɔɔn 'gwlaan‑ mu ba oo; lu gɔn mu oo, bhlanii‑ mu oo, mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'siɛnwo‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ma bhla 'le oo, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'kpɛn ‑za mu 'oo ‑za mu 'la klɛ 'ke 'mu 'pegee daangbɛya 'lɛdɔɔle 'ɛ 'lɛbɛŋgole laa ‑o, ‑o *'Toŋ 'ɛ ꞊kla 'mu 'kpɛn ‑la 'kaama‑.
‑O ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'la gbɛkpaa‑ 'mi 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛ daangbɛya 'ɛ ‑daa 'yee‑ daangbɛya dɔɔle 'ɛ 'yela‑ ‑yi. 'Yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ ‑e ‑Waanbhaa 'la 'duma na ‑kɔɔ' ni 'bhɛ a 'tɔbhɔleya 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ wo.
'Mi ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'pubɔ, 'yele‑ faŋgandwa 'ŋ ta 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ ꞊swa ‑yaa' ye 'ɛ 'wole. 'Mi 'an 'pubɔ‑ 'ezin‑, ‑amasrɔyi ‑ye 'ŋ ꞊ya ‑yaa' ye 'ɛ 'wo mi 'le.

'Mi 'la 'mi 'yaa‑ 'elwale ‑sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔsiɛ mi 'le 'ke 'ŋ ‑yrɛnkpa' Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'yaa‑ ‑za klɛ yran ma. 'Duŋ‑ 'ŋ 'yrɛnklaa‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ma, ‑amasrɔyi 'ŋ 'yaa‑ ‑za mu 'ɛ klɛ ‑zadɔkleya 'pegee 'kpalekleya ‑la ma Krisi 'yi.
Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lia 'ŋ ma 'egbɛnɛle 'ke 'mi 'ŋ kpa Zesu Krisi 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑a ‑za sɔ 'ŋ ni.

'Ŋ 'yoo‑ zan ‑jan 'la 'wolɛ‑ ‑gɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke wlan 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a ‑gaale' ‑o mɔkpɛn' ba 'ke ‑o dɔ 'bhɛ ꞊la; 'bhɛ ‑le dɔɔ: Zesu Krisi ꞊nwa 'drunyan 'yi ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ mu ‑la gole ‑za 'yi. 'Mi Pɔlu ‑le ‑o 'kpɛn ba ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ mi ‑gbɛnɛ 'gbu 'ɛ 'le.

'Duŋ‑ 'ŋ 'yrɛnklaa‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ma 'egbɛnɛle. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑yaa zi 'bhii‑ 'mi Pɔlu 'la 'mi ‑o 'ke ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ mi ‑gbɛnɛ 'gbu 'ɛ 'le bhe, Zesu Krisi 'bhɛ a zrubakpaa ‑gbɛnɛ 'ɛ zrɔn 'mi ni. ‑E 'bhɛ 'kla‑ bhe, 'kooko‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ‑kpaa ‑a ‑yi, 'bhɛ ‑za 'ɛ klɛ 'mu daanpɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'la ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwo‑.

‑Bhleŋgbe ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑ya ‑yrɛ ma 'waati 'ɛ 'kpɛn ba, bhaa ‑kɔɔ' 'a 'lɛdɔ‑ ‑a ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'a 'tɔbhɔ. Yaa ga ‑titi, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ laa ye 'e ‑yrɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yele‑ 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' do ‑kplɛn 'le ‑zɔn 'pegee ‑yikpɛnsee ta. Amiina!

'Ŋ 'nɛ Timote, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ zan 'ŋ zi jan 'la 'wolɛ‑ 'e ni 'saanibhe, 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛla' janwo mu 'ɛ ‑janwoa 'e ba zayi' gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑ ‑sɔ; bhaa 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ klɛ 'fuudɔpɛ 'le 'e ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yee 'gbu ma gwle ‑lrele' 'ɛ dan.

'E 'kpale‑ bo Krisi 'yi, 'e 'kpee 'fleele‑ 'le. 'Bhɛ 'kpee 'fleeleya 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'laa ‑o ‑li mɛɛ 'ke mu 'yi. Waa ‑o 'trɔnkpalɛ 'elrele ‑o 'kpeejan‑ mu 'ɛ ꞊la, 'bhɛla‑ ‑yile ‑waa' 'kpaleya Krisi 'yi 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'siɛla‑ 'bhii‑ ‑yitakoŋ do 'siɛgbɛya gbɛɛn‑ ‑yi ta.
'Bhɛ mɛɛ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ 'ke mu ‑le 'ke Imene 'pegee Alɛzandri 'le. 'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, 'mi ‑o ‑lɛnaa ‑Setran' ni, 'kooko‑ 'bhɛ ‑o 'krowo‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑wa 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔ 'siɛle‑ laa lele ‑titi.
'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑za 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yrɛwole ma 'elwale 'pe dɔɔ ‑ka pɛ mu ‑yrɛwo' ‑Waanbhaa' ma, 'ke 'ka 'ka 'seriwo a ni, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke 'kaa 'sromabɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'kaa 'pubɔ‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn ba zayi'.

‑Ka 'ka 'seriwo ‑bhleŋgbe mu 'pegee mɛɛ gblaan mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma, 'kooko‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'yrɛ ba 'kpaale‑ klɛ, 'ke ‑kɔɔ' bo 'edɔɔle, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke ‑kɔɔ' blɔɔle bo ‑Waanbhaa' ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑kɔɔ' 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ klɛ 'elrele bhaaplɛŋ mu 'ɛ 'pleŋ‑.
'Bhɛ ‑le 'elrele 'bhɛ 'pegee 'bhɛ ‑le sɔ mɛɛ ‑Bhee Mi ‑Waanbhaa' ni.
'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn go ‑za 'yi, 'bhɛɛ ‑o sɔ wlan 'ɛ dɔle‑.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' ‑o do 'kpɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee bhaaplɛŋ mu kpa do ma 'bhɛ ‑o do 'kpɔ: 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke Zesu Krisi 'le, 'bhɛ ‑le ꞊kla bhaaplɛŋ do 'le.
'Yele‑ 'a 'gbu 'naa‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn ta gbawopɛ 'le; ‑e 'bhɛ 'kla‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'waati 'la ‑dwa 'bhɛɛ‑ ba, 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, ‑ya ‑zrɔnna dɔɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn go ‑za 'yi.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayi', ‑Waanbhaa' 'mi ꞊kla 'ke ‑yaa' ‑jan 'ɛ 'wo mi 'le 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑yaa' winbɔwo mi 'le. 'Ŋ 'yoo‑ wlan ‑la pe 'zi 'ka ni, bhla laa 'kɛle‑! ‑Waanbhaa' 'mi 'winbwa‑ 'kaa 'ŋ Zuufu kle mu 'ɛ daan 'kpaleya 'pegee wlan 'le.
'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑a zi 'gbu 'bhii‑ 'gwlaan‑ mu ‑o 'seriwo yrɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ꞊nɔɔ 'ke ‑woo gbɛ wlɛn laanima. ‑Wa klɛ ‑o 'fleele‑ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ waa klɛlɛ 'ke yran 'le ‑o zru ba, 'bhɛ 'pegee sra 'le.

'Mi ‑o ‑a zi 'ezin‑ 'bhii‑ le mu ‑o ‑baa' 'elrele. Waa ‑o ‑taakpalɛ ‑o ‑baa gbɛya 'ɛ 'zi 'ke ‑wa kan ‑a ‑daŋ' ta. Waa ‑o ‑taakpalɛ ‑o wintangbɛya 'ɛ zi; 'bhɛɛ‑ waa ‑o ‑baalɛ' 'ke ‑can pɛ mu 'pegee blina‑ 'yrɔnnɛ 'plɛɛle‑ mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ waa tapɛ 'plɛɛle‑ mu 'klalɛ‑ ‑o ta.
'Duŋ‑ ‑woo ‑lreleya 'ɛ zrɔn 'ke ‑za 'lrele‑ mu ‑la klɛle 'le. Le mu 'oo le mu 'la ‑wa pe dɔɔ ‑o ‑gasikpa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛ, ‑wa klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ gbɛɛn‑.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ezin‑, 'ke 'ka ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a 'fɛ 'ɛ ꞊la, le mu yaale bo ‑o tagalele, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑woo 'trɔnkpa‑ ‑o daangbɛya 'ɛ ꞊la; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo 'gbu ŋgblo 'kpala 'gwlaan‑ mu ꞊la.
'Naa ‑a zi 'bhii‑ le mu mɛɛ daan ‑Waanbhaa' a 'fɛ 'ɛ ꞊la, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑woo 'gbu kpa 'gwlaan‑ mu wiiŋ‑. 'Duŋ‑ le mu tagale bo, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo 'trɔnkpa daangbɛya 'ɛ ꞊la.
Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, ‑Waanbhaa' Adamu ‑la ‑kla 'elwale 'pe, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e Ɛvu ‑kla boolazi.
‑Setran' 'laa Adamu ‑yidanlɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'bhɛ 'yinia‑; 'duŋ‑ ‑Setran' Ɛvu ‑la 'yidaan‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'bhɛ 'yinia꞊. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi Ɛvu 'laa ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑jan 'ɛ 'klɔsikunlɛ.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑, le nu ‑nɛ mu yalɛ; ‑Waanbhaa' nu ‑a golɛ ‑za 'yi 'ke ‑a 'kpale ꞊bwa Krisi 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke ‑o blɔɔle ꞊bwa 'sɔniya 'ɛ ma. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ bakanle ꞊kla 'weŋ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke yaa ‑taakpa' ‑za zi.
Wlan ma jan do 'gbu ‑le ‑gɛ dɔɔ: 'ke mɛɛ do ‑o ‑a zi' 'bhii‑ ‑e klɛ Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛ mu a zilɛɛ‑ 'lɛɛ mu 'ɛ do 'le, 'bhɛ zan ‑o ye kplankplan 'gbu ‑la zi 'bhɛ 'le bhe.

Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛ mu 'ɛ ‑waa' zilɛɛ‑ mu 'ɛ 'taawogbɛya 'ɛ klɛ 'elrele, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke waa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ do 'kpɔ ye ‑o zi. ‑A na klɛ do 'kpɔ, ‑e 'sɔ ‑a 'gbu 'yikunle ‑za ma, 'ke yaa ‑a ‑taakpa' ‑za zi, 'ke ‑o ‑gasikpa ‑a ‑lɛɛ, ‑e 'cie mu 'kun 'elrele, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'sɔ mɛɛ mu daanle‑ 'elrele.
Yaa klɛlɛ ‑wɛɛn mi 'le, gwle laa 'sɔlɛ‑ ‑a ni. 'Duŋ‑ ‑a ‑yi klɛ 'edɔɔle, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e klɛ mɛɛ 'kpa mi 'le 'eke‑ ma. 'Bhɛɛ‑ yaa ‑gɔli' 'flɛn 'laa klɛlɛ.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ezin‑, ‑e 'sɔ ‑a 'gbu a 'fa ‑la mu 'ɛ 'lɛdɔɔle 'elrele. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'sɔ ‑a klɛle‑ 'ke ‑a ‑nɛ mu 'ɛ 'mu 'a 'weli‑ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o ‑gasi ‑gbɛnɛ kpa ‑a ‑lɛɛ.
‑Amasrɔyi 'ke mɛɛ do laa sɔ ‑a 'gbu a 'fa ‑la mu 'ɛ 'lɛdɔɔle 'elrele, ‑e nu 'sɔlɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ ‑gblakunle 'nale‑ ‑a ma 'elrele ɛɛ?
Yaa klɛlɛ 'duŋ‑ Zesu 'yi mi drɛɛ 'le; 'kebhlaale, ‑e nu ‑a 'gbu 'yelɛ‑ mɛɛ gblaan 'le mɛɛ mu ‑yrɛ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑kpan 'la ‑balaa' ‑Setran' ta, 'bhɛ ‑glɔɔn nu baalɛ ‑a ta.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ezin‑ 'duŋ‑, mɛɛ 'la zan mu laa ‑o Zesu 'yi, 'mu 'sɔ ‑a 'tɔ wlan pele‑; 'kooko‑ waa mafinyanwo, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e bɔ ‑Setran' a bhee mu 'ɛ 'yi.

'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi, Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛ mu 'ɛ ‑waa' 'bhɔŋba‑ mu 'ɛ 'ezin‑, 'mu klɛ mɛɛ kplankplan mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑liiwli' laa klɛlɛ plɛ mu 'le; waa klɛlɛ ‑wɛɛn 'mi mu 'le 'bhɛ 'pegee waa ‑gɔli' 'srɔɔwolɛ ‑dawli' 'kpalele mɛɛ mu gbɛ ta.
‑O blɔɔle bo ‑o 'kpee 'fleele‑ 'le ‑waa' 'kpaleya wlan 'la tagaanle ‑yaa 'elwale ‑sɔ 'bhɛ ma.
‑O 'woo‑ 'bhɔŋba‑ mu 'ɛ 'yrɛglin‑ 'elwale 'pe; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke waa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ do 'kpɔ 'yelɛ‑ ‑o zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o sɔ ‑waa' bhɔŋba ye 'ɛ 'wole 'tɛ.
'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'ɛ 'yi, bhɔŋba le mu klɛ le kplankplan mu 'le, waa klɛlɛ mɛɛ 'tɔ 'yɔɔ‑ 'pe le mu 'le, ‑o 'sɔ ‑o 'gbu 'yikunle ‑za ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o zru klɛ do ‑za 'kpɛn 'yi.
'Bhɔŋba‑ 'gwlaan‑ 'ɛ, 'bhɛ klɛ le do 'kpɔ ‑la ‑nɔɔ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'sɔ ‑a 'gbu 'nɛ mu 'ɛ 'pegee ‑yaa' 'fa ꞊la mu 'ɛ 'lɛdɔɔle 'elrele.
'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑waa' 'bhɔŋba‑ ye 'ɛ ꞊woa 'elrele, ‑o nu ‑o ‑lɛdɔlɛ ‑a ma; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o zrubazinale klɛ 'egbɛnɛle ‑waa' 'kpaleya 'ɛ 'yi Krisi 'yi.
Timote, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ 'lɛtrɛ 'kpa zii' 'e ni, ‑amasrɔyi 'ŋ 'yri ‑a ta 'bhii‑ ‑a ‑vinbwa sa 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ ge 'pwɛlɛ‑ 'e ta ye.

'Duŋ‑ 'ke 'ŋ ꞊mwa 'ke 'naa nu 'e ta, 'ŋ 'lɛtrɛ 'la ꞊dia 'e ni ‑gɛ bhe, 'e nu ‑za yɛkɛ‑ 'la klɛlɛ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'pleŋ‑, 'e nu 'bhɛ dɔlɛ 'bhɛ ma. 'Bhɛ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑ya ‑yrɛ ma 'bhɛ a 'fa ꞊la mu 'ɛ 'le. ‑Yaa' mɛɛ mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'bhii‑ wlan 'ɛ ꞊la yri 'pegee ‑a ‑yitɛnpɛ 'le.
Waa sɔ zaabɔle 'bhɛ ta, ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'la tagaanle ‑yaa 'elwaleta ‑sɔ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ a klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ‑gasikpa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'egbɛnɛle. 'Yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le ‑gɛ:
Krisi 'gbu 'pwɛla‑ ‑a ‑yi bhaaplɛŋ do 'le;
‑Waanbhaa' Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'a ‑zrɔnna mɛɛ mu ni 'bhii‑ ‑a ‑lɛdɔɔle ‑o. ‑E ‑pwɛla ‑mlɛkɛ' mu ba;
'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑yaa ‑janwoa 'trɛ ta 'si mu 'ɛ pleŋ‑;
'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo ‑kpaa ‑a ‑yi 'drunyan 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi;
'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'a ꞊sia 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ ‑ja 'kɛle‑ laflɛ' 'yi 'tɔbhɔleya 'yi.

*Lii 'Weŋ 'ɛ ‑ya ꞊pia kpataakpa dɔɔ 'ke 'drunyan 'yan bhla 'ɛ ꞊bhwa ‑wa ‑din 'waati 'la ba, mɛɛ 'ke mu nu 'ploolɛ‑ ‑o 'kpaleya 'ɛ ma Krisi 'yi; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o nu dɔlɛ mɛɛ ‑yini' lii mu 'ke mu zi, 'bhɛ 'pegee 'mu a daangbɛya 'la da ‑Setran' ba 'bhɛ zi.
Mɛɛ ‑yrɛkɔɔza klɛ mu 'pegee bhla ma mɛɛ daan mu 'ɛ nu ‑o ‑yinilɛ. ‑O 'kpee 'ɛ 'tilale ‑o 'bhii‑ ‑gla tilagbɛya gbɛɛn‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ 'kɔɔ.

‑O mɛɛ mu daan dɔɔ waa yaalɛ gwlɛn na, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑wa pe ‑o ni dɔɔ ‑o pɛle 'ke mu 'to ‑o 'sɔɔn 'le. ‑Waanbhaa' 'duŋ‑ 'bhɛ pɛbhle mu 'ɛ ꞊kla, 'kooko‑ 'ke Zesu 'yi mu 'la ‑o wlan 'ɛ dɔ, ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'mu ma 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo bhle.

‑Amasrɔyi, ‑Waanbhaa' pɛ 'oo pɛ 'la ꞊kla 'bhɛ 'kpɛn lele; ‑kɔɔ' 'laa ‑kɔɔ' ‑baŋgolɛ pɛbhle 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yi; 'ke ‑kɔɔ' ‑o pɛ 'oo pɛ 'la 'bhlele, ‑kɔɔ' ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑ 'bhɛ ma 'pe, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'a bhle 'tɛ.
‑Amasrɔyi pɛbhle 'tɔle‑ pɛbhle, ‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ klɛ 'weŋ ‑yaa' ‑jan 'ɛ 'pegee 'seriwole 'le.

Timote, 'kee ‑kɔɔ' nɛɛnɛ‑ mu 'ɛ ‑daanna ‑za mu 'la bhe ‑o 'kpɛn 'le, 'e nu klɛlɛ Zesu Krisi a yewonɛ 'lrele‑ 'gbu 'le. 'E nu ‑a zrɔnlɛ 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ 'tɛ 'bhii‑ 'yoo‑ 'e zru 'ɛ 'lɛbɔ 'zi 'ke 'kpaleya ma ‑jan 'ɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yoo‑ 'taawo zii' daangbɛya ‑lrele' 'ɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ zi.
'Duŋ‑ 'elwaleta can mu 'la ‑woo 'ke bhla ma jan mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o gole ‑o 'kpaleya a pɛ jan mu 'ɛ ma, 'yaa 'e 'trɔnkpalɛ 'mu ‑la ‑titi.

'Duŋ‑ dɔ klɛn 'kee blɔɔle bo ‑Waanbhaa' ma; ‑amasrɔyi 'flɛ yikan' maza klɛle ‑za sa ‑la ‑yanwo' mɛɛ ma. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ 'kee blɔɔle ꞊bwa ‑Waanbhaa' ma 'bhɛ ‑o 'elrele mɛɛ ma ‑za 'kpɛn 'yi; ‑amasrɔyi 'bhɛ ‑zɔn bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'ɛ na ‑kɔɔ' ni, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑e boolazi bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'ɛ 'naza‑ pe ‑kɔɔ' ni.
'Bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke wlan 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ mɔkpɛn' sɔ 'e 'kpale ‑a ‑yi.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'woo‑ yewo 'zi 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'woo 'sɛnɛ wla, ‑amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑ya ‑yrɛ ma 'bhɛ ‑le 'o 'yrikpapɛ 'le; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yele‑ 'ke bhaaplɛŋ mu 'kpɛn 'Bhee mi 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'gbu 'mu 'kpaa‑ Krisi 'yi, ‑e 'mu go ‑za 'yi ‑zɔn 'pegee yikpɛnsee ta.
‑A pe ‑o ni ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑za 'ɛ klɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yoo‑ daan 'kɛle‑.

'Yaa 'tolɛ‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'e mafinyanwo 'yaa‑ ‑zwannɛya 'ɛ ma. 'Duŋ‑ ‑a 'to 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'kpale‑ ‑o Krisi 'yi, ‑o 'yaa‑ ‑janwo' gbɛya 'ɛ 'pegee 'e 'taawogbɛya ye, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o 'yaa‑ 'sɔniya ‑glɔɔn 'pegee 'e 'kpaleya 'ɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e 'kpee 'fleeleya 'ɛ 'mu ye; 'kooko‑ ‑o sɔ ‑o 'kpale 'e ma 'mu 'kpɛn 'yi.
'Sani‑ 'ŋ gele pleŋ‑ 'e ta ye, dɔ klɛn 'kee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a 'Sɛwɛ 'ɛ tape mɛɛ mu ni, 'ke 'yoo‑ lia 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke 'yoo‑ daan 'kɛle‑.

'E Lii 'seŋ 'la 'srɔɔwoa‑ bhe, 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ 'naza‑ 'ɛ ꞊kpaa ‑a ‑lɛla' janwo mu 'ɛ 'lii, 'yaa 'e 'yrɛ zi ‑gblaanlɛ' yewole ma 'bhɛ 'le‑. ‑Ya naza 'ɛ 'pelawoa ‑a ‑lɛla janwo mu 'ɛ ni, 'bhɛɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ‑waa' zilɛɛ‑ mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'mu 'mu gbɛkpaa‑ 'e ta 'mu 'seriwolele, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya 'srɔɔwoa‑ 'tɛ.

Dɔ klɛn 'kee 'bhɛ ‑za mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn klɛ 'ke 'yoo‑ 'lɛyan‑ ‑a ma; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e 'gbu 'na 'yee‑ ye 'ɛ ni 'e nii‑ 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le. 'Ke 'bhɛ ꞊kla, mɔkpɛn' nu ‑a yelɛ 'bhii‑ 'yoo‑ ge 'zi zilɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa a ye 'ɛ 'yi.

'Yaa‑ 'taawogbɛya 'pegee 'yaa‑ daangbɛya 'ɛ ‑o ‑klɔsikun 'elrele. Dɔ klɛn 'bhɛ klɛle ma. 'Ke 'ya ꞊kla 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe, 'e nu 'e 'gbu golɛ ‑za 'yi, 'bhɛ 'pegee mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'trɔnkpa zii' 'e ni, 'mu nu golɛ ‑za 'yi 'ezin‑.
'Yaa ‑jan ‑glɔɔ 'wolɛ‑ 'gwlaan‑ gblaan 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ni, 'duŋ‑ zruwla ‑a 'kpee 'bhii‑ 'e dɛ. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑zwannɛ mu 'ɛ 'kun 'bhɛ 'kungbɛya do 'kpɔ 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhii‑ 'e 'gbu nɛɛnɛ‑ mu gbɛɛn‑.
'Bhɛ ya 'ɛ 'yi 'ezin‑, le gblaan mu 'ɛ 'kun 'bhii‑ 'e nɛɛ mu, 'bhɛɛ‑ le 'seebaanɛ mu 'ɛ 'kun 'bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'kpɔ 'ɛ 'yi 'bhii‑ 'e nɛɛnɛ‑ ‑le mu 'e 'kpee 'fleele‑ 'le.
Le mu 'la ‑woo glaanle ‑zeze mu 'gbu 'le, ‑o ‑lɛdɔ' ‑a ma.

'Duŋ‑ 'ke glaanle mu 'la 'nɛ mu 'pegee ‑o 'nranɛ‑ mu ‑o, 'bhɛ ‑nɛ mu 'ɛ ‑woo ‑gasi 'la 'kpa zii' ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛ bhe, ‑o 'bhɛ 'kpa 'elwale 'pe 'ke ‑o bhɔ ‑o 'gbu a 'fa ‑la mu 'ɛ ba. ‑O yapɛ mu 'ɛ ‑za 'la ꞊kla ‑o ni 'elwale gban ‑sɔ, ‑o 'bhɛ yɛkɛ‑ za mu klɛ 'mu ni. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ni.
Le 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke glaanle ‑zeze 'gbu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'bhɔŋba‑ mi do 'kpɔ 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ 'kɔɔ, ‑ya ‑yrikpa' ‑Waanbhaa' ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e bo pɛ ‑yrɛwole ma 'bhɛ ma 'seri 'yi ‑bi zi 'pegee ‑yrekpaa'.
'Duŋ‑ glaanle 'la 'bhɛ bole ‑o 'bhɛ 'gbu 'nrayiza mu klɛle ma, 'bhɛ ‑o 'bhii‑ 'bhɛ ‑gaa gban 'ali‑ 'ke ‑ya ‑yrɛ ma ‑li.
'Bhɛ ‑jan 'lɛɛ‑ 'wo ‑o ni, 'kooko‑ waa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ye ‑o zi.

'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan laa ‑yaa' mɛɛ mu ‑gblakun' 'elrele, 'ali‑ 'ke 'bhɛ kpa ‑yaa' pɛ 'fa ꞊la mu 'gbu 'ɛ ta 'elwale 'pe, 'bhɛ zan laa ‑o ‑li 'kpaleya zi 'ɛ ta; 'ali‑ ‑a ‑yɔɔ' ‑yiya' mɛɛ 'la zan laa ‑Waanbhaa' dɔ 'bhɛ zan ni.
'Ke glaanle 'la 'bhɛ 'ya lɛɛ ‑lii 'ɛ ꞊kaan lɛɛ mia yaga ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑a yaale ‑yaa 'gwlaan‑ do 'kpɔ ‑la 'kɔɔ; 'e sɔ 'bhɛɛ‑ glaanle ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'tɔ 'ɛ sɛwɛwole glaanle mu 'tɔ 'ɛ ba.

'Ke mɔkpɛn' 'a dɔ ‑a klɛza ‑lrele' mu 'ɛ ma: 'ke ‑wa 'yaango‑ 'bhii‑ ‑ya ‑nɛ mu 'ɛ 'trola‑ 'elrele, 'kee‑ ‑yaa' 'cie mu kun 'elrele, ‑e ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'weŋ mu 'ɛ gaan mafia‑, 'kee‑ ‑yaa bhɔ ‑yrɛn ma mɛɛ mu ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e ‑yaa ‑za 'wlan ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑la klɛyrɛ glin mɛɛ mu ni.
'Duŋ‑ 'yaa dɔlɛ glaanle 'seebaanɛ mu 'ɛ 'mu 'tɔ 'sɛwɛwole ‑la. ‑Amasrɔyi 'ke 'drunyan ta pɛ ‑lrɔ 'ɛ ‑dwa ‑o ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑wa pe dɔɔ ‑o yaale' gwlɛn na; 'bhɛ klɛ gbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑o ploo Krisi a zi 'ɛ ma.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛla‑ ‑yile, ‑kpan balaa' ‑o 'gbu ta, ‑amasrɔyi ‑woo ‑liiwli' 'la 'naa‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ni dɔɔ ‑o nu bolɛ Krisi a pɛ 'le, waa bo 'bhɛ ta 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o 'bhɛ 'yisiɛ‑.

'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ezin‑, ‑o woye laa ‑o, 'bhɛla‑ ‑yile ‑o kanaa' 'fɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ꞊la; 'duŋ‑ ‑za 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'eyɔɔle 'ezin‑ 'bhɛ ‑le ‑o ‑lɛ ma nra, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑o ‑lɛ ta laa ga ‑jan ta ‑titi. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑o wo jan laa 'kɛla 'bhɛ 'le ‑o 'bhɛɛ‑ wo.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑a zi 'bhii‑ glaanle 'seebaanɛ mu 'ɛ ‑o yala‑ gwlɛn na, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o ‑nɛ mu ‑srɔɔwo', 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o waa 'fa ‑la mu 'ɛ 'lɛdɔɔ‑ 'elrele; 'kooko‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'sɔɔnnii 'laa sɔ ‑o 'tɔ 'yɔɔ‑ peyrɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'srɔɔwole.
'Naa 'o 'bhɛ 'pe zii' bhaama, ‑amasrɔyi 'woo‑ glaanle mu 'ɛ 'ke mu ‑ploola gban ‑Waanbhaa 'a zi dɔɔle 'ɛ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu gbaanle ‑o ‑Setran' zi.

'Ke Zesu 'yi le do dɛ ‑nɛ mu 'ke mu ‑o 'ke glaanle mu 'le, ‑e ‑yaa' glaanle mu 'ɛ ‑gblakun', 'kooko‑ 'bhɛ glaanle mu 'ɛ waa bo Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ta 'kwe 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu sɔ bhɔle‑ glaanle mu 'la mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ‑o 'mu 'kɔɔ 'bhɛ mu ba.
Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ‑waa' zilɛɛ‑ mu 'la 'mu ‑o 'mu a ye 'ɛ 'wo zii' 'elrele, ‑ka 'mu 'lɛdɔ‑ ‑a ma 'eke‑ trala plɛ, ‑ka 'bhɛ klɛ 'kɛ mu 'gbu 'la ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ wo, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o mɛɛ mu daan 'kɛle‑ 'mu ‑la ni.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑a pele ‑o ‑Waanbhaa' a 'sɛwɛ 'ɛ 'yi dɔɔ:
«'Ke dri 'ɛ ‑yoo pɛbhɛ 'taan zii' ‑a gaan 'ɛ 'le 'waati 'la ba, 'yaa ‑a ‑lii 'yrelɛ‑;»
'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a yɔɔndɛle ‑o 'ezin‑ dɔɔ:
«Yewonɛ 'ɛ ‑yaa' pɛ ‑le 'ke ‑a ‑sra 'ɛ 'le.»
'Ke mɛɛ do ‑o ‑la 'zi Zesu 'yi mu a zilɛɛ‑ mi do ta ‑za do 'yi, 'yaa dɔlɛ 'bhɛ ꞊la; 'fɔke mɛɛ plɛ, mɛɛ yaga 'sii, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'mu klɛ 'e 'srɛ 'le 'yee‑ ‑za 'ɛ ma.
Zesu 'yi mu 'ɛ ‑waa' zilɛɛ‑ mu 'la bole ‑o ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu klɛle ma, 'bhɛ ‑jan 'ɛ 'wo mɔkpɛn' 'yrɛ ma kpataakpa; 'kooko‑ mɛɛ ‑vin mu 'ɛ 'mu gblaan ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛle ma.

'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑jan 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kwlanwole 'e ma 'eglɔɔle ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee Zesu Krisi 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑mlɛkɛ' mu 'la makwan‑ 'mu 'yrɛ ma dɔɔ: Dɔ klɛn 'kee 'toŋ mu 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpɛn 'klɔsikun, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yaa ‑a do mabhaabhɔlɛ ‑a do ta; 'bhɛ 'pegee 'yaa bhaaplɛŋ mu golɛ 'eke‑ ma.

'Yaa 'kɔɔlɛ‑ 'e gbɛkpale ma mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e ye gbɛkpa ‑a 'kɔɔ Zesu 'yi mu ‑lɛdo' 'ɛ 'pleŋ‑. 'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ka 'pegee mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa 'kpalɛ‑ do ma ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ zayi'. 'E 'gbu 'bo 'e zru 'weŋ 'le.
'Yaa bolɛ ‑yi do ‑kplɛn 'mile‑ ma; ‑wɛɛn sanɛ‑ 'mi 'e 'kpee 'la za 'ɛ 'pegee 'e ma yikpɛn‑ ta ga 'fiɛntrɔnnɛ mu 'ɛ ‑zayi'.
Mɛɛ 'ke mu a ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ gaanle laa ‑o 'mu ma 'sani‑ ‑woo 'kitikan; 'duŋ‑ mɛɛ 'ke mu a pɛ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ ‑o 'mu ye boolazi ‑a ma.
'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya do 'kpɔ 'ɛ 'yi, klɛza ‑lrele' mu 'ɛ gaanle laa klɛ 'mu ma, 'mu 'pwɛle‑ klɛ ‑gbaklaa 'edile; 'ali‑ 'ke 'kɛ mu 'la 'mu ta laa 'pwɛle‑ veŋ‑, 'mu tagaanle laa bo.

Zesu 'yi mu 'la 'kpɛn ‑o 'ke lu mu 'le, ‑o ‑gasikpa ‑o zan mu 'ɛ 'lɛɛ 'ke ‑woo ‑lɛdɔ' a ma gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma; 'kooko‑ mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa sɔ ‑Waanbhaa' 'tɔ 'ɛ 'siɛle 'bhɛ 'pegee 'ke waa sɔ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ pele‑ ‑kɔɔa' daangbɛya 'ɛ ma.

Lu mu 'la 'mu zan mu ‑o 'ke Zesu 'yi mu 'le, ‑o ‑gasikpa 'mu 'lɛɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ waa pelɛ dɔɔ ‑o 'kpɛn ‑o 'ke nɛɛnɛ‑ ma do mu 'le. Drɔɔn' ‑o yewo 'mu ni 'elrele gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma; ‑amasrɔyi ‑woo yewo 'zi mɛɛ 'la zan mu ni, 'bhɛ mu ‑o 'ke ‑o ‑yiɛnii' Zesu 'yi mu 'le. Mɛɛ mu 'ɛ daan 'bhɛ ‑jan mu 'la bhe 'mu ‑le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ya 'kpankpanyan ‑o ma.

'Ke mɛɛ 'ke mɛɛ mu daan daangbɛya 'bhɛɛke 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke yaa 'taawo‑ ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'wojan‑ 'weŋ mu 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke yaa 'taawo‑ daangbɛya 'la 'bhɛ 'a klɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ Zesu 'yi mu ‑gasikpa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛ 'bhɛ ta,

'bhɛ zan ‑o 'bhɛ 'gbu magbaandɛ 'zi, 'bhɛɛ‑ yaa ‑za 'kedo‑ dɔ. 'Duŋ‑ zaabɔ ‑lrɔ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o ‑a ma 'bhii‑ ga, 'bhɛɛ‑ gwle 'kanle sɔ ‑a ni jan 'le bhaama. 'Bhɛ ‑za mu 'la bhe, 'mu nu 'ke zranwole 'pegee sra 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑zwanwole 'pegee 'kpee jan ‑yɔɔ' mu 'le;

'bhɛɛ‑ zaabɔle mu 'la waa yan. 'Bhɛ zaabɔle mu 'la waa yan 'mu da mɛɛ la zan mu 'nii‑ 'ɛ ‑gaa, 'mu ‑la ba; 'bhɛɛ‑ waa wlan dɔ ‑titi. ‑O 'kpee ma, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛgblaanya 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑naflo ‑glinza' ‑la ‑le.
Wlan 'gbu 'ɛ ni, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛgblaanya 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o ‑za 'wlan 'srɔɔwo zi 'le, 'ke mɛɛ 'e zru ‑kpalaa' pɛ yɛkɛ‑ 'la ‑ya 'kɔɔ 'bhɛ ma.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑kɔɔ' 'laa nulɛ pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'le ‑kɔɔ' 'kɔɔ 'trɛ ta ‑gɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'laa nu gelɛ pɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'le ‑kɔɔ' 'kɔɔ.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑yile, 'ke ‑kɔɔ' ‑kɔɔ' 'le pɛle 'pegee ‑kɔɔ' ta pɛ mu ‑srɔɔwoa 'bhɛ ‑kɔɔ' 'yibhɔ‑.

'Duŋ‑ 'ke mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o ‑a zi 'bhii‑ ‑o klɛ pɛzan mu 'le, ‑o balaa' ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ ‑Setran' a bhee ‑o kun. 'Bhɛ bhee 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke 'truu‑ maza mu ‑bebe 'pegee zrubhɔ maza 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'le; 'bhɛ mu ‑o siɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ni 'feŋfeŋ.
Wlan 'ɛ ni, ‑gɔli' 'flɛn 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le 'ke ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑glɔɔn kli 'le. 'Yee‑ ‑gɔli' 'flɛn 'ɛ 'kɔɔ, mɛɛ 'ke mu ꞊nia 'kpaleya zi 'ɛ ma 'egbɔɔnle; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o 'ŋgami ‑gbɛnɛ 'srɛ kpa ‑o 'gbu ma.

'Duŋ‑ 'bhi Timote, 'bhi 'la 'bhi ‑o 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ 'le bhe, blasan‑ 'bhɛ ‑za mu 'la bhe 'mu 'kpɛn 'lɛɛ. 'Bhɛɛ‑ ‑lɛdɔɔleya zi oo, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lɛɛgblaanya oo, 'kpaleya oo, 'sɔniya oo, zrubakpaaleya oo, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑yidɔɔya 'mu 'kpɛn ‑la ziglin‑.

Dɔ 'eglɔɔle 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e 'kpaleya Krisi 'yi 'ɛ 'bhɛ ta gwle ‑lrele' 'ɛ dan. 'Bhɛɛ‑ bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'la ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma 'bhɛ 'kun. ‑Waanbhaa' 'e 'siila‑ 'bhɛɛ‑ bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'ɛ 'kaama‑; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yee 'kpalawoa Krisi 'yi 'ɛ 'bhɛ ba jan ‑lrele' ꞊woa mɛɛ 'srɛ 'yrɛ ma kpataakpa.
'Mi jan 'lɛɛ‑ 'kwlanwo‑ 'e ma ‑Waanbhaa' 'la ‑si na pɛ mu 'kpɛn ni, 'bhɛ 'yrɛ ma; 'bhɛ 'pegee Zesu Krisi 'la ‑a 'gbu ta ‑jan 'lrele‑ ‑woa Pɔnsi Pitalti 'yrɛ ma.
'Mi ‑o ‑jan 'lɛɛ‑ 'kwlanwo zii' 'e ma 'eglɔɔle dɔɔ ‑a ‑klɔsikun 'elrele, 'bhɛɛ‑ waa ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ do 'kpɔ 'yelɛ‑ 'e zi, 'bhɛ 'pegee bo 'weŋ 'ke 'bhɛ ge 'tɛnle‑ ‑kɔɔa' Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'pwɛ yi 'ɛ ma.

'Yee Krisi 'pwɛ yi 'ɛ nu klɛlɛ 'waati 'la ‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ 'lɛdulaa 'bhɛɛ‑ ba. 'Yela‑ do ‑kplɛn 'kpaale‑ ‑o pɛ 'kpɛn 'wiiŋ‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yele‑ 'ke ‑bhleŋgbe mu 'kpɛn a ‑bhleŋgbe 'le, 'bhɛ 'pegee Mɛɛzan mu 'kpɛn a Mɛɛzan 'le.

'Yela‑ do ‑kplɛn 'laa ga ‑titi; ‑a boyrɛ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke 'tɛbhile 'la 'ke mɛɛ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa sɔ 'e 'mabɛɛnle 'bhɛ ‑din 'bhɛɛ‑ 'le. Bhaaplɛŋ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa 'bhɛ 'yelɛ‑ ‑lido', 'bhɛɛ‑ bhaaplɛŋ 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa sɔ 'bhɛ 'yele. ‑Yaa' pɛ ‑le 'ke 'tɔbhɔleya 'pegee ‑glɔɔya' 'la 'ke ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma 'mu 'le! Amiina!

‑Jan 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'kwlanwo 'eglɔɔle ‑zɔn 'drunyan 'lɛɛ‑ 'yi pɛzan mu 'ɛ ma dɔɔ waa ‑o 'gbu 'wasowolɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ‑yrikpale laa bolɛ ‑naflo pɛ mu 'la waa mɔ 'mu ta; 'duŋ‑ ‑o ‑yrikpale bo ‑Waanbhaa' ‑la ta. 'Yele‑ ‑kɔɔ' gba pɛ 'kpɛn ba 'ebebele, 'kooko‑ ‑kɔɔ' ‑kɔɔ' zrukpalaa 'bhɛ ma.
‑A 'kwlanwo ‑o ma 'eglɔɔle dɔɔ ‑o ‑za 'wlan klɛ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o klɛza ‑lrele' mu 'ɛ klɛ 'esrɛle; ‑o 'kɔɔ 'laa klɛlɛ 'eglɔɔle, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o dɔ ‑a ‑la 'ke ‑woo 'kɔɔpɛ‑ mu 'ɛ 'yiciɛn‑ mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu ma.

'Ke ‑o 'bhɛ ꞊kla, ‑o nu ‑o 'gbu ‑lɛɛ ‑naflo zrɛ dɔlɛ 'bhɛ gbɛɛn‑ bhe boolazi; 'bhɛ ‑naflo 'ɛ 'bhɛ lele 'bhɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ 'laa 'siɛ ‑titi. 'Bhɛ klɛgbɛya 'ɛ 'yi, ‑o nu bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si ‑zeze 'gbu 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwolɛ.

'Ŋ 'nɛ Timote, ‑Waanbhaa' ‑za mu 'la gbɛkpaa‑ 'e 'kɔɔ, ‑o 'kun 'e gbɛ plɛ 'le. 'Ploo‑ bhaama ‑janwole mu 'la waa ‑o 'ke 'kpaleya zi 'ɛ ta janwo gbɛya mu 'le 'mu ma; 'bhɛ 'pegee 'yaa 'e 'lɛbɔlɛ bhaama zaabɔle mu 'yi; 'bhɛ zaa ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ bɔ mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'gbu 'kun 'bhii‑ ‑zadɔ' mu, 'duŋ‑ waa ‑o 'ke 'bhɛ 'le.
Mɛɛ 'ke mu 'kpee ma ‑o 'bhɛ ‑zadɔleya 'ɛ 'srɔɔwoa‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'duŋ‑ ‑o 'kpaleya zi 'ɛ 'bhɛ ꞊twa ‑a nɔɔ‑.
Bhaa ‑Waanbhaa' ‑lileya 'ɛ zina‑ 'ka ta!
II Timothy: 'Mi Pɔlu ‑o 'ke Zesu Krisi a 'winbɔwo mi 'le, ‑Waanbhaa' zru maza ma; 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑le bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'naza‑ ꞊pia bhaaplɛŋ mu ni Zesu Krisi klɛza 'ɛ 'srɔyi.

'Ŋ 'yoo‑ 'lɛtrɛ 'lɛɛ‑ 'kpa zii' 'e ni Timote, 'bhi ‑le 'ke 'ŋ 'nɛ 'la 'bhɛ ‑za sɔ 'ŋ ni 'bhɛ 'le. Bhaa ‑kɔɔ' Dɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'pegee Mɛɛzan Zesu Krisi 'e ‑dɔɔbo', 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e 'yrɛnkla‑ ‑o ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑o yilabla 'na 'e ni!
'Mi ‑Waanbhaa' 'pubɔ‑; 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑yaa' ye 'ɛ 'wo zii' 'ŋ 'kpee 'fleele‑ 'le 'bhii‑ 'ŋ 'taa‑ mu 'a ꞊kla gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑. ‑Bi zi 'pegee ‑yrekpaa' 'e ‑za 'laa ni 'ŋ 'kpee 'an 'seri mu 'ɛ 'yi.
'O 'piila‑ bhla zi 'eke‑ ma, 'e wisia꞊ gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑, 'ke 'bhɛ ‑dwa 'ŋ 'kpee, ‑e klɛ 'ŋ ni 'bhii‑ 'mi 'e 'ye 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ zrukpalaa.

'Kpaleya ‑zeze 'gbu 'la ‑yoo 'e zru 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛ ‑za 'laa go 'ŋ 'kpee. 'Bhɛ 'kpaleya ‑glɔɔn 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑le ‑yaa 'e ‑jie Loisi 'pegee 'e nɛɛ Enisi 'yi; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'kpale‑ ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ ‑o 'kpa gbɛya 'ɛ ‑Waanbhaa' 'yi 'bhɛɛ‑ yɛkɛ‑ ‑le 'bhi 'yi 'ezin‑.
'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayi', 'mi 'seri 'la ꞊kla ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'yaa‑ ‑za ma 'ke 'mi 'ŋ gbɛkpa 'e ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑yee' gbalawoa ‑glɔɔya' 'la ba, ‑a 'to 'ke 'bhɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ bo 'e ta.
‑Amasrɔyi ‑Waanbhaa' ‑kɔɔ' ‑gbaa Lii 'Weŋ 'la ba, 'bhɛ 'laa ‑kɔɔ' klɛ ‑gblaannii' 'le, 'duŋ‑ 'bhɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'pegee 'sɔniya, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑zadɔleya ‑la ‑naa ‑kɔɔ' ni.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayile, ‑yrala' laa dɔlɛ 'e ma Mɛɛzan a ‑jan 'ɛ 'wole‑ ma mɛɛ mu ni. 'Mi 'duŋ‑ 'la 'mi ‑o ‑kaso 'yi ‑a 'tɔ 'ɛ ‑zayi', ‑yrala' laa dɔlɛ 'e ma 'mi ‑zayi'. 'Bhi 'pegee 'mi 'o ‑yrɛnbhle' 'eke‑ 'yi ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ ‑zayi', 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ ta.

'Yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑le ‑kɔɔ' ‑gwa ‑za 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'yele‑ ‑kɔɔ' 'siila‑ dɔɔ ‑kɔɔ' klɛ ‑a 'gbu a mɛɛ mu 'le. 'Duŋ‑ 'yaa ‑kɔɔ' golɛ ‑za 'yi ‑kɔɔ' klɛ za ‑lrele' mu 'ɛ ma, ‑e ‑kɔɔ' ‑gwa ‑za 'yi ‑a 'gbu ‑za yɛkɛ‑ 'la 'lɛdulaa, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑yaa' wlanya 'ɛ 'mu ‑la ma. ‑E ‑kɔɔ' ‑gbaa 'bhɛ wlanya 'ɛ ba, ‑kɔɔ' 'pegee Zesu Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'ɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e 'bhɛ ꞊kla 'waati 'la ba 'ke yaa 'drunyan klɛlɛ ‑li.

‑Zɔn ‑kɔɔ' 'Bhee Mi Zesu Krisi ꞊nwa 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a wlanya 'ɛ zrɔnlɛ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ni. ‑E ga a pɛ faŋgan‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑gwa 'bhɛ 'yi, 'bhɛɛ‑ bole ‑yrɛ ma ‑si 'la ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'bhɛ 'laa siɛ ‑titi, ‑e 'bhɛ 'pwɛla‑ mɔkpɛn' 'yrɛ ma kpataakpa ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'srɔyi.
'Yee‑ ‑Jan 'nrale‑ 'ɛ 'yela‑ wole 'kaama‑, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'mi ꞊kla 'ke ‑yaa' winbɔwo 'pegee ‑yaa' mɛɛ mu daan mi 'le.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayi' 'ezin‑, 'ŋ 'yoo‑ 'bhɛ ‑yrɛn ‑glɔɔn mu 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhle zii'; 'duŋ‑ waa ‑o 'ke 'ŋ ma ‑yrala' 'le. ‑Amasrɔyi 'ŋ 'yrikpale bole ‑o mɛɛ 'la zan ta, 'ŋ 'bhɛ zan 'ɛ dɔ; 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ŋ 'kpale ‑o ‑a ‑yi 'bhii‑ dɔɔ ‑e pɛ 'la gbɛkpaa‑ 'ŋ 'kɔɔ, 'bhɛ 'seŋ ‑o ‑a ni 'ke ‑ya ‑yrɛkpa' 'bhɛ ba, 'fɔke 'bhɛ ge 'tɛnlɛ‑ 'drunyan 'lɛyan 'yi 'ɛ ma.
'Mi 'e ‑daanna wlan ma ‑jan mu 'la 'le bhe, ‑o 'kpa 'e 'kpee kplankplan, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'taawo ‑o ta 'e 'kpaleya 'pegee 'sɔniya 'la 'bhɛ ‑o 'ka 'pegee Zesu Krisi a 'kpaledomaya 'yi 'bhɛ 'le.
'E daangbɛya 'lrele‑ mu 'la 'srɔɔwoa‑ bhe, ‑o 'kpa 'e 'kpee kplankplan Lii 'Weŋ 'la ‑yoo 'e 'yi, 'bhɛ ‑glɔɔya' 'ɛ 'le.
'E 'gbu 'a 'yaango‑ dɔɔ ‑Waanbhaa' a mɛɛ mu 'la 'kpɛn ‑o *Azi 'klɛɛn 'ɛ 'yi, 'mu 'ŋ do ‑kplɛn ꞊twa ‑a nɔɔ‑; Fizɛli 'pegee Erimozɛni mu ‑o 'bhɛ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ ba.

'Duŋ‑ bhaa Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yaa' wlanya 'ɛ zrɔn Onezifɔɔ 'pegee 'bhɛ a 'fa ‑la mu 'ɛ ni. ‑Amasrɔyi ‑e 'fuu ‑dwa 'mi ta gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma; 'ali‑ 'mi 'la 'mi ‑o ‑kaso 'yi, ‑e 'mi 'yelawoa, 'bhɛ 'laa ‑yraladɔlɛ ‑a ma.
Drɔɔn', ‑e bhɔlawoa Rɔmu ‑wa 'ɛ ta, ‑e 'mi ziglinna gbɛ 'ɛ 'kpɛn ma ‑a zru 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'le 'sani‑ ‑e ge 'tɛnlɛ‑ 'ŋ ma.
Bhaa ‑Waanbhaa' 'bhɛ a wlanya 'ɛ zrɔn ‑a ni 'drunyan 'lɛyan 'yi 'le. ‑E ‑za 'wlan mu 'la 'kpɛn ꞊kla 'ŋ ni Efɛzi ‑wa 'ɛ ta, 'e 'gbu 'bhɛ 'yaango‑ kpataakpa.
'Bhi 'ŋ 'nɛ Timote, dɔ 'eglɔɔle ‑lileya 'la ‑yoo Zesu Krisi 'yi 'bhɛ 'yi.
'Mi 'e ‑daanna 'kɛla 'le mɛɛ 'srɛ 'yrɛ ma, 'bhɛ gbɛkpa mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'ke mɛɛ wlan mu 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑o sɔ mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu daanle‑ 'bhɛ 'le 'ezin‑ 'mu 'kɔɔ.
'Yaa‑ pɛ ‑yrɛnbhle', 'bhii‑ Zesu Krisi a ‑srwase' mi wlan do.
‑Srwase' mi 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'laa ‑a 'gbu bɔ 'trɛ ta za mu 'yi, 'ke ‑ya zi 'bhii‑ ‑a ‑za 'sɔ ‑a ‑kuŋlii 'ɛ 'ni.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke mɛɛ do ‑o zaabɔ 'zi mɛɛ ‑bhɛɛke' mu 'le blasanlele ‑jara 'srɔɔwo zayi', 'ke yaa blasanlɛ blasan' gbɛya 'toŋ mu 'ɛ ta, yaa sɔ 'bhɛ blasanle ‑jara 'ɛ 'srɔɔwole.
'Bhɛɛ‑ gbakpa' mi 'la ye ‑glɔɔ 'ɛ ꞊woa ‑yaa' gba 'ɛ 'yi, 'yele‑ gba 'ɛ ta pɛbhaa ‑lwa mu 'ɛ kan mi 'le.
'Ŋ 'yoo‑ 'kɛla 'wo zii' 'e ni ‑gɛ bhe, 'e 'kpeelɛdan 'bhɛ ma 'elrele; ‑amasrɔyi Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' nu a klɛlɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ 'e ‑za 'kpɛn 'yima‑.
Davidi 'nranɛ‑ Zesu Krisi a ‑za 'ɛ bo 'e 'kpee, 'yele‑ ‑bwela gale ba; 'bhii‑ 'an pɛ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'bhɛ ‑a 'wo 'zi gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑.
'Ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑yrɛnbhle' zii' 'yee‑ ‑Jan 'Nrale‑ 'ɛ 'yela‑ woza 'ɛ ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑woo' 'ŋ gbɛ ta ꞊bwa 'ke piibhɛ kpɛlɛ‑ 'le 'bhii‑ ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ klɛ mi do gbɛɛn‑. 'Duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' a ‑Jan 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'yrele‑ laa ‑o.

'Bhɛla‑ ‑zayi', 'ŋ 'yoo‑ ‑za 'kpɛn 'yikun zii' ‑Waanbhaa' mɛɛ mu 'la zan mu makwan‑ 'mu ‑zayi'; 'kooko‑ 'mu sɔ gole ‑za ‑yi Zesu Krisi 'srɔyi, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'tɔbhɔleya 'la ‑daŋ' 'laa ‑o 'bhɛ ma, ‑o sɔ 'bhɛ 'srɔɔwole.
‑Jan mu 'lɛɛ‑ 'mu ‑o 'ke wlan 'le dɔɔ:
«'Ke ‑kɔɔ' 'gbu ‑gaa ‑kɔɔ' 'pegee Zesu Krisi 'le, ‑kɔɔ' mu 'pegee 'yee‑ Krisi nu bolɛ ‑kɔɔ' 'yrɛ ma 'eke‑ 'yi 'ezin‑.
'Bhɛɛ‑ 'ke ‑kɔɔ' ‑za 'yikwan꞊ 'yee‑ 'le, ‑kɔɔ' mu 'pegee 'yee‑ nu yaalɛ ‑yaa' ‑bhleŋgbeya yaayrɛ 'ɛ ꞊nɔɔ.
'Duŋ‑ 'ke ‑kɔɔ' ‑kɔɔ' ‑baŋgwa ‑a ‑yi dɔɔ ‑kɔɔ' 'laa dɔ, 'yee‑ nu ‑a ‑baŋgolɛ ‑kɔɔ' mu 'yi dɔɔ yaa ‑kɔɔ' mu dɔ 'ezin‑.
'Ke ‑kɔɔ' 'laa bolɛ ‑kɔɔ' 'liijan‑ do ta, 'yee‑ nu bolɛ ‑a ‑liijan' do 'kpɔ 'ɛ ta. ‑Amasrɔyi yaa sɔ ‑a ‑liijan' mabɔɔle, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑e zaabɔ ‑a 'gbu 'lɛ ma.»

Bo ‑jan 'lɛɛ‑ 'bhɛ dɔle ma mɛɛ mu 'ɛ 'kpɛn 'kpee, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a pe ‑o ni 'e 'sɔwɛɛ‑ ma ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ ma dɔɔ waa sradɔlɛ ‑jangɔ' mu ta. ‑Amasrɔyi sradɔle 'ɛ 'bhɛ 'laa ‑za 'kedo‑ 'kpɔ 'yanwo‑ mɛɛ ma, 'ke yaa 'e go mɛɛ 'la zan mu ‑o 'trɔnkpa 'bhɛ ‑jan mu 'ɛ ꞊la 'mu ‑la 'siɛle‑ ba.
Dɔ 'eglɔɔle 'ke 'yee 'gbu zrɔn ‑Waanbhaa' ni 'bhii‑ ‑yaa' yewonɛ 'lrele‑ 'la ‑za sɔ a ni 'bhɛ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ yaa klɛ 'e ma ‑yrala' 'le 'yee‑ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑yrɛ ꞊la; ‑yaa' wlan ma ‑jan 'ɛ daan kplankplan.
'E 'pleŋgo ‑balo 'yifleŋ mu ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑jan mu 'la gole ‑o 'kpaleya zi 'ɛ ma. ‑Amasrɔyi 'woo‑ bhaama janwo mu 'ɛ ‑woo 'pleŋgo‑ yi 'oo yi ‑Waanbhaa' ma.
‑O ‑liijan' mu 'ɛ ‑za mu siɛ 'eyɔɔle 'bhii‑ bhɛ ‑yɔɔ' bhaaplɛŋ 'flɛ 'ɛ bhle 'eyɔɔle gɔnɛ‑ 'la gbɛɛn‑. 'Bhɛ mɛɛ ‑glɔɔn mu 'ɛ 'ke mu ‑le 'ke Imene 'pegee Filɛti mu 'le.
‑O ‑gwa gban wlan ma zi 'ɛ ta, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑wa pe dɔɔ gbaa mu bweza 'ɛ gale ba 'bhɛ yi 'ɛ ꞊bhwa gban; ‑o 'bhɛ pelawo zii' bhe, ‑o mɛɛ ‑bebe 'yini zii' 'ke ‑o 'mu go 'kpaleya zi 'ɛ ta.

'Duŋ‑ ‑Waanbhaa' 'fɛgwlɛ‑ gaan ‑glɔɔla ꞊bwa, 'bhɛ 'laa sɔ 'siɛle ‑titi; ‑jan ‑glɔɔn mu 'lɛɛ‑ 'mu ‑la yɔɔndɛle ‑o ta dɔɔ: «Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' 'gbu ‑yaa' pɛ mɛɛ mu 'ɛ dɔ.» 'Bhɛ 'pegee: «'Ke mɛɛ 'oo mɛɛ 'la zan 'a ꞊pia dɔɔ 'bhɛ ‑o 'ke ‑Waanbhaa' a pɛ mɛɛ 'le, 'bhɛ zan 'bhɛ gaan go ‑za 'yɔɔ‑ zi 'lii.»

'Fɛ ‑gbɛnɛ do ‑la, 'tasa 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑glɔɔn ‑le ye: ‑a 'ke mu laa ‑o 'ke ‑can 'pegee piibhɛ drɔŋ 'le, 'duŋ‑ ‑a 'ke mu ‑o 'ke ‑yri 'pegee 'trɛ 'le 'ezin‑. ‑A 'kɛ mu 'la 'mu ‑o 'ke ‑can 'pegee piibhɛ 'le 'mu ‑o 'ke ‑zabla' yi gblaan ta pɛ mu ‑la ‑le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a ‑vin mu 'ɛ 'mu ‑o 'ke yikpɛnsee ta pɛ mu 'le.

'Ke mɛɛ 'la zan 'bhɛ 'bhɛ 'gbu 'pleŋgwa‑ 'woo‑ ‑za 'triŋle‑ mu 'la bhe ‑o ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a 'kpee 'fleele‑ klɛ. 'Bhɛ zan nu klɛlɛ 'bhii‑ ‑can 'tasa mu 'la ‑o 'mu si ‑zabla' yi ‑gbɛnɛ mu ta 'bhɛ mu gbɛɛn‑. ‑E nu klɛlɛ 'weŋ, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑ya zan do ‑kplɛn maza ‑yanwo'; 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑a ‑lɛmagaanle ‑o ye ‑lrele' 'ɛ 'kpɛn ‑glɔɔn 'wo zayi'.

'Ŋ 'nɛ Timote, blasan‑ ‑zwannɛ mu zrubhɔ za ‑yɔɔ' mu 'ɛ 'lɛɛ. 'Bhɛɛ‑ mɛɛ 'la zan mu 'kpɛn Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' gba ‑o 'kpee 'fleele‑ 'le, 'e 'mabɛɛn‑ 'mu ‑la ‑din, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'ke 'ka ‑lɛdɔɔleya oo, 'kpaleya oo, 'sɔniya 'pegee yilabla ziglin‑.
'Duŋ‑ 'yaa 'e 'lɛbɔlɛ klooya ma ‑jan mu 'pegee 'truu‑ ma ‑jan mu 'yi, ‑amasrɔyi ‑woo 'ke gwle 'pɔpɛ‑ 'le.
'Duŋ‑ 'bhɛ 'laa lele 'ke Mɛɛzan ‑Waanbhaa' a yewonɛ gwledan. 'Duŋ‑ klɛ mɛɛ wlan 'le mɔkpɛn' ma, 'kee‑ sɔ mɛɛ mu daanle, 'bhɛɛ‑ 'kee‑ sɔ mɛɛ mu a ‑yɔɔya' 'ɛ 'yikunle.

Mɛɛ 'la zan mu zaabɔ ‑Waanbhaa' ‑a yewonɛ 'ɛ 'lɛ ma, ‑e 'sɔ ‑jan zikpale 'mu ni ‑a zru ‑dɔɔ 'le, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑yoo bɔ zi ‑lrele' ta; ‑dɔke' yi do ta, ‑Waanbhaa' nu ‑a klɛlɛ 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑zadɔwɛɛ dɔ ‑o ma, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o ploo ‑o klɛza ‑yɔɔ' mu 'ɛ ma, 'bhɛ 'pegee ‑woo zru niinaa' 'bhɛ ba, 'bhɛɛ‑ ‑o wlan 'ɛ dɔ.
